Was da firs day in da week. Ony get litto bit light inside da sky, an dey go da tomb.
Dey tell each odda, “Eh, who goin push da big stone away from da opening part in da tomb fo us?”
But wen dey look up, dey see dat somebody wen push da big stone away awready.
Dey go inside. Dey spock one young guy wit one long white robe on. He stay sitting on da right side. An dey real sked.

He tell um, “Eh, no sked! I know you guys stay looking fo Jesus, da guy from Nazaret, aah? Da one dey wen kill on top one cross. Eh, he come back alive awready! He no stay hea. Look! Dis da place wea dey put his body.
Den, go tell his guys an Peter, ‘Jesus goin go Galilee side befo you guys go dea. Dass da place wea you guys goin see him, jalike he wen tell you guys.’ ”
Da wahines stay shaking an dea jaws drop, an dey run away from da tomb. Dey no tell notting to nobody, cuz dey real sked.
Afta get light da firs day in da week, wen Jesus come back alive, he show up firs by Mary from Magdala. (Her da one, befo time Jesus wen make seven bad kine spirits no bodda her no moa.)
So she go tell da peopo dat was wit Jesus befo time. Dey stay sad an crying.
Wen dey hear dat Jesus stay alive, an dat Mary wen see him, dey no tink wat she tell stay fo real kine.
Afta dat Jesus show up by two a his guys dat stay walking in da countryside. An he look diffren.
Da two guys go back, an tell da odda braddahs an sistahs. But still yet da odda peopo no tink az fo real kine wat da guys tell um.

Layta Jesus show up by his eleven guys wen dey stay eating. He scold um, cuz dey neva trus wat da oddas tell an dey real hard head. Dey no like tink az fo real kine wat da odda peopo tell, da ones dat wen see him afta he come back alive.
Den he tell um, “Go all ova da world, an teach da Good Stuff Bout Me to erybody in da world.
Whoeva trus da Good Stuff Bout Me an get baptize, God goin take dem outa da bad kine stuff dey do. But whoeva no trus dat, God goin tell dey gotta take da blame fo all da bad kine stuff dey wen do.
Da peopo dat trus me, dey goin do awesome stuff. Cuz dey my guys, dey goin use my powa fo make da bad kine spirits no bodda da peopo no moa. Dey goin talk diffren kine languages.
Dey even goin pick up snakes wit dea hands. If dey drink poison, no goin hurt dem. Dey goin put dea hands on top da sick peopo, an da sick peopo goin come good.”
Afta Jesus Da One In Charge pau talk to dem, God take him up inside da sky, an he sit down in da mos importan place by God right side.
Den all his guys go all ova da place an teach. An Da One In Charge work wit dem, an stay do awesome kine stuff fo show dat wat he tell stay fo real.
LUK.1.HPB: Aloha, my fren Teofilus!
Plenny guys wen write down da tings dat wen happen wit us guys.
Dey write down da stuff da odda guys see from da time Jesus start fo teach. Dey teach us an plenny odda peopo bout wat wen happen.
An me, I wen check out real good all da stuff dat happen from da start. I figga dat I like write um down fo you one by one.
Den you can know dat da stuff you wen learn stay true.
Wen Herod stay king fo Judea, had one pries guy name Zekariah. He work wit da Abijah pries hui. Elizabet, she his wife. She come from da Aaron pries ohana.
Zekariah an his wife do da right tings da way God see um. Eryting Da One In Charge tell um fo do, an all da Rules From God, dey do um. An no mo nobody poin finga dem.
Dey no mo kids cuz Elizabet no can. Her an Zekariah stay ol now.
An dis wat happen. Zekariah go in front God inside da Temple fo do da pries kine job wit his pries hui.
Dat time da pries guys pick Zekariah fo go inside God Spesho Place an burn da incense. Dey pull straw fo pick who goin go.
An all da peopo stan outside praying wen da time come wen Zekariah suppose to burn da incense.
Den he spock one angel messenja guy from Da One In Charge dat come an stan on da right side by da altar wea da incense stay burn.
Wen Zekariah see da angel guy, bodda him plenny an he come sked.
But da angel guy tell, “No sked, Zekariah! God wen hear wat you tell, an yoa wife Elizabet goin born one boy. You goin name um John.
You goin stay real good inside cuz a him, an plenny peopo goin stay good inside cuz he born.
John goin be one importan guy, da way Da One In Charge see um. He not goin drink wine o odda kine booze. Da Good An Spesho Spirit goin take charge a him befo he born.
He goin bring back plenny Israel peopo fo trus God, Da One In Charge.

John goin come firs, wit da same kine spirit an powa dat Elijah wen get. He goin make da faddahs get love an aloha fo dea kids one mo time. An da peopo dat no lissen God, he goin make dem stay tink jalike da peopo dat do wass right. He goin make da peopo ready fo wen Da One In Charge come.”
Zekariah tell da angel guy, “How I goin know dis fo shua? I one ol man, an my wife, she ol too.”
Da angel guy tell, “Me Gabriel, da one dat stan in front God, an he wen sen me fo tell you dis good stuff.
From now, you no can talk notting till yoa boy born, cuz you neva trus wat I tell. Dis goin happen fo shua wen da right time come.”
Wen dis happen, da peopo stay wait fo Zekariah outside, an dey try fo figga how come he stay long time inside da Temple.
Wen he come outside, he no can talk to dem. Az why dey figga he see someting spesho inside dea, cuz he make sign wit his hands, but no can talk.
Wen da time pau fo his job, he go home.
Afta dat his wife Elizabet come hapai, an fo five month she stay hide inside da house.
She tell, “Da One In Charge wen do dis fo me. He wen show me he goin do someting good fo me, an he goin take away my shame wit da peopo!”
Afta six month God sen da angel messenja guy Gabriel to one Galilee town Nazaret.
He come by one wahine Mary. She neva come togedda wit one guy, but she make ready fo marry one guy Joseph. He from King David ohana.
Da angel guy come by her an tell, “Aloha! Da One In Charge goin do someting spesho fo you. He stay wit you.”
Mary come all bodda cuz a wat he tell, an tink wat dat mean.
Da angel guy tell,
“Mary, no sked.
God wen pick you, cuz he like do plenny good stuff fo you.
You goin come hapai, an goin born one boy.
You goin name him ‘Jesus.’
He goin be importan,
An God goin call him ‘my Boy dat come from me,
Da God Dass Mo Importan Den All Da Odda Gods.’
God Da One In Charge goin make him one king
Jalike King David, his ancesta guy.
He goin stay King fo da Jacob ohana,
Da Israel peopo, foeva.
Goin be lidat foeva.”
Mary tell him, “How can? I neva sleep wit one guy.”

Da angel guy tell, “Da Good An Spesho Spirit goin come ova you. Da God Dass Mo Importan Den All Da Odda Gods, his powa goin cova you. An da bebe you goin get, God goin call him ‘Spesho Fo Me’ an ‘God Boy.’
You know Elizabet, yoa ohana, aah? No matta she stay ol, she goin born one boy too. Peopo tell she no can born one bebe, but she six month hapai awready.
Notting too hard fo God, you know.”
Mary tell, “I da helpa fo Da One In Charge. Do to me jalike you wen tell.” Den da angel guy go way.
Dat time, Mary get up an go fas to one town in da hills Judea side.
Ova dea she go inside Zekariah house, an spock Elizabet, an tell her, “Aloha!”
Wen Elizabet hear Mary tell dat, da bebe huli inside her, an da Good An Spesho Spirit take ova Elizabet.
She talk loud an tell, “God stay do mo good fo you den fo all da odda wahines, an he stay do mo good fo da boy you goin born too!
But why dis good ting happen to me, dat you come by me, an you goin be da muddah fo Da One In Charge a me?!
Cuz wen I hear you tell ‘Aloha,’ right den an dea da bebe inside me wen huli cuz he stay good inside.
Da One In Charge stay do plenny good stuff fo you, cuz you stay shua dat da ting he tell goin happen.”
Mary tell,
“Inside, I like tell good tings
Bout Da One In Charge.
I feel real good inside
Cuz God take good kea a me.
He wen tink bout me, his pooa worka!
From now on all da peopo goin tell
God wen do plenny good stuffs fo me,
Cuz God get powa
An do plenny importan tings fo me.
He stay good an spesho,
Dass wat kine god him.
He give da peopo chance
Dat show respeck fo him,
From da granfaddas to da grankids.
He stay show his powa
An stay make da peopo wit big head
So dey no can do
All da stuff dey like do.
He stay pull down plenny big kings
From dea thrones,
An he stay make da peopo
Dat no mo notting, come importan.
He stay give da hungry peopo
Good stuff fo eat,
An he stay sen away da rich guys
Wit notting.
He stay help da Israel peopo
Dat work fo him.
He no foget fo give dem chance,
Jalike he wen tell oua ancesta guys,
Abraham an his ohana, foeva.”
Mary stay ova dea wit Elizabet three month, an den she go home.
Da time come fo Elizabet fo born her bebe, an she born her boy.
Da peopo from ova dea an her ohana hear how Da One In Charge do plenny fo Elizabet cuz he get pity fo her, an dey all come real good inside wit her.
One week layta da ohana come fo cut da bebe skin. Dey figga dey goin name him Zekariah jalike his faddah.
But his muddah tell, “No way! We goin name him ‘John.’ ”
Dey tell her, “But you no mo nobody in yoa ohana wit dat name!”
Den dey make sign wit dea hands to his faddah, an go aks him wat he like name da boy.
Zekariah aks fo one paypa an write down, “He get da name ‘John.’ ” An dea jaws drop!
Right den an dea Zekariah start fo talk an tell good tings bout God.
Da peopo from ova dea come sked. An erybody tell dis story all ova da place in da hills Judea side.
Erybody dat hear dat story tink plenny, an tell, “Wat kine kid dis goin be?” Cuz da powa from God stay wit him.
Da time da Good An Spesho Spirit take ova John faddah Zekariah, he tell tings from God, lidis:
“Tell good tings bout Da One In Charge,
Da God fo da Israel peopo!
He come fo cut loose his peopo
From da peopo dat stay agains us.
He give us one Guy dat get da powa
Fo get us outa da bad kine stuff we stay in.
Dat Guy come from King David ohana,
Da king dat work fo God.
From befo time da guys dat talk fo God
Cuz dey stay spesho fo him,
Dey tell dis:
He wen promise fo take us away
From da guys dat stay agains us
An from da powa dey get.
He tell he goin give oua ancesta guys chance,
An he no goin foget da spesho deal he wen make wit dem.
He wen promise oua ancesta Abraham fo shua
Dat he goin take us away from da guys dat stay agains us,
An from da powa dey get,
He goin help us work fo him an no stay sked,
Fo us come spesho an make right da way he see us
All da days we stay alive.
An you, my boy John, dey goin call you
One guy dat talk fo da God Dass Mo Importan Den All Da Odda Gods,
Cuz you goin go firs, befo Da One In Charge come,
Fo make da roads ready fo him,
Fo make da peopo know
Dat he goin bring dem outa da bad kine stuff dey stay do,
An he goin let um go an hemo dea shame fo dat.
Oua God give chance cuz he get one big heart.
Dass why one new day goin come up fo us guys from God in da sky.
Da peopo dat stay do bad kine stuff,
Jalike dey stay live inside da dark an no can see notting,
An dey goin mahke inside,
God goin help dem fo know da trut.
Den us guys goin see da right way,
An den notting goin bodda us guys.”
Da boy John grow up, an his spirit come strong. He live inside da boonies till da day he come out an da Israel peopo see him.
LUK.2.HPB: Dat time, da king fo da Rome peopo, Cesar Augustus, make all da peopo sign up fo find out how many peopo get ery place.
Dis da firs census dey make wen Quirinius stay govna fo Syria.
Erybody go back da town dea ohana come from fo sign up.
So Joseph go from Nazaret town Galilee side, to Betlehem Judea side. Az King David town, cuz he come from King David ohana.
He go ova dea fo sign up wit Mary, da wahine da ohana wen promise fo marry him. She stay hapai.
Wen dey stay dea, da time come fo her fo born her bebe.
An she born her numba one boy, an wrap him up inside some cloths, an lay him down inside one ting fo hold da cows food, cuz no mo room fo dem inside da small hotel.
Dat nite, ova dea inside da fields, get sheep guys dat take kea dea sheeps.
Right den an dea one angel messenja guy from Da One In Charge come by dem. All aroun dem one awesome light shine from him. Da sheep guys come real sked.
But da angel guy tell, “No sked. I come fo tell you guys Good Stuff From God dat goin make you guys an all da peopo stay good inside.
Today inside King David town, one boy wen born dat goin get you guys outa da bad kine stuff you stay do. He da Christ Guy, da Spesho Guy God Wen Sen. He Da One In Charge!
Dis how you goin know him. You goin find one bebe dat stay wrap up inside plenny cloths, laying down inside one ting fo hold da cows food.”
Right den an dea uku pile angel guys from da sky show up wit da firs angel guy. Dey stay tell good stuff bout God lidis:
“Up inside da sky wea God stay,
He stay awesome!
An ova hea on top da earth,
If God like wat peopo stay do,
He goin make dem
So notting bodda dem.”
Den da angel guys go way from dem an go back by God inside da sky. Da sheep guys tell each odda, “Eh brah, we go Betlehem fo see dis ting dat wen happen, dat Da One In Charge tell us bout.”
So dey run an find Mary an Joseph. Da bebe stay lie down inside one box fo da cow food.
Wen dey see da bebe, dey tell erybody wat da angel guys wen tell bout dis boy.
Erybody dat hear dat, tink bout wat da sheep guys tell um.
But Mary put all dese tings inside her, an tink plenny how spesho dey stay.
Da sheep guys go back, an dey tell erybody how God stay plenny good an awesome. Cuz all da stuff dey hear an see was jalike da angel guy wen tell um.
One week layta da time come fo cut skin. An dey call da bebe Jesus, jalike da angel guy from God tell befo Mary come hapai.

Befo time, Moses wen write down inside da Rules From God, all da stuff dat peopo gotta do wen one bebe born, cuz da muddah stay kapu fo pray wit odda peopo fo forty day. But wen da kapu pau, da muddah an da faddah gotta make one sacrifice, den she can go pray wit da odda peopo. Az why wen da time come, Joseph an Mary take Jesus to Jerusalem fo bring him inside da Temple, in front Da One In Charge.
In da Rules dat Moses write down befo time, Da One In Charge tell, “Bring me ery numba one boy fo make him spesho fo me.”
An Joseph an Mary make one sacrifice cuz dea numba one boy born, jalike da Rules from Da One In Charge tell, “If dey no mo notting, den bring two doves o two pigeons fo da sacrifice.”
Dat time get one guy Simeon inside Jerusalem. He one guy dat erytime do da right ting an pray. He stay wait fo da One dat goin kokua da Israel peopo. An da Good An Spesho Spirit stay in charge a him.
Da Good An Spesho Spirit wen show him dat he no goin mahke befo he see da Christ Guy, da Spesho Guy dat Da One In Charge goin sen.
God Spirit tell him an he go inside da open lanai fo da Temple. Wen da faddah an muddah bring da boy Jesus inside fo do wat da Rules tell dey gotta do,
Simeon carry him in his arms an tell good stuff bout God lidis:
“You, Da One In Charge!
You do wat you wen promise fo do
To me, da guy dat work fo you.
Az why now you can let me mahke.
Notting goin bodda me,
Cuz now I see wat you wen do
Fo take us outa da bad kine stuff we stay do.
You wen make dis Boy ready fo do all dat
In front all da peopo.
He jalike one light
Fo make yoa peopo come awesome,
Da Israel peopo,
An fo show all da odda peopos
Inside da world
Wat stay right.”
Da faddah an muddah tink plenny bout da stuff Simeon tell bout da boy.

Simeon tell God fo do good tings fo dem too. He tell Jesus muddah Mary, “God wen sen dis boy, an plenny Israel peopo goin jam up cuz a him. But plenny odda Israel peopo, dey goin come good cuz a him. He goin be jalike one sign dat tell peopo fo watch out. Plenny peopo no goin like dat, an dey goin grumble bout him.
Dat goin show wat plenny peopo tink. An you too, Mary, you goin come sore inside, jalike one sword goin go thru yoa heart.”
Had one ol wahine Anna dea dat talk fo God. She Fanuel girl, from da Asher ohana. She wen stay marry seven year,
an now, she one widow fo eighty-four year. She no go outside da open lanai fo da Temple eva. Day time an nite time she stay do stuff fo God. She skip food an pray.

Dat time she come an tell God “Mahalo plenny!” an tell erybody bout da boy. She tell all da peopo dat stay wait, cuz dey know God goin cut loose da Jerusalem peopo so dey no gotta be jalike slaves no moa.
Wen Joseph an Mary pau all da stuff dey gotta do, jalike Da One In Charge tell inside da Rules, dey go back Galilee side, Nazaret town.
Da boy grow an come strong. He come akamai, an God do good tings fo him.
Ery year Jesus faddah an muddah go Jerusalem fo da Passova ceremony.
Wen Jesus make twelve year, dey go da Passova jalike dey erytime go.
Wen da days fo da Passova pau, dey start fo go home, but da boy Jesus stay inside Jerusalem. His faddah an muddah neva know he stay dea.
Dey figga Jesus stay wit da odda peopo dat go wit dem. So dey go fo one day, an den dey start fo look fo him wit dea ohana an dea frenz.
Dey no can find him, so dey go back Jerusalem side fo look fo him.
Day numba three, dey find Jesus inside da open lanai fo da Temple, stay sitting dea wit da Jew teachas, lissening to dem, an aksing dem stuff.
Erybody dat hear Jesus, blow dea mind, cuz dey see he akamai da way he talk to dem.
His faddah an muddah come all shook up wen dey spock him, an his muddah tell him, “My boy, how come you do dis to us? Me an yoa faddah neva feel good inside, wen we try fo look fo you.”
He tell, “How come you wen look fo me? You neva know I gotta do my Faddah kuleana?”
But dey neva undastan wat he tell dem.
So Jesus go back wit dem to Nazaret, an erytime he do wat dey tell um fo do. But his muddah no tell notting to nobody, but tink plenny bout um.
An Jesus grow mo an mo fo know wat fo do erytime, an grow up mo an moa. An God an all da peopo tink good bout him.
LUK.3.HPB: Afta da Big King Tiberius was king fo Rome fifteen year, get
Pontius Pilate da territorial govna from Rome fo Judea,
Herod da small kine king inside Galilee,
Herod braddah Philip da small kine king inside Iturea an Trakonitis,
Lysanias da small kine king inside Abilene,
an
Annas an Kaiafas da Main Pries Guys fo da Jew guys.
Dat time da guy John, Zekariah boy, stay ova dea inside da boonies. Den God talk to him.

So he go all ova da place aroun da Jordan Riva, an tell da peopo, “You guys, you gotta come sorry an no do all da bad kine stuff you stay do now, an no do um no moa, an get baptize. Den God goin let all you guys go an hemo yoa shame fo all da bad kine stuff you stay do.”
Dass jalike Isaiah wen tell. He one guy dat talk fo God befo time. He write down dis inside da Bible:
“One guy goin talk real loud inside da boonies,
“ ‘Eh! Make da road ready fo Da One In Charge!
Make um strait fo him!’
Ery valley goin come fill up,
Ery mountain an hill goin come flat.
Da crooked roads goin come strait,
An da rough kine places goin come nice.
An all da peopo inside da whole world
Goin see dat God goin take us
Outa da bad kine stuff we stay in.”

Plenny peopo go ova dea fo John baptize um. He tell, “Eh! You guys no good, jalike one snake ohana! Who tell you guys fo run away from da bad tings dat goin happen? Cuz God had it wit all da bad kine stuff you do. He goin punish you guys fo dat!

Jalike one fruit tree give same kine fruit, you guys gotta do da kine good stuff dat show dat you no do all kine bad stuff no moa. Eh! No start fo tink, ‘Us guys can do wat us like, cuz we get Abraham fo oua main faddah.’ I stay telling you guys now, God can take dese rocks ova hea an make kids fo Abraham outa dem.
You guys gotta do good kine stuff! Cuz jalike awready get one guy wit one ax, all ready fo cut da tree roots. All da trees dat no make good fruit, he goin cut um down, an throw um inside da fire.”
Da peopo tell, “Den wat we gotta do?”
John tell, “Da guy dat get two coat gotta give one to da guy dat no mo coat. An da guy dat get food gotta give to da guy dat no mo food.”
Some guys dat colleck tax money fo da govmen come fo John baptize dem too. Dey tell him, “Teacha, wat we gotta do?”
He tell um, “No take mo money den you suppose to take.”
Some army guys tell him, “An wat us gotta do?”
He tell, “No push nobody fo give you guys money. No tell nobody dey get da blame fo someting dey neva do. Stay good inside wit da kine pay you get.”
Da peopo stay wait fo da Spesho Guy God Goin Sen, an dey try fo figga if John dat guy.

John tell, “I baptize you guys wit watta. Dat show dat you stay sorry fo all da kine bad stuff you do. But afta me, anodda guy goin come, da Christ Guy. He way mo importan den me. An you know wat? I not importan enuff fo help him hemo his slippas. Da way he goin baptize you guys, jalike he goin give you God Spirit fo take ova you, jalike he goin baptize you guys wit fire.

Dat mean, da Christ Guy goin punish da peopo dat stay do bad kine stuff. Jalike one farma guy put da wheat inside da basket an let da wind blow out all da junk kine stuff from da wheat, den he put da wheat inside da storage place. Afta dat, he burn da junk kine stuff.”
John tell da peopo plenny mo stuff fo help dem trus da Good Stuff From God.
But John scold Herod, da small kine king ova dea, cuz Herod steal his braddah wife Herodias an marry her. Herod do mo plenny bad kine stuff.
An one ting mo worse, Herod throw John inside da prison!
Had one time befo dat, wen John baptize all da peopo, an he baptize Jesus too. Afta John baptize Jesus an den Jesus stay pray, da sky open up

an da Good An Spesho Spirit come down on top Jesus. Can see da Spirit dat time, look jalike one dove. An wow! Get one voice from da sky tell, “You my Boy. I fo real kine get love an aloha fo you, an I stay good inside cuz a you.”
Wen Jesus start fo teach, he was bout thirty year ol. Da peopo tink he Joseph boy. Joseph, he Heli boy;
Heli, he Mattat boy; Mattat, he Levi boy; Levi, he Melki boy; Melki, he Jannai boy; Jannai, he Joseph boy;
Joseph, he Mattatias boy; Mattatias, he Amos boy; Amos, he Nahum boy; Nahum, he Esli boy; Esli, he Naggai boy;
Naggai, he Maat boy; Maat, he Mattatias boy; Mattatias, he Semein boy; Semein, he Josek boy; Josek, he Joda boy;
Joda, he Joanan boy; Joanan, he Resa boy; Resa, he Zerubbabel boy; Zerubbabel, he Shealtiel boy; Shealtiel, he Neri boy;
Neri, he Melki boy; Melki, he Addi boy; Addi, he Cosam boy; Cosam, he Elmadam boy; Elmadam, he Er boy;
Er, he Joshua boy; Joshua, he Eliezer boy; Eliezer, he Jorim boy; Jorim, he Mattat boy; Mattat, he Levi boy;
Levi, he Simeon boy; Simeon, he Judah boy; Judah, he Joseph boy; Joseph, he Jonam boy; Jonam, he Eliakim boy;
Eliakim, he Melea boy; Melea, he Menna boy; Menna, he Mattata boy; Mattata, he Nathan boy; Nathan, he David boy;
David, he Jesse boy; Jesse, he Obed boy; Obed, he Boaz boy; Boaz, he Salmon boy; Salmon, he Nashon boy;
Nashon, he Aminadab boy; Aminadab, he Admin boy; Admin, he Arni boy; Arni, he Hezron boy; Hezron, he Perez boy; Perez, he Judah boy;
Judah, he Jacob boy; Jacob, he Isaac boy; Isaac, he Abraham boy; Abraham, he Terah boy; Terah, he Nahor boy;
Nahor, he Serug boy; Serug, he Reu boy; Reu, he Peleg boy; Peleg, he Eber boy; Eber, he Shelah boy;
Shelah, he Cainan boy; Cainan, he Arfaxad boy; Arfaxad, he Shem boy; Shem, he Noah boy; Noah, he Lamek boy;
Lamek, he Metuselah boy; Metuselah, he Enok boy; Enok, he Jared boy; Jared, he Mahalaleel boy; Mahalaleel, he Cainan boy;
Cainan, he Enos boy; Enos, he Seth boy; Seth, he Adam boy; Adam, he God boy.
LUK.4.HPB: Afta John baptize Jesus, Jesus go way from da Jordan Riva. Da Good An Spesho Spirit from God stay in charge a him, an da Spirit take him to da boonies.
Fo forty days da Devil try presha Jesus fo make um do bad kine stuff. Jesus no eat notting dat time so he can pray, an afta dat he hungry.
Da Devil tell Jesus, “So, wat? You God Boy fo real kine? Den tell dis rock fo come bread.”
Jesus tell, “No ways! Cuz da Bible tell, ‘No mo nobody dat can live ony wit bread.’ ”
Den da Devil take Jesus up on top one high place, an show him all da diffren countries all ova da world in one secon.
An da Devil tell him, “All dis powa an awesome stuff, az mines, an I can give um to anybody I like.
I give you all dis, if you go down on yoa knees an show me plenny respeck.”
Jesus tell him, “No ways! Cuz da Bible tell befo time,
“ ‘Gotta go down on yoa knees
An show plenny respeck to God Da One In Charge a you,
An live an work ony fo him.’ ”
Den da Devil take Jesus to Jerusalem an make him stan on top da high part a da towa on top da Temple. Da Devil tell, “So, wat? You God Boy fo real kine? Kay den, go jump down dea.
Cuz da Bible tell,
“ ‘God goin tell his angel messenja guys
Fo take kea you real good.
Dey goin pick you up an carry you in dea hands,
Fo yoa feets no get bus up on da rocks.’ ”
But Jesus tell him, “Not! Cuz da Bible tell, ‘God, he Da One In Charge a you. So no try presha him fo make him show proof dat he God.’ ”
Wen da Devil pau try fo make Jesus do all kine bad stuff, da Devil go way from him till nex time.
Den Jesus go back Galilee side, wit plenny powa from da Good An Spesho Spirit. All da peopo ova dea in dat place hear bout all da stuff he do.
He teach inside da Jew churches, an erybody talk good bout him.
Jesus go Nazaret town, wea he grow up small kid time. Wen da Res Day come, he go inside da Jew church, jalike he erytime go. He stan up fo read da Bible.
Da helpa guy give him da book from Isaiah, da guy dat talk fo God befo time. He open um an find da place wea Isaiah write,
“Da Good An Spesho Spirit from Da One In Charge stay in charge a me,
Dass why he sen me fo teach da peopo dat no mo notting
Da Good Kine Stuff From God.
He sen me fo tell da prisona guys
Fo dem come free now.
An tell da peopo dat no can see,
Fo dem see now,
An tell da peopo
Dat dey no goin suffa no mo
From da guys dat make any kine to dem,
He sen me fo tell peopo da time
Wen Da One In Charge
Goin do spesho tings fo dem.”
Jesus close da book, an give um back to da helpa guy, an sit down fo teach. All da peopo inside da Jew church look at him.
He tell, “Wat you guys jus hear from da Bible, stay happen right now!”
Erybody dat hear him talk good bout him. Dat blow dea mind cuz he talk good. Dey tell, “Eh, dis Joseph boy, aah?”
Jesus tell, “Fo shua you goin tell me wat oua ancesta guys tell, ‘Eh Docta! Make um so you come good! Do da same ting ova hea in yoa home town, jalike we hear you wen do inside Capernaum.’
Dass how you guys stay! But I stay tell you, ‘One guy dat talk fo God, da peopo inside his home town no show him respeck.’
Try tink! Dass true dat befo time, wen Elijah stay alive, had plenny widows inside Israel an neva had rain from da sky fo three an one half year, an neva had food all ova da land.
But God neva sen Elijah fo help one widow inside Israel dat time. He sen um fo help one widow inside Zarefat town, Sidon side.

Same ting, wen Elisha was da guy dat talk fo God, had plenny lepa guys inside Israel. But God no make one lepa guy inside Israel come good, dat time. Ony Naaman, da foreigna guy from Syria, God make him come good.”
All da peopo inside da Jew church come real huhu wen dey hear him talk good bout da foreigna guys.
Dey stan up, drag him outside da town, an take him on top da hill wea da town stay, fo throw him ova da cliff.
But he walk right thru all da peopo an go way from dea.
Den Jesus go Capernaum town, Galilee side. He teach da peopo on da Jew Res Day.
Blow dea minds, fo wat he teach um. Cuz he teach wit plenny powa.
Had one guy inside da Jew church wit one bad kine spirit dat take ova him. He yell,
“Whoa! You Jesus from Nazaret! Wat you like do to us spirits? How come you come ova hea? Fo kill us, o wat? I know who you! You da Good an Spesho Guy from God!”
Jesus scold him. “No talk lidat! Let da guy go!” Den da bad kine spirit shake up da guy plenny in front dem, den he let da guy go, an no hurt him.
Da peopo, dat blow dea mind. Dey tell each odda, “Eh! Wat dis? Wat kine new teaching dis? He get powa fo even tell da bad kine spirits fo let go da peopo, an dey let um go!”
An da peopo go all ova da place aroun dea fo tell erybody bout Jesus.
Jesus go outside da Jew church, an go Simon house. Simon muddah-in-law get high feva. Simon dem tell Jesus fo help her.
Jesus go stan by her bed an tell da feva fo get out. An no mo da feva awready. Right den an dea she get up, an give dem food.
Wen da sun go down an da Res Day pau, plenny peopo bring by Jesus odda peopo dat get all kine sick. He put his hands on top erybody dass sick, an make all a dem come good.
An da bad kine spirits no bodda plenny peopo no moa. Da spirits yell, “You God Boy!” Jesus scold da spirits, an neva let dem say notting, cuz dey know he da Spesho Guy God Wen Sen.
Morning time wen start fo get light, Jesus go one place wea nobody stay. Da peopo go look fo him, an wen dey find him, dey try fo make him stay wit dem.
But he tell, “I gotta go da odda towns too, fo teach da peopo da Good Stuff bout how dey can get God fo dea king, cuz dass why he sen me ova hea.”
Az why he stay teach inside da Jew churches all ova Judea side.
LUK.5.HPB: One time Jesus stay on top da beach a Gennesaret Lake, an all da peopo try come close by him fo hear wat God tell.
He spock two boats ova dea nea da watta. Da guys dat fish jump outa dea boats an stay washing dea nets on da beach.
Jesus go inside Simon boat, an tell him fo go out litto bit from da beach. Den Jesus sit down an teach da peopo from dea.
Wen he pau teach, he tell Simon, “Eh Simon, go out wea stay deep an lay yoa nets.”
Simon tell, “Boss, us guys wen bus ass all nite an ony whitewash. But cuz you tell me fo do um, I goin do um.”
So dey lay da nets, an dey catch uku pile a fish, an da nets start fo broke.
Dey make sign fo dea braddahs inside da odda boat fo come help um. Dem guys come an fill up da two boats so full, da boats start fo sink.
Wen Simon Peter see how plenny fish dey get, he go down on his knees in front Jesus an tell, “Eh, Boss, go way from me, cuz I one guy dat stay do bad kine stuff!”
Simon an all da guys ova dea by him, blow dea mind, cuz dey catch choke plenny fish.
James an John, dey Zebedee boys, an dey fishamen dat work togedda wit Simon. Dey blow dea mind too. Jesus tell Simon, “No sked. Jalike you guys fish fo fish, from now you guys goin fish fo peopo!”
Right den an dea, dey pull dea boats up on top da beach, an leave all dea stuffs ova dea, an go wit Jesus.

Wen Jesus stay inside one a da towns, one lepa guy come by him. Da guy get da kine sores all ova. Wen he spock Jesus, he go down an put his face on top da groun, an he beg Jesus, “Boss, if you like, you can make me come good, aah?”
Jesus stick out his hand an touch da guy. Same time Jesus tell, “Shoots, I like fo you come good!” Right den an dea da guy come good.

Den Jesus tell um, “Make shua you no tell nobody bout dis! Go by da pries guy fo him check you out dat you no mo da lepa kine sick. No foget make da kine sacrifice now, jalike Moses wen tell inside da Rules From God. Gotta do all dat, so erybody goin know you stay good now.”
But erybody all ova da place hear bout wat Jesus wen do, an plenny peopo come fo lissen him, fo him make dem come good from all dea sick.
But plenny time Jesus go wea no mo nobody, fo pray ova dea.

One a da days Jesus stay teach, had Pharisee guys an teachas dat teach da Rules From God stay sit ova dea. Dey come from ery town inside Galilee an Judea, an from Jerusalem. Jesus get powa from Da One In Charge fo make da sick peopo come good.
Had some guys dat bring one guy on top one mat. Da guy, he no can move, notting. Dey try bring him inside da house fo put him in front Jesus.
But dey no can find one way fo do um cuz plenny peopo jam inside dea. Az why dey go up on top da flat roof, an make one puka, an let da guy down on top da mat in front Jesus.

Jesus see dat, an he figga, “Eh, wow! Cuz dese guys trus me fo real kine, I goin make dea fren come good!” Den he tell da guy, “Eh you, you know all da bad kine stuff you wen do? I tell you now, da shame fo all dat, pau awready!”
Da Pharisee guys an da teachas dat teach da Rules From God, dey stay tink, “Eh, dis guy ack an talk jalike he God! Ony God can let peopo go fo da bad kine stuff dey do an hemo dea shame!”
But Jesus know wat dey tinking. He tell, “How come you guys tink bad kine stuff lidat?

I like show proof to you guys, dat I da Fo Real Kine Guy, an I get da right inside dis world fo let peopo go an hemo dea shame fo da bad kine stuff dey wen do. But, easy fo talk bout hemo da shame—anybody can talk dat kine. But not easy fo do um. Same ting, easy fo tell one sick guy dat no can move, ‘Eh, stan up an move aroun!’—anybody can talk dat kine. But not easy fo do um. But now, I goin show proof to you guys—I goin make dis sick guy come strong.”
An he tell da guy dat no can move, “Eh, stan up! Pick up yoa mat, an go home awready!”
Right den an dea da guy stan up in front all dem guys, pick up da mat, an go home, talking good kine stuff bout God.
All da peopo see wat Jesus wen do an dat blow dea mind. Dey talk good kine stuff bout God too. Same time, dey come real sked. Dey tell, “Dis awesome! Us wen see unreal stuff today!”
Afta dat Jesus go outside an spock one guy dat colleck tax money fo da govmen. He stay sit down inside his place. His name Levi. Jesus tell him, “Eh, come wit me, an be my guy!”
So Levi stan up, leave all his stuffs ova dea, an go wit Jesus.
Den Levi make one big luau fo Jesus inside his house. Plenny guys dat colleck tax money an odda guys eat wit dem.

But da Pharisee guys an da teachas dat teach da Rules From God an stay tight wit da Pharisee guys, dey grumble at Jesus guys. Dey tell, “Eh, how come you guys stay eat wit da guys dat colleck tax money an odda guys dat get one bad rep?”
Jesus tell, “Da peopo dat not sick, dey no need docta. Ony da sick peopo need docta.
I neva come fo tell da good peopo fo come by me, but I tell da peopo dat get one bad rep, fo dem come sorry fo all da bad kine stuff dey wen do, an no do um no moa.”

Den da Pharisee guys an dea frenz tell, “Plenny times, da guys dat John Da Baptiza guy teach, dey skip food wen dey pray. An da guys dat da Pharisee guys teach, dey skip food wen dey pray too. But da guys you stay teach, dey stay eat an drink. How come, aah?”
Jesus tell, “Wat you tink? You can make da guys at one wedding skip food wen dea fren dat getting married stay dea wit dem? No can!
But you know, bumbye da time goin come wen peopo goin take away dea fren. Den his frenz goin come bum out, an az why dey goin skip food!”

He tell um anodda ting fo teach um. “Fo cova one puka on one ol clothes, you no goin cut one piece from one new clothes, fo put on top da ol clothes. You do dat, you goin jam up da new clothes, an da new piece no goin match da ol clothes.
An you no goin put grape juice fo make wine inside one ol wineskin. You do dat, wen da grape juice come wine, goin bus da ol wineskin. You goin lose da wine an da skin too. Eryting come poho!
Mo betta, you put new wine inside one new wineskin.
Nobody like drink da new kine wine afta he drink da ol one, cuz he tell, ‘Da ol wine mo betta.’ ”
LUK.6.HPB: One time was da Jew Res Day. Jesus an his guys wen walk thru da fields wea dey grow da wheat. His guys pick litto bit wheat, rub um wit dea hands fo get rid a da junks, an eat um.
But had some Pharisee guys tell, “Hala! How come you guys stay do da kine work dass kapu fo do on da Res Day?!”
Jesus tell um, “Wot! You guys neva read inside da Bible wat King David wen do, dat time him an his guys was hungry?

He wen go inside God house. He take da bread dass spesho fo God dat stay ova dea an eat um. He give um to his guys too. An nobody neva say notting to David, no matta da Rules From God tell dat ony da pries guys can eat dat bread.
“Eh! I da Fo Real Kine Guy. Dass why I da One get da right fo tell wat can do da Res Day.”
Anodda Res Day Jesus go inside one Jew church an teach. One guy stay dea an his right hand no work no moa.
Some teachas dat teach da Rules From God an some Pharisee guys like bus Jesus, so dey watch um real good, if he goin make somebody come good on da Res Day.
But Jesus know wat dey stay tink, an he tell da guy wit da hand dat no work no moa, “Stan up ova hea in front erybody.” An da guy come.
Den Jesus tell dem, “I like aks you guys one question. Dass right in da Rules From God fo do da good kine stuff on da Res Day, o do da bad kine stuff? Fo help peopo fo stay alive, o fo wipe um out?”
He look aroun at dem, an den he tell da guy, “Stick out yoa hand.” An da guy stick um out, an his hand come good one mo time.
But da Pharisee guys come real huhu, an start fo make one plan togedda wat dey like do to Jesus.
Dat time Jesus go up one hill fo pray. He stay dea an pray all nite.
Wen day time come he call all da guys dat go wit him fo come. An he pick twelve guys, an tell dey da guys he goin sen all ova.
He pick
Simon (da guy Jesus name Peter),
Andrew his braddah,
James an John,
Philip an Bartolomew,
Matthew an Thomas,
Alfeus boy James,
Simon da guy dey call da Jew sovereignty guy,
James boy Judas,
Judas Iscariot, da guy dat bumbye goin set Jesus up fo mahke.
Jesus come down da hill wit his guys, an he stan on top one flat place. Had plenny guys dea dat go wit him an plenny odda peopo from Jerusalem an all ova Judea, an from da coast nea Tyre an Sidon.
Dey come ova dea fo lissen him, an fo him make um come good from all kine sick. Da kine wit da bad kine spirits dat bodda dem, Jesus make um all come good.
Erybody try fo touch him, cuz da powa stay come outa him an make um all come good.
Jesus look da guys he stay teach an tell,
“You guys dat stay pooa now,
You can stay good inside
Cuz God, he yoa King!
You guys dat stay hungry now,
You can stay good inside
Cuz you goin come full!
You guys dat cry now,
You can stay good inside
Cuz you goin laugh!
“You guys can stay good inside wen da peopo hate you, an throw you out, an talk harsh kine to you, an tell you no good cuz a me, da Fo Real Kine Guy!

Da peopo dat hate you guys now, long time befo time God wen sen da guys dat talk fo him fo teach dea ancesta guys. An dose peopo dat time make da guys dat talk fo God suffa plenny too, jalike nowdays dea kids stay make you guys suffa. But eh! Dance an sing wen dey make any kine to you guys! Stay plenny good inside! Cuz bumbye God goin give you guys plenny good kine stuff in da sky.
“Bummahs you guys dat stay rich now!
You get da easy time awready.
Bummahs you guys dat stay full now!
You goin come hungry!
Bummahs you guys dat laugh now!
You goin come real sad an cry!
Bummahs wen erybody talk good bout you guys!
Cuz you know, long time befo time dea ancesta guys wen talk good bout da fake guys dat tell dey talk fo God but dey neva.”
“I stay tell you guys dat lissen me: Get love an aloha fo da peopo dat stay agains you. Do good stuff fo dem.
Tell God fo do good tings to da peopo dat put kahuna on top you, an pray fo da peopo dat make you guys suffa.
If somebody wack yoa right cheek, let him wack yoa lef cheek too. If one guy steal yoa coat, give him yoa shirt too.
Give to erybody dat aks you fo someting, an if somebody rip off yoa stuffs, no tell him fo give um back.
Do to da odda guy jalike you like him do to you.

“If you guys get love an aloha ony fo da peopo dat get love an aloha fo you, you figga God owe you money fo dat? No way! Even da bad kine guys get love an aloha fo da guys dat get love an aloha fo dem!
An if you guys do good ony to da peopo dat do good to you, you figga God owe you money fo dat? No way! Even da peopo dat do bad kine stuff do dat.

If you guys ony lend someting to da peopo you figga goin give um back, you figga God owe you money fo dat? Even da bad kine peopo lend stuff to odda bad kine peopo, if dey figga dey goin get um all back.

No way! Get love an aloha fo da peopo dat stay agains you, an do good tings fo dem, an lend um stuff, an no figga you goin get um back! Cuz da God Dass Mo Importan Den All Da Odda Gods, he erytime do good tings fo da peopo dat no tell him ‘Mahalo plenny!’ an da peopo dat do real bad kine stuff. If you make jalike God, dat show he you guys Faddah, an you his kids. An bumbye, God goin give you guys plenny good kine stuff bumbye in da sky cuz a dat.
Give chance jalike yoa Faddah give chance.

“No make jalike one judge to nobody. Den God no goin be yoa judge. No tell da odda guy gotta get punish. Den God no goin punish you. Let da odda guy go, an no stay huhu wit him. Den God goin let you go an hemo yoa shame fo all da bad kine stuff you wen do.

Give stuff to da odda guy. Den God goin give stuff to you. He goin fill um up, shake um, fill um up some moa, plenny goin even run ova, an he goin pour um all inside yoa bag. Cuz da way you give to peopo, same way he goin give to you.”
Jesus talk some moa. He tell, “You tink one blind guy can lead anodda blind guy? He do dat, an da two guys goin fall down inside one puka.
One guy not mo importan den his teacha, but erybody dat learn all da stuffs from dea teacha, dey goin come jalike dea teacha.
“How come you guys spock da small piece junk inside yoa braddah eye, an no tink bout da big two by four inside yoa eye?

How you goin tell yoa braddah, ‘Eh, try let me pull da small piece junk outa yoa eye,’ wen you no see da big two by four inside yoa eye? You tell one ting an do anodda! Firs take da big two by four outa yoa own eye, den you can see good fo take da small piece junk outa yoa braddah eye.
“Da good kine tree no can give bad fruits, an da bad kine tree no can give good fruits.
You know da kine tree from da kine fruits dey give. No can pick da fig o da grape from da kine tree wit thorns.

Da good guy do good kine stuff cuz get good stuff inside him, an da bad guy do bad kine stuff cuz get bad stuff inside him. Da kine stuff somebody get inside goin come out thru da mout by wat da guy tell.
“How come you guys call me ‘Boss, Boss,’ but you no do wat I tell you fo do?
I goin show you guys how da guy stay dat come by me, an lissen wat I tell um fo do, an he do um.
He jalike da guy dat stay build his house, an dig deep an put da foundation on top da rock. Den da big watta come, an poun da house, but no can shake um, cuz he make um good.
But da guy dat hear wat I tell an no do um, he jalike da guy dat build his house on top da groun, but no mo foundation. Da big watta poun um, an dat house fall down an bus up.”
LUK.7.HPB: Wen Jesus pau teach da peopo all dat stuff, he go Capernaum town.
One captain fo da Rome army guys ova dea get one sick worka guy. Da captain get plenny love an aloha fo him, an da guy litto mo mahke.
Da captain hear bout Jesus, an he sen some older Jew leadas by him, fo tell him fo come an make his worka guy come good.
Wen da leada guys come by Jesus, dey beg him real hard. Dey tell, “Dis captain, he one good guy. Az why dass good if you can help him.
He get love an aloha fo oua Jew peopo, an he wen build oua church fo us.”
So Jesus go wit dem. Wen he come nea da house, da captain sen his frenz fo tell Jesus, “Boss, no need bodda you, cuz I no stay good enuff fo you come inside my house.
Dass why I figga dat me no stay good enuff fo come by you. Jus tell da word, an my worka guy goin come good.

You know, I get one army boss dat tell me wat fo do. An I tell my army guys wat fo do. I tell one guy, ‘Go,’ an he go. An I tell anodda guy, ‘Go come,’ an he come. An I tell my worka guy ‘Go do dis,’ an he do um.”
Wen Jesus hear dat, his jaw drop, an he tell all da peopo dat stay dea, “Ho! Dis guy get um! No mo no Israel peopo dat trus me lidat!”
Den da guys da captain sen go back da house, an dey see dat da worka guy come good awready.
Afta dat Jesus go Nain town. His guys an plenny odda peopo go wit him.
Wen Jesus come da town gate, da peopo from da town carry one open box wit one mahke guy inside thru da gate. His muddah one widow, an he her ony boy. Plenny peopo from da town go wit her.
Da Boss Jesus spock her, an he get pity fo her. He tell, “No cry now.”
Den Jesus go an touch da open box wit da guy inside, an da guys dat stay carry um stan dea. He tell, “Eh, brah, I tell you, sit up!”
Da mahke guy sit up, an start fo talk, an Jesus give him back to his muddah.
Erybody come real sked, an dey talk good bout God lidis, “Az one importan guy dat talk fo God come by us! God come fo take kea his peopo!”
An dey tell all dis stuff bout Jesus all ova Judea an all da place aroun dea.
Da guys dat John Da Baptiza Guy stay teach tell John all dis stuff. He tell two a his guys fo come by him,
an tell dem fo go by Jesus, Da One In Charge, an aks him, “Eh, you da guy suppose to come, o wat? O we suppose to wait fo anodda guy fo come?”
Wen dey come by Jesus dey tell, “John Da Baptiza guy wen sen us by you fo aks, ‘Eh, you da guy suppose to come, o us suppose to wait fo anodda guy fo come?’ ”
Dat time Jesus stay make plenny guys come good from all kine sick, an make da bad kine spirits no bodda plenny peopo no moa, an make plenny blind guys see.

Jesus tell um, “Go, tell John wat you guys stay hear an see. Had guys dat no can see, now dey can see. Had guys dat no can walk, now dey can walk. Had guys dat get da lepa kine sick, now dey no mo da sick. Had guys dat no can hear, now dey can hear. Had guys dat wen mahke, now dey alive! Da peopo dat no mo notting, now dey hear all da Good Kine Stuff From God dat I stay teach dem.
An if da tings I do no bodda you, den you goin stay good inside too.”
Afta John messenja guys go way, Jesus tell all da peopo bout John. “Wat you guys wen go da boonies fo see? Da wind shaking one bamboo?
Nah! Kay den, wat you guys go ova dea fo see? One guy wit fancy kine clotheses? You know wat? Da guys dat wear fancy kine clotheses an get all kine rich stuffs, dey stay inside da king palace.
If not dat, wat you guys wen go fo see? One guy dat talk fo God? Dass right! I tell you, John, he mo den jus one guy dat talk fo God.
Dis da guy da Bible talk bout befo time: ‘I goin sen my messenja guy befo you come. He goin make eryting ready fo you, befo you come ova dea.’ ”
An Jesus tell, “I like tell you guys dis: No mo nobody eva born dat mo importan den John. But even da mostes small kine guy dat get God fo his king, he mo importan den John.”
Wen da guys dat colleck tax money an all da odda peopo hear dat, dey tell, “Yeah! God erytime do da right ting!” Cuz dey wen lissen John, an he baptize dem.
But da Pharisee guys an da teachas dat teach da Rules From God, dey neva do wat God like dem fo do, an dey neva like fo John baptize dem.
Jesus tell, “But da peopo nowdays, how dem?

Dey jalike da kids dat stay sit inside da open market place, an stay yell to dea frenz, ‘Eh! Us guys play da flute fo you guys, but you guys no like dance! Us guys sing one sad funeral song, but you guys no like cry.’
Same ting, wen John Da Baptiza show up, he skip food plenny fo him pray, an he no drink wine. Dass why you guys tell, ‘He get one bad kine spirit in charge a him!’
But me, I da Fo Real Kine Guy. I come, I eat, I drink, an you guys tell, ‘You know wat? Dis guy erytime stay eat an drink! He frenz wit da tax guys, an da odda kine guys dat get one bad rep too.’
No matta wat me an John do, you guys no like! But da good guy dat get da smarts from God, da tings he do goin show proof dat he right.”
One Pharisee guy tell Jesus fo come his house fo eat. So Jesus go ova dea an sit down by da table.

Had one wahine from dat town dat do bad kine stuff an fool aroun. She hear dat Jesus stay sit inside da Pharisee guy house, an she bring one bottle da kine dey make from da alabaster kine stone, full wit perfume.
She stan behind Jesus by his feets. She stay cry, an her tears make his feets wet. Den she wipe his feets wit her hair, kiss um, an pour da perfume on top dem.

Wen da Pharisee guy dat tell um fo come see dat, he tink, “Eh, if dis guy was one guy dat talk fo God fo real kine, den he know wat kine wahine stay touch him. He know she one wahine dat do bad kine stuff.”
Jesus tell him, “Eh Simon, I like tell you someting.” Simon tell, “Yeah, Teacha? Tell me.”
“Had two guys dat owe some money to one guy dat lend money. One guy owe him five hundred piece silva, an da odda guy fifty piece silva.
Dey no can pay him back. Az why da guy tell, ‘Dass okay. Foget um.’ Wat guy you figga goin get mo plenny love an aloha fo him?”
Simon tell, “I figga da guy dat owe him moa.”
Jesus tell, “Right on.”
Den Jesus turn aroun to da wahine, an tell Simon, “You see dis wahine? I wen come inside yoa house, an you neva give me watta fo wash my feet. But she wash um wit her tears an wipe um wit her hair.
You neva tell ‘Aloha’ an give me one kiss, but wen I come inside yoa house, dis wahine no pau kiss my feets.
You neva give me olive oil fo my head fo show me respeck, but she cova my feets wit her perfume.

Az why I tell you, she wen do plenny bad kine stuff, but God let her go awready an hemo her shame fo all dat. An how come he do dat? Cuz she get plenny love an aloha fo God now, az why. Da guy dat do litto bit bad stuff, an God hemo his shame fo dat, he ony goin get litto bit love an aloha fo God.”
Den Jesus tell da wahine, “God hemo da shame awready fo all da bad kine stuff you wen do.”
An da odda guys sitting ova dea start fo talk to each odda, “Who dis guy? He even hemo da shame fo da bad kine stuff peopo do!”
Jesus tell da wahine, “Cuz you trus me, God take you outa da bad kine stuff you wen do. Go, an no worries.”
LUK.8.HPB: Afta dat Jesus go thru da big an da small towns, an he teach da Good Stuff bout how peopo can get God fo dea king. Da Twelve Guys go wit him.

An befo time Jesus make some wahines come good from da bad kine spirits an all kine sick. Dey all go too: Mary da Magdala wahine, dat had seven bad kine spirits dat take ova her befo time, but Jesus make um no bodda her no moa.
An Joanna, Chuza wife, she go. (Chuza, he da guy dat stay in charge a King Herod palace.) An Susanna, an plenny odda wahines, dey all go too. Da wahines wen use dea money fo help take kea Jesus dem.
Plenny peopo stay come by Jesus from plenny towns, an he tell um one story fo teach dem.
He tell, “You wen hear da farma guy story? He go plant seed. He throw da seeds all ova da groun fo plant. Some seeds fall down by da side a da trail. Da peopo walk on top um, an da birds eat um up.
Some seeds fall down on top da rocks, an grow, an den dry up, cuz ony litto bit watta inside da dirt.
Odda seeds fall down inside da kine bushes wit stickas. Da seeds an da bushes grow up togedda, an da bushes wit stickas choke um.
Odda seeds, dey fall down inside da good dirt, an dey grow good, an come up plenny, one hundred times mo den da farma wen plant.”
Afta dat Jesus tell, “If you guys hear dis, den lissen up real good!”
Da guys Jesus teach tell him, “Wat dis Seed story mean?”

He tell, “God let you guys know all da stuff bout how he stay king. But I tell stories fo teach da odda peopo, az why jalike da Bible tell, ‘dey see, but dey no can see fo real kine. Dey hear, but dey no can hear fo real kine.’ ”
Den Jesus tell, “Dis wat da Seed story mean. Da seed, dass wat God tell.
Da seeds dat fall down on top da trail, dass jalike da peopo dat hear. But da Devil come make um foget wat God tell, fo dem no trus God. Dass why God no can take um outa da bad kine stuff dey do.

Da seeds on top da rocks, dass da peopo dat take wat God tell, an dey stay good inside wen dey hear um. Dey trus God litto bit, but wen get hard time dey pau trus, cuz dey no mo deep root, jalike da seeds on top da rocks.

Da seeds dat fall down inside da bushes wit stickas, dass da peopo dat hear, but den dey worry plenny, an dey like come rich an get plenny stuffs, an dey like play aroun all da time. All dat stuff grab um, an choke um. Dey foget wat God tell, jalike da seeds dat no mo wheat cuz dey stay inside da bushes wit stickas.
But ho! Da seeds dat fall down inside da good dirt, dass jalike da peopo dat hear wat God tell. Dey get one good heart, do da right ting, an no give up. Dey jalike da seeds dat give good kine wheat.”
“You no light one lamp an cova um up wit one bucket, o put um unda da bed. No way! You goin put um on top one shelf fo da peopo dat come inside dea see da light.
Cuz eryting dat stay hide, bumbye God goin show um, an eryting dass hard fo undastan he goin make um mo easy fo da peopo undastan um.
Tink! You gotta lissen good! Da guy dat lissen good goin undastan plenny, but da guy dat no lissen good, God goin take away eryting he tink he know.”
Dat time Jesus muddah an braddahs come by him, but dey no can come togedda wit him cuz get choke plenny peopo ova dea.
One guy tell Jesus, “Eh, yoa muddah an yoa braddahs, dey outside, an dey like visit you.”
Jesus tell da guy, “My muddah an my braddahs, aah? Da peopo dat hear wat God tell an do um, dey da ones az my muddah an braddahs fo real kine.”
One time Jesus tell his guys, “We go da odda side a da lake.” So dey go inside da boat an start fo go out.
Wen dey put up da sail, Jesus go sleep. One big wind storm come down on top da lake, an da waves was bussing ova da boat, an make da boat almos huli. Dey get in big trouble.
Da guys wake up Jesus, an tell, “Eh, Boss! We goin mahke!”
Jesus sit up. He scold da wind an da big waves. Da storm die down, an eryting come calm.
He tell his guys, “How come you guys no trus me?”
Dey come real sked, cuz wat dey see blow dea mind. Dey tell each odda, “Eh, who dis guy? Even da wind an da waves do wat he tell um fo do!”
Dey ride boat da odda side a Galilee Lake to da Gerasa town fields.

Jesus go on top da beach. One guy from dat town come dat get some bad kine spirits in charge a him. Long time dat guy neva wear clotheses o stay inside one house, but he stay inside da caves wea dey put da mahke guys.

Plenny times befo, one bad spirit take um ova. No matta da guy get chains on his hands an feets, an anodda guy watch um real good, he still broke da chains. An da bad spirit make da guy go odda places wea nobody stay. So wen da spirit spock Jesus, da guy yell, an fall down by Jesus feet. Jesus tell da bad spirit, “Let go da guy!”
Da spirit yell, “Eh, wat you like do to me, Jesus? Da God Dass Mo Importan Den All Da Odda Gods, I know you his Boy! I beg you, no hurt me!”
Jesus tell da guy, “Wat yoa name?”
He tell, “My name ‘Army.’ ” He tell dat cuz uku pile a bad kine spirits wen take ova him.
Da bad kine spirits, dey beg Jesus plenny times fo no make um go suffa inside da Deep Dark Hole.
Had plenny pigs dat stay grind on top da hill. Da bad kine spirits beg Jesus, “If you make us no bodda da guy, we like go take ova da pigs, aah?”
Jesus tell um, “Go!”
So da bad kine spirits no bodda da guy no moa, an go take ova da pigs. An den all da pigs run down one steep hill, an fall inside da lake an drown.
Wen da guys dat take kea da pigs see wat happen, dey run go tell erybody inside da town an all ova da place wat dey wen see.

All da peopo come fo look. Wen dey come by Jesus, dey spock da guy, an he no mo da bad kine spirits now. He stay sit by Jesus feet wit clotheses on, an he tink good stuff now. An all da peopo come real sked.
Da guys dat see wat happen, dey tell da peopo bout da guy dat da bad kine spirits wen take ova, dat he stay good now.
Den all da peopo from aroun Gerasa town tell Jesus fo go way from dem, cuz dey real, real sked. So he go inside da boat an go way.
Da guy dat no mo bad kine spirits now, he beg Jesus fo him go wit Jesus, but Jesus tell him, “No, brah. No can.” Jesus tell,
“Go home. Tell how God wen help you plenny.” So da guy go way an tell all ova da town how Jesus wen help him plenny.
Wen Jesus come back, plenny peopo feel good inside fo see um, cuz dey stay wait fo him.
Had one leada guy from da Jew church, name Jairus. Right den an dea he come an go down by Jesus feet. He beg Jesus fo go his house,
cuz his ony girl, bout twelve year ol, litto mo mahke ova dea.
Wen Jesus stay go, get plenny peopo stay jam him.
An had one wahine ova dea dat stay bleed twelve year. She wen pay eryting she get to da doctas, but nobody can make her come good.
She come behind Jesus an touch his clotheses. Right den an dea she pau bleed.
Jesus tell, “Who wen touch me?”
Erybody tell him, “Not me!” Peter tell, “Boss, get uku pile a peopo aroun you, jamming agains you.”
But Jesus tell, “Somebody wen touch me. I know, cuz powa go out from inside me.”
Den da wahine know dat dey goin find out, an she come an go down by Jesus feets, sked an shaking real hard. In front all da peopo she tell how come she wen touch him, an how real fas she come good.
Jesus tell her, “Sistah, you trus me. Dass why you come good awready. Go. Now you no need suffa no moa.”
Wen Jesus still talking, one guy come from Jairus house, an tell, “Yoa girl mahke awready. No need bodda da teacha no moa.”
Wen Jesus hear dat, he turn aroun an tell Jairus, “No sked, ony trus me, an she goin come good.”
Wen Jesus come Jairus house, he ony let Peter, John, an James, an da faddah an muddah go inside wit him, an no odda peopo.
Same time all da peopo stay cry an moan fo her. Jesus tell, “No cry no moa! She not mahke, she ony stay sleep.”
An dey all laugh an make fun a him, cuz dey know she mahke.
But Jesus take her hand an tell, “Eh litto girl, sit up!”
Right den an dea her life come back an she sit up. Den Jesus tell her faddah an muddah, “Give her someting fo eat.”
Dat blow dea mind. But Jesus tell um, “Eh! No tell nobody wat wen happen, aah.”
LUK.9.HPB: Jesus tell his twelve guys fo come togedda, an he give um da right an da powa fo make all da bad kine spirits let go peopo, an make all kine sick peopo come good.
Den he sen um all ova fo tell erybody bout how dey can get God fo dea king, an fo make da sick peopo come good.
He tell um, “No take notting fo da trip; no stick fo walk, no bag, no bread, no money, no extra clotheses.
Wen you guys go somebody house, stay dea till you go way from dat town.

If da peopo inside da town no like you guys come, an no like lissen wat you guys teach, den wen you guys go outa da town, shake da dus off yoa feet fo show da peopo dea dat God no like if dey no lissen.”
So da guys go out an go from one small town to anodda, an dey teach da Good Stuff From God, an make da sick peopo all ova da place come good.
Dat time King Herod wen hear bout all dat stay happen. An he come all mix up, cuz some peopo tell John Da Baptiza Guy come back alive.
Odda peopo tell dat Elijah show up. An oddas tell dat one guy dat talk fo God long time befo time come back alive.
Herod tell, “I wen make my army guys cut off John head. Den who dis guy? I stay hear bout all da kine stuff he do.” An Herod like see Jesus.
Da guys Jesus wen sen all ova da place come back, an dey tell Jesus wat dey wen do. Den he bring dem wit him an dey go way ony dem to Betsaida town.
But all da peopo hear dat Jesus dem stay ova dea, az why dey go dea too. Jesus give da peopo his aloha. He tell um bout how dey can get God fo dea king, an he make da sick peopo come good.

Wen da sun stay go down, da twelve guys come by him an tell, “Sen all da peopo away fo dem go da small towns an odda places aroun hea an get someting fo eat an some place fo sleep, cuz ova hea no mo notting.”
Jesus tell, “You guys, go give um someting fo eat.”
Dey tell, “We ony get five bread an two fish. You like us go buy food fo all dis peopo, o wat?”
(Had bout five tousan guys ova dea.)
But he tell his guys, “Make erybody sit down, jalike fifty ova hea, fifty ova dea.”
His guys do dat, an erybody sit down.

Jesus take da five bread an da two fish. He look up da sky, an tell God “Eh God! You get one good heart fo give da peopo food!” He broke up da bread an da fish. Den he give um to his guys fo give to da peopo.
Dey all eat um, an come full. His guys pick up twelve big baskets an fill um up wit da lefovas.
One time Jesus pray in one place wea no mo nobody, an ony his guys stay dea wit him. He tell um, “So! Who da peopo figga me?”
Da guys tell, “Some guys tell you John Da Baptiza Guy. Odda guys tell Elijah. An odda guys tell you one guy dat talk fo God long time befo time, an now you come back alive.”
He aks dem, “Kay den, wat bout you guys? Who you guys figga me?”
Peter tell, “You da Christ Guy, da Spesho Guy God Wen Sen.”
Jesus tell um, “You guys betta not tell nobody dat I da Christ Guy, da Spesho One God wen sen.”

He tell, “I da Fo Real Kine Guy. I gotta suffa plenny. Da older leadas, an da Main Pries guys, an da teachas dat teach da Rules From God, dey goin figga I not Da Fo Real Kine Guy, an dey goin kill me fo dat. But day numba three, I goin come back alive.”

Den he tell all dem, “Whoeva like stay tight wit me, dey gotta make up dea mind dat dey no goin be da one in charge a dem no moa. Goin be hard, jalike dying on top one cross ery day. An den dey can stay tight wit me.
If bodda you dat you goin mahke, fo shua you goin mahke. But if you like do eryting you do fo me, an no bodda you if you mahke fo dat, den you goin live fo real kine.
Poho fo one guy get eryting inside dis world, but in da end he lose his life, an come all hamajang.

If one guy come shame a me an da tings I tell, den me, da Fo Real Kine Guy, I goin come shame a him wen I come back. Dat time I goin be awesome jalike my Faddah, wen I come back wit my spesho angel guys.
Dass true, wat I tell you guys: Some a da peopo dat stay hea now, dey no goin mahke befo dey see how stay wen God da king.”
Bout one week layta, Jesus take Peter, John, an James wit him up one mountain fo pray.
Wen he stay pray, his face change an he look real diffren. His clotheses come bright jalike da lightning.
Right den an dea two guys, Moses an Elijah, come outa no wea, an dey stay talk wit Jesus!
Dey awesome. Dey talk bout how Jesus goin do eryting dat God make one plan fo him do, cuz pretty soon he goin mahke Jerusalem side.
Peter an his frenz go sleep. But wen dey wake up, dey see Jesus, an da two guys dat stan dea wit him. An Jesus look awesome.

Wen da two guys start fo go way from Jesus, Peter tell him, “You know wat, Boss? Good we stay ova hea! We goin make three shacks, one fo you, one fo Moses, an one fo Elijah!” (He neva know wat he stay talk bout.)
Wen Peter still stay talking, one cloud come an cova um. Jesus guys come real sked.
Den one voice from inside da cloud tell, “Dis my boy, da One I wen sen. Lissen up wat he tell!”
Wen da voice pau talk, ony Jesus stay dea. Dat time da guys he stay teach neva tell nobody bout wat dey wen see.
Da nex day dey go down from da mountain, an plenny peopo come fo meet Jesus.
One guy yell, “Teacha! I beg you, look my boy, my ony boy!
Erytime one bad kine spirit take um ova, right den an dea he yell, an roll aroun on top da groun, an foam come outa his mout. Da bad kine spirit hurt him erytime, an no like let him go.
I wen beg yoa guys fo throw um out, but dey no can.”
Jesus tell, “You guys! Nowdays nobody even trus God! You guys ony know how fo do wrong stuff! How long I gotta be wit you guys an take how you guys ack? Bring da boy ova hea!”
Wen da boy stay come, da bad spirit throw him down on top da groun an da boy shake all ova. But Jesus scold da bad spirit, an make da boy come good, an give him back to his faddah.
Dat blow da peopo mind wen dey see da awesome powa God get.
Da peopo still tink plenny bout all da stuff Jesus stay do, an he tell his guys,
“No foget wat I goin tell you now! I da Fo Real Kine Guy. But goin get one guy goin set me up an turn me ova to some odda guys.”
But Jesus guys donno wat dat mean. God no let dem undastan till layta, an dey sked fo aks Jesus bout dat.
Jesus guys start fo make argue bout who da numba one guy.
Jesus know wat dey tink, so he tell one small kid fo stan by him.

Den he tell um, “Whoeva take in one small kid jalike dis kid cuz da kid my guy, dat guy take me in too. An whoeva take me in, dey take in da One dat wen sen me too. Da guy dat make jalike he small, he da one dat big fo real kine.”
John tell, “Boss, we wen spock one guy dat make da bad kine spirits no bodda da peopo no moa, an da guy use yoa name fo do um. We tell him fo no do dat, cuz he no come from us guys.”
Jesus tell him an da odda guys, “No stop him, cuz whoeva not agains you, dey fo you.”
Da time stay nea wen Jesus goin go up to da sky, an he make up his mind fo go Jerusalem.
He sen some messenja guys fo dem get tings ready fo him. Dey go inside one small town Samaria side fo find one place fo stay dat nite.
But da peopo ova dea, dey no like fo him stay dea, cuz he goin go Jerusalem, an dey no like Jerusalem peopo.
Wen his guys James an John see dat, dey tell him, “Boss, you like us tell God fo sen down fire from da sky fo kill um?”
But Jesus turn aroun an scold James an John.
An dey go anodda small town.
Jesus dem stay walk down one road, an one guy tell um, “I goin go wit you wea eva you go.”
Jesus tell him, “Da foxes get hole fo house, an da birds get nes. But me, Da Fo Real Kine Guy, I no mo no place fo lay down.”
He tell anodda guy, “Go come wit me. Be my guy.”
But da guy tell, “Firs let me go bury my faddah.”
Jesus tell, “You gotta let da guys dat no mo life inside bury dea mahke guys. But you, go tell da peopo how dey can get God fo dea king.”
Anodda guy tell, “Boss, I goin go wit you, but firs let me go back fo tell my ohana goodbye.”
Jesus tell, “Da guy dat stay plow da field, no good he look back fo see how he wen plow cuz goin come kapakahi how he plow. Dat kine guy no good fo work fo God da King.”
LUK.10.HPB: Afta dat Jesus, Da One In Charge, pick seventy-two odda guys dat he like sen out two by two, fo dem go befo him, ery town an place wea he goin go bumbye.
He tell um, “Get plenny peopo, dey jalike da crops, but ony get litto bit guys fo harves dem. So, tell Da One In Charge dat own da crops fo sen out mo guys fo bring in da harves.
Go! I sen you guys out, jalike fo sen bebe sheeps wea da wild wolfs stay.
“No take yoa money bag o odda bag o extra slippas, an no stop fo talk story wen you go down da road.
Wen you go inside one house, firs tell um, ‘I come fo tell God fo make you guys come so notting bodda you, fo all you guys inside dis house.’
If one guy wit one good heart stay dea, you goin make him stay good inside. If inside he not good, wat you wen tell goin come back to you.
Stay inside dat house, an eat an drink wateva dey give you. Cuz dass good dey give you someting fo da work you do. No move aroun from one house to anodda house.
“Weneva you come one town an da peopo like you stay ova dea wit dem, eat da food dey give you.
Make da sick peopo dat stay dea come good, an tell um, ‘God stay da King hea wit you guys now.’
“But wen you go inside one town an da peopo no like you stay dea, go down da streets an tell,
‘Da dus from yoa town dat stick on oua feet, we shake um off fo show you guys dat God no like, cuz you guys no lissen. But you betta know dis fo shua: God stay da King hea now.’

I tell you guys dis: Wen erybody stan in front God da Judge, he goin punish da peopo from Sodom town cuz dey wen do plenny bad kine stuff befo time. But goin be mo easy fo dem, den fo da peopo inside da town dat no like hear wat you guys tell!”

Jesus tell, “Bummahs, you guys from Korazin town! You goin get it, cuz you neva lissen! Bummahs you guys from Betsaida town! You goin get it too, cuz you neva lissen! Eh, I neva show da powa God get fo da Tyre an Sidon guys da way I wen show um fo you guys. Dass why dem Tyre an Sidon guys neva come sorry from long time an dey still stay do bad kine stuff. Dey neva show dey come shame fo all da bad kine stuff dey wen do, an no do um no moa. Dey neva see da powa God get da way you Korazin an Betsaida guys see um. Dass why da Tyre an Sidon peopo neva put on burmbag cloth an throw ash on top dea head, fo erybody know dey sorry. But you guys wen see da powa God get, an you still yet not sorry!
Bumbye goin be mo easy fo da peopo from Tyre an Sidon towns wen dey stan in front God da Judge, den fo you guys.
An you guys from Capernaum town, you figga God goin bring you up in da sky wit him, o wat? No way! Mo like he goin throw you guys down inside Hell, cuz you guys neva lissen!”
Jesus tell his guys, “Whoeva hear you, dey hear me too. Whoeva tell ‘Laytas’ to you, dey tell ‘Laytas’ to me too. Whoeva tell ‘Laytas’ to me, dey tell ‘Laytas’ to da One dat wen sen me.”
Da seventy-two guys come back, an dey stay real good inside. Dey tell, “Boss, even da bad kine spirits do wat we tell um fo do, cuz we yoa guys, an we use yoa name.”
Jesus tell um, “I wen see Satan, dat time God throw um down from da sky fas jalike da lightning.

Lissen! I wen give you guys da powa fo you walk on top snakes an scorpions, an you guys get da powa fo win ova da one dat stay agains us, az Satan. You guys get plenny mo powa den Satan get. An notting goin hurt you guys.
But no stay good inside jus cuz da bad spirits do wat you tell um fo do. Stay good inside cuz God get you guys names inside his book inside da sky.”

Dat time da Good An Spesho Spirit make Jesus stay real good inside. An he tell, “Faddah, you Da One In Charge all ova da sky an da world. Mahalo plenny, cuz you hide all dis stuff from da smart guys an da guys dat know plenny stuff, an you show um to da small kids. Dass wat you like do.”
Jesus tell, “My Faddah give me eryting, you know. Nobody know me da way my Faddah know me. An nobody know my Faddah fo real kine, ony me, I know him, an da peopo I like show him, dey know him too.”
Den Jesus turn aroun to his guys an tell um (but he neva tell da odda peopo), “You guys stay good inside cuz you see da stuff you see!
I tell you, Plenny kings an plenny guys dat wen talk fo God wen like see an hear da stuff you guys see an hear, but dey neva see um.”
One teacha dat teach da Rules From God stan up fo aks Jesus one question fo tes him. He tell, “Teacha, wat I gotta do fo get da real kine life dat goin stay to da max foeva?”
Jesus tell, “Tell me wat da Rules From God tell inside da Bible.”

Da teacha tell, “Go all out fo show love an aloha fo yoa God, Da One In Charge. Show yoa aloha wit eryting inside you, wit how you feel, wit how you tink, an wit all yoa powa. An go all out fo show love an aloha fo erybody jalike you get love an aloha fo you.”
Jesus tell, “Dass right! Do dat an you goin live fo real kine.”
But da guy like look good, so he tell, “Wat you mean, go all out fo show love an aloha fo erybody?”
Jesus tell, “Had one guy. He go down Jericho town from Jerusalem. Get some guys dat jump um, rip um off, bus um up, an leave um dea fo mahke.
Bumbye one Jew pries guy come on dat same road. He spock da guy, but he go da odda side a da road.
Same ting, one guy from da Levi ohana dat help da pries guys, he spock him, an go da odda side a da road too.
Den one guy from Samaria go down dat road an come wea da guy stay. He spock him, an get pity fo him.
Da Samaria guy go by him, put olive oil an wine on top wea da guy all bus up, an put bandage on him. He put da guy on top da Samaria guy donkey, an take um to one inn, an take kea him.
Da nex day, wen he leave, he give two silva coin to da inn boss an tell, ‘Take kea him, an wen I come back I pay you watevas extra fo take kea him.’
“From da three guys, who you figga go all out fo show love an aloha fo da guy dose bad guys wen bus up?”
Da teacha guy tell, “Da guy dat show pity fo him.”
Jesus tell, “You go make lidat too!”
Jesus an da guys he teach go down one road, an dey come one small town. One wahine Marta stay dea. She tell um fo come inside her house.
She get one sistah Mary, an Mary sit down by Jesus feets an lissen wat he tell.
But bodda Marta cuz ony her stay do all da work, an she come an tell, “Eh Boss, you no kea dat my sistah leave me fo do eryting? Tell her fo come help me!”
Jesus, Da One In Charge, tell Marta, “Marta! You stay bum out, bodda you bout plenny stuff!
But you ony need one ting. Mary wen pick da mo betta ting, an nobody can take dat away from her.”
LUK.11.HPB: One time Jesus stay pray in one place. Wen he pau pray, one guy he stay teach tell um, “Boss, teach us guys how fo pray, jalike John wen teach his guys.”
Jesus tell, “Dis how you pray:
“ ‘Faddah,
We like all da peopo know fo shua
How good an spesho you stay.
We like you come da king fo erybody.
Try give us da food we need fo ery day.
Let us go, an hemo oua shame
Fo all da bad kine stuff we do to you,
Jalike us guys let da odda guy go,
An us no stay huhu wit dem
Fo da bad kine stuff dey do to us.
Show us how fo no do bad kine stuff
Wen somebody give us chance fo do um.’ ”
An Jesus tell his guys, “Tink bout dis! If you go one fren house at midnite an tell um, ‘My fren, lend me three bread,
cuz my odda fren stay hea on one trip, an he come my house, an I no mo notting fo give him fo eat.’
Den if yoa fren inside his house tell you, ‘No bodda me! Da door stay lock awready, an me an my kids stay in bed. I no can get up fo give you someting.’
So, wat? I tell you, jus cuz he yoa fren, dat no mean he goin get up an give you da bread. Still yet, fo no make shame fo da town, he goin get up an give you eryting you need.
Az why I tell you guys: Go aks, an you goin get. Go look, an you goin find. Go knock, an da door goin open fo you.
All da peopo dat go aks, goin get. Da guy dat go look fo someting, he goin find um. An da guy dat go knock da door, da door goin open fo him.
If yoa boy go aks you fo one fish, you goin give um one snake? Nah!
If he go aks you fo one egg, you goin give um one scorpion? Nah!

Eh, even if you guys bad peopo, you know how fo give good kine stuff to yoa kids. Fo shua den, yoa Faddah inside da sky, he erytime good, an he goin give his Good An Spesho Spirit to you guys cuz you go aks him fo um.”

Had one guy dat get one bad kine spirit, dat make da guy so he no can talk. Jesus make da bad spirit let go da guy. Wen da bad spirit let um go, da guy dat no can talk, start fo talk. An all da peopo, dat blow dea mind.
But some guys tell, “Nah! Was Beelzebul, da main leada guy fo da bad kine spirits, you know. Beelzebul, he da one give Jesus da powa fo make dat spirit let go da guy, az why!”
Odda guys try fo trick Jesus. Dey tell um fo show dem someting awesome from God in da sky fo show proof who him.
But Jesus know wat dey tink, an he tell um, “Da country dat go agains each odda, bus up da country. Da town o da ohana dat go agains each odda, no can stay strong.

If Satan make his guys let go da peopo, den Satan stay go agains Satan. How he goin stay one strong king? I tell dis cuz you guys tell dass me make da bad kine spirits no bodda da peopo no, cuz you tink dea leada guy Beelzebul give me powa fo do dat.

You guys tell dat da leada guy fo da bad kine spirits, he da one dat give me Jesus da powa fo make da spirits no bodda da peopo no moa. Kay den. Who give yoa guys da powa fo make da bad kine spirits no bodda da peopo, aah? Az Satan give dem da powa, o wat? Not Satan, dass fo shua. Az how yoa guys goin make proof dat wat you tell bout me stay wrong.
But if I make da bad kine spirits no bodda da peopo no moa cuz I get powa from God, dat show dat God stay da king, an he stay hea now by you guys, an you guys neva know.
“If one big moke get all his knifes an clubs fo guard his house, den his stuffs stay safe.

But if one mo bigga moke come, an bus him up, he goin take away da knifes an clubs. Da firs moke wen trus da knifes an clubs, but da mo bigga moke goin rip off all da stuffs, an split um up wit his guys.
“If you no stay wit me, den you stay agains me. Da guy dat no work wit me, he ony work agains me.”

“Wen one bad kine spirit no bodda one guy no moa, dat spirit go all ova da boonies fo find one place fo res, but no can find notting. Den he figga, ‘Eh, mo betta I go back inside da guy I wen bodda befoa.’
Wen he go dea, da guy stay clean inside, jalike wen you sweep one house an fix um up.
Den da spirit go get seven odda spirits mo worse den him, an dey all go take ova da guy, an stay dea. So in da end, da guy dat get da bad kine spirit secon time come mo worse den befoa.”
Wen Jesus tell dat, one wahine from da peopo tell, “Da wahine dat wen born you an breas feed you, her da one stay good inside!”
But Jesus tell, “Da peopo dat hear wat God tell um fo do, an do um, dey da ones dat stay real good inside!”

All da peopo stay jam aroun Jesus, an he tell, “Da peopo nowdays, dey do bad kine stuff. Dey erytime like see proof dat I fo real. An dey no goin see dat kine proof. Dey ony goin see one proof jalike da proof da guy Jonah wen show befo time.

Jonah, he talk fo God long time befo time. Wat wen happen to him, wen show proof fo da peopo inside Nineveh town dat Jonah come from God. Dass jalike me, da Fo Real Kine Guy. Wat goin happen to me goin show proof fo da peopo nowdays dat I come from God.

Bumbye wen da peopo dat stay hea nowdays stan in front God da Judge, da Queen from da south side, az far away Sheba side, her goin stan up too, an show proof dat da peopo dat stay hea nowdays no lissen. Cuz befo time she come from far away fo lissen wat King Solomon tell, da one dat know wat fo do erytime. An look! Get someting mo importan den Solomon stay hea now, an da peopo still no lissen!

Wen da peopo dat stay hea nowdays goin stan in front God da Judge, da peopo inside Nineveh town goin stan up too. Dey goin show proof dat da peopo dat stay hea nowdays still yet stay do bad kine stuff. Cuz wen Jonah teach da Nineveh peopo, dey come sorry fo all da bad kine stuff dey wen do, an dey no do um no moa. Now get one guy mo importan den Jonah stay hea, an you guys still do bad kine stuff!”
“You no light one candle an hide um unda one bucket. You put um up on top one high place, aah? Den erybody dat come inside da house can see da light.

Da eye jalike one lamp fo inside yoa body. So if you get one good heart fo help peopo, dass jalike yoa eye okay an you stay all light inside. But if you one greedy buggah, dass jalike yoa eye not good an you stay all dark inside!
Make shua you get da light inside you, an you no stay dark inside.
So, if you get one good heart inside you, an you not greedy, dass jalike you get light inside you fo shua!”
Wen Jesus pau talk, one Pharisee guy tell um fo come his house fo eat. So he go inside, an sit down fo eat.
But da Pharisee guy see dat Jesus no wash hands firs befo he eat da way da Pharisee guys do um, an he tink plenny bout dat.

An Jesus, Da One In Charge, tell him, “You know, you Pharisee guys, jalike you guys clean ony da outside a da cup an da plate. But inside you, stay full a bad kine stuff, an you like stash eryting fo ony you!
You guys no tink! Da One dat wen make da outside, make da inside too!
Give stuff to da peopo dat no mo notting from da stuffs you get, an you know wat? Eryting goin come okay fo you guys, da way God see you.

“Wassamatta you Pharisee guys?! You goin get it! You guys give God ten percent a eryting, even da mint spice an da rue spice, an all da odda kine herbs. But same time, no bodda you guys if you no do da right tings, an you guys no mo love an aloha fo God. Mo betta, make shua you get love an aloha fo God, an do da right tings, an no foget da ten percent too.
“Wassamatta you Pharisee guys?! You guys goin get it! You guys erytime like fo sit down in da spesho chairs inside da Jew churches, an you like fo all da peopo talk nice to you in da open market.
“Wassamatta you guys?! You guys mahke inside, jalike da graves dat da peopo no can see. An dey walk on top um cuz dey donno get one grave dea.”
One teacha dat teach da Rules From God tell Jesus, “Eh Teacha, wen you tell dat, you talk bad bout us guys too.”

Jesus tell, “Wassamatta you teacha guys dat teach da Rules From God?! You guys goin get it! Cuz you like make all kine rules! Jalike you stack up big heavy kine stuffs on top da peopo backs, dat real hard fo carry. But jalike you guys no lif one finga fo help dem carry all dat—you no like help da peopo do wat yoa rules tell um fo do, even litto bit.
“Wassamatta you guys?! Cuz you make nice tombs fo da guys dat wen talk fo God, but was yoa ancesta guys wen kill um.
So you show you figga dass good, wat yoa ancesta guys wen do. Dey wen kill da guys dat talk fo God, an you guys make dea tombs!
Dass why God know wat he talking bout wen he tell, ‘I goin sen um guys dat talk fo me, an guys I sen all ova fo tell da Good Stuff, an dey goin kill some, an make oddas suffa.’
