So da peopo dat stay hea nowdays, dey goin get da blame fo all da guys dat peopo eva wen kill cuz dey talk fo God,

from da firs one Abel to Zekariah. Dey wen kill Zekariah right inside da open lanai fo da Temple, wit da place dat stay spesho fo God one side, an da altar da odda side. Dass right! An I like tell you guys dis: Da guys dat stay hea nowdays, dey goin get all da blame.

“Wassamatta you teachas dat teach da Rules From God?! You guys goin get it! You guys donno wat God tell, an you no let da peopo dat like know wat he tell find out. Jalike you guys take away da key fo open da door fo peopo know wat God stay tell!”
Wen Jesus go way from dat place, da teachas dat teach da Rules From God an da Pharisee guys start fo gang up on him, an try fo make him tell dem all kine stuff.
Dey like trick him wit wat he tell dem fo dem bus him.
LUK.12.HPB: Bumbye uku plenny peopo come togedda, so plenny dat dey even step on top each odda. Jesus start fo talk to his guys firs. He tell, “Watch out fo da Pharisee guys, cuz dey teach one ting an do anodda. So make shua you no come jalike dem. Dey jalike da yeast fo make bread—ony need litto bit yeast fo change da whole bread.
Cuz you know, eryting dat stay unda one cova, da peopo goin see um, an eryting dat stay hide, dey goin find out.

Wateva you tell in da dark, dey goin hear um wen come light. Wateva you wispa in somebody ear behind one door dat stay close, somebody goin yell um from da top a da house. So, no teach one ting an do anodda.”
“My frenz, I stay tell you, no sked da guys dat can kill yoa body, but afta dat, dey no can do notting mo worse den dat.
But I show you who fo come sked bout—betta come sked a God, cuz he can kill yoa body an den he get da powa fo throw you inside Hell. Yeah, I tell you, he da One you gotta come sked bout!
Five sparrows cost ony two cents, aah? But yet God no foget even one a dem.
God, he even know how much hairs you get on top yoa head. Fo him, you guys no need come sked, cuz you worth mo den plenny sparrows.
“I stay tell you guys, whoeva tell in front da peopo dat he my guy, I goin tell in front God angel guys dat I know dat guy fo real kine, cuz I da Fo Real Kine Guy.
But da guy dat tell in front da peopo dat he no like be my guy, I goin tell in front God angel guys dat he not my guy.
“Whoeva talk bad bout me, da Fo Real Kine Guy, God goin let dem go an hemo da shame fo dat. But whoeva talk bad bout da Good An Spesho Spirit, God no goin let dem go an hemo da shame fo dat.
“Wen dey bring you guys in front da Jew church peopo, o in front da leada guys, o da guys dat get plenny powa, no worry wat you goin tell.
Cuz dat time da Good An Spesho Spirit goin tell you guys wat fo tell.”
Get plenny peopo ova dea, an one guy tell Jesus, “Teacha, tell my braddah he gotta half half da stuff oua faddah wen leave us wen he mahke, an give me my share.”
Jesus tell, “Eh, who wen give me da right fo judge dat, o fo half half da stuff an give you yoa share an yoa braddah his share?”
Jesus tell da peopo, “Watch out! Make shua you no try get eryting fo ony you, cuz if you get plenny stuffs, dat no mean you goin live fo real kine!”
Den Jesus tell one story fo teach um: “One rich guy get one land, an he get plenny wheat.
He tink, ‘Wat I goin do? I no mo place fo store my wheat an odda stuffs.
I know wat I goin do! I goin bus up my store houses an make um mo big, an inside I goin store all my wheat an odda stuffs.
Den I goin tell, “Eh, fo shua I one lucky guy! I get plenny good stuffs store up fo long time. Az why I can take it easy, an eat an drink an party up!” ’
But God tell, ‘Eh brah! Wat you tinking! Tonite you goin mahke! Den who goin get all da stuffs you wen stack up?’
“Dass wat goin happen to all da peopo dat pile up big stack stuffs ony fo dem, but God see um jalike dey no mo notting.”
Den Jesus tell his guys, “Dass why I stay tell you guys, no worry bout notting, how you goin live, wat you goin eat. No worry bout yoa body, wat you goin wear.
Wat you figga? You live ony fo food? No way! An yoa body ony fo clotheses? Not even!
Tink bout da birds dat fly inside da sky. Dey no plant seed o get one crop o put um inside da storage places, but God feed dem. An you guys worth mo plenny den da birds!
Wat one a you guys can worry ony, an dat make you stay alive one mo hour?
If you no can do dat, how come you worry bout da odda stuffs?
Tink bout da flowas, how dey grow. Dey no work o make da clotheses dey wear. But I stay tell you, even King Solomon, wit all his awesome stuffs, neva get da kine awesome clotheses jalike da flowas.

Da grass inside da field stay grow one day, an dey throw um on top da fire da nex day. Eh, God give da grass da kine clotheses jalike da flowas, so garans he goin give you guys clotheses even moa. You guys ony trus litto bit!
So eh! No go worry bout wat you goin eat, o wat you goin drink. No worry bout um notting.
All da diffren peopos dat donno God, dey try get all dat kine stuff. But yoa Faddah know dat you need all dat.
Make God Da One In Charge a yoa life, cuz he da King, an he goin give you guys all dat kine stuff too.
“You guys, you jalike bebe sheeps. No sked, cuz yoa Faddah da King like give you eryting he get.

Sell eryting you get an give da money to da peopo dat no mo notting. Get da kine money bag dat no goin get puka. Make shua you get da importan kine stuff from God inside da sky, dat stay foeva. Da steala guy no can steal um ova dea, an da bugs no can eat um up.
Cuz you know, wateva kine stuffs stay da mos importan fo you, dass wat you goin go all out fo tink bout.
“Betta be ready, jalike you put on yoa clotheses an get ready fo work, an leave da light on,
jalike da worka guys dat wait fo dea boss, wen he come back from da wedding luau. Wen he come knock da door, right den an dea dey open da door fo him.

Wen da boss come back, goin be good fo da worka guys dat stay awake an watching. Dass right! An I like tell you guys dis too: Fo dem, da boss goin put on one worka clotheses, make his worka guys sit down at da table, an bring um food.
Wen da boss come back, goin be good fo da worka guys dat stay ready, no matta he show up real late nite time.
Lissen! If da guy inside da house know wat time da steala guy goin come, he no goin let um bus up da house. But if he donno, wat goin happen?
So you guys too, you betta be ready, cuz I da Fo Real Kine Guy, an wen you figga dat I no goin come back, dass wen I goin come back!”
Peter tell, “Boss, you stay tell dis story fo us guys o fo erybody?”
Den Jesus Da One In Charge tell, “If get one luna guy dat smart an his boss trus him, dass da guy his boss goin put um in charge a da odda worka guys, fo give um dea food da right time.
Wen da boss come back, dat luna guy goin stay good inside if he wen do wat da boss tell him fo do.
Dass right! An I like tell you guys dis: Da boss goin put him in charge all his stuffs.
But if da worka guy figga, ‘Long time my boss no come,’ an he beef da odda worka guys an da wahines, an he eat an drink an get piloot,

da boss fo dat guy goin come back one day wen da luna guy figga he not goin come, an one time wen da luna guy donno. Da boss goin wipe out da luna guy an sen um away wea da peopo stay dat no trus God.
“Da worka guy dat know wat his boss like, an no get ready fo do um, an no do wat da boss like him fo do, his boss goin punish him real hard.

But da worka guy dat donno wat his boss like um fo do, so he do someting bad, his boss goin ony punish him litto bit cuz da guy neva know. So, if God give you eryting you need fo work fo him, you betta do one good job fo him.
“I wen come fo bring fire on top da earth, an now I like da fire fo start.
But firs I gotta suffa plenny, an I get hard time now till dat pau.
You figga I come dis world fo help erybody come frenz an no fight? I no come fo dat, but fo make um go agains each odda.
From now, goin get five peopo in one ohana dat stay fight each odda, three agains two, an two agains three.

Dey goin stay agains each odda, da faddahs agains dea boys, an da boys agains dea faddahs, muddahs agains dea girls, an girls agains dea muddahs, muddah-in-laws agains dea daughtah-in-laws, an daughtah-in-laws agains dea muddah-in-laws.”
Jesus tell da peopo, “Wen you spock one black cloud coming up, right den an dea you tell, ‘Goin rain,’ an dass wat happen.
An wen you feel da kona wind blowing, you tell, ‘Goin come hot,’ an dass wat happen.
You guys tell one ting an do anodda! You can figga wat goin happen from da earth an da sky. How come you no can figga da tings dat stay happen now?”
“How come you no figga wat stay right fo you do?

Wen you goin go in front da judge wit one guy dat stay agains you, try fo make good wit dat guy befo you go ova dea. Cuz if you no do dat, he goin drag you in front da judge, an da judge goin give you to da police, an da police goin throw you in prison.
I tell you, you gotta pay eryting you owe befo you can come out.”
LUK.13.HPB: Dat time some peopo stay dea, an dey tell Jesus bout da peopo from Galilee dat Pilate army guys wen kill, same time dose peopo stay make one sacrifice inside da Temple.
Jesus tell, “You tink dem guys from Galilee wen do mo worse stuff den all da odda peopo from Galilee cuz dey wen suffa lidat?
I tell you, no way! But if you guys no come sorry fo all da bad kine stuff you wen do, an no do um no moa, all you guys goin mahke too.
Da eighteen guys dat wen mahke wen da towa Siloam side fall down on top um—you tink dey wen do mo worse stuff den all da odda peopo inside Jerusalem?
I tell you, no way! But if you guys no come sorry fo all da bad kine stuff you wen do, an no do um no moa, all you guys goin mahke too.”
Jesus tell um dis story fo teach um. “Had one guy dat get one fig tree dat stay grow inside his grape field. He go fo look if get fruit on um, but no mo fruit.
So he tell da worka guy dat take kea da field, ‘Three year now I stay come fo look if get fruit on dis fig tree, an no mo fig! Cut um down, fo no use up da dirt!’
But da worka guy tell, ‘Boss, leave um one mo year. I goin dig one ditch aroun um, an put fertiliza inside da ditch.
If da tree give fruit nex year, dass good! If no give fruit, den cut um down!’ ”
One Res Day Jesus stay teach inside one Jew church.
One wahine stay dea dat no can walk good. One bad kine spirit wen make her lidat eighteen year befo time. She bent ova an no can stan up strait.
Jesus spock her, an tell her, “Sistah, I make you come good from all yoa sick!”
Den he put his hands on top her, an right den an dea she stan up strait an tell how awesome God stay.

Da main leada guy fo da Jew church come huhu cuz Jesus wen make her come good on da Res Day. So, he tell all da peopo, “Get six days fo work. So, let um make you come good on dem days, an not on da Res Day!”
Jesus, Da One In Charge, tell um, “You guys tell one ting an do anodda! All you guys hemo yoa cow o yoa donkey from da fence an lead um out fo get watta on da Res Day.

But dis wahine from Abraham ohana, an was Satan wen make um fo her no walk good fo eighteen year. You no tink dass okay fo hemo her from da sick dat make her no walk good, an do um on da Res Day too, o wat?”
Wat he tell wen make all da guys dat stay agains him come shame. But da peopo stay good inside cuz a all da awesome stuff he do.
Jesus tell, “How you tink goin come wen God stay king? Wat kine story I gotta tell you guys fo help you undastan um?

Wit God, eryting start small, den come big. Dass jalike one small mustard seed. One guy take um an plant um inside his open lanai. Da small seed grow up, an come one big bush, an da birds come down outa da sky an make house inside da branches.”
An Jesus tell, “Wat you tink stay like, wen God stay king?
Make eryting come diffren, aah? Dass jalike da yeast. One wahine take um an put um inside one big bowl wit flour. Bumbye da whole bread come diffren cuz a da yeast.”
Jesus go thru da big an small towns an teach. He stay go Jerusalem.
One guy tell him, “Boss, ony litto bit peopo goin get outa da bad kine stuff dey stay in, aah?”
Jesus tell um,
“Make shua you try hard fo get God fo yoa king! You know, dass jalike you gotta go by him thru one skinny door. Plenny peopo goin try fo go inside dea, but no can.

God jalike one house owna dat eat, den go lock da door fo go sleep. Den you guys goin stan outside an start fo knock da door an tell, ‘Eh Boss, try open da door fo us!’ But he goin tell you guys, ‘I donno who you guys o wea you guys come from!’
You guys goin tell, ‘Eh! Us guys wen eat an drink wit you, an you wen teach us wen you walk down oua street.’
He goin tell one mo time, ‘I donno who you guys o wea you guys come from! Get outa hea, all you guys dat stay do wass wrong!

From wea you guys goin go, you goin see Abraham, Isaac, an Jacob, an all da guys dat wen talk fo God. Dey goin stay dea wit God da King, but God goin throw you guys outside. Den you guys goin cry an grind yoa teet cuz you so mad an futless.
But odda peopo goin come from mauka side an makai side an all ova, an dey goin sit down jalike fo one luau wit God da King.

An you know wat? Get guys dat peopo tink dey not importan now, an dey goin be da mos importan guys wen God stay king. Get odda guys dat peopo tink dey importan now, but dey no goin be importan wen God stay king.’ ”
Dat time, had some Pharisee guys dat come by Jesus an tell him. “You betta get outa hea, an go anodda place, cuz King Herod like kill you, you know.”
Jesus tell, “Go tell dat buggah dat I tell, ‘I make da bad kine spirits no bodda da peopo no moa, an I make da peopo come good today an tomorra. An day numba three, my work goin come pau.’
But I still gotta go today an tomorra an da nex day, till I get to Jerusalem. You know, befo time da Jew guys kill da guys dat talk fo God, an Jerusalem was da place dey kill um.

“Wassamatta you peopo inside Jerusalem?! You wen throw rocks an kill da guys dat talk fo God befo time. Plenny times I wen like bring all yoa kids togedda, jalike one muddah hen bring togedda her chicks unda her wings, but you guys no like come by me!

“Wassamatta you guys?! Eryting all poho fo you guys awready! I tell you guys, you no goin see me one mo time till bumbye wen you guys tell, ‘Dis da Guy dat come wit da right fo talk fo Da One In Charge, an we like God do good tings fo him!’ ”
LUK.14.HPB: One Res Day, one Pharisee guy tell Jesus fo come his house fo eat. He one main leada fo da Pharisee guys. An da Pharisee guys an da guys dat teach da Rules From God watch Jesus real good.
Get one sick guy dat show up ova dea in front Jesus. He get da kine sick dat make da arms an da legs come real fat.
Jesus tell da Pharisee guys an da guys dat teach da Rules From God, “You tink da Rules tell dass good fo make one guy come good on da Res Day, o wat?”
But dey no say notting. So he take da sick guy, an make um come good, an tell um fo go.
Den he tell dem, “If da Res Day, an one a you guys get one boy o one cow dat fall down inside one deep watta hole, you goin pull um out real fas, o wat? No matta da Res Day, aah?”
But dey no can say notting.
Jesus see dat befo dey eat, some guys ova dea wen pick da main places by da table. So he tell um dis fo teach um:
He tell, “Wen somebody tell you fo come one wedding luau, no go sit down by da place fo da spesho wedding guys. You do dat, an den one guy mo importan den you goin come.
Den da boss fo da luau dat wen tell him an you fo come, he goin tell you, ‘Give dis guy yoa place.’ Den you goin come shame wen you gotta take da place fo da guy dass not importan.

Mo betta, wen dey tell you fo come, go take da place fo da guy dass not importan. Den wen da boss fo da luau come, he goin tell you, ‘My fren, ova hea mo betta.’ Den erybody dea goin get respeck fo you cuz a dat.
Cuz whoeva make jalike he importan, no goin be importan, an whoeva make jalike he not importan, goin be importan.”

Den Jesus tell da guy dat wen tell um fo come his place fo eat, “Wen you make one lunch o one dinna, no tell yoa frenz, o yoa braddahs, o yoa ohana, o da rich guys nex door fo come. You do dat, an bumbye dey goin tell you fo come dea house, an dat goin pay you back fo wat you wen do.
Mo betta, wen you make one luau, tell da guys dat no mo notting fo come, da guys dat no can move, da guys dat no can walk, an da guys dat no can see.
Den you goin stay good inside. Cuz dem guys no can pay you back bumbye. But God, he goin give you back someting good fo wat you wen do, wen da peopo dat wen do da right tings come back alive.”
One guy dat stay sit at da table hear dat, an he tell Jesus, “Fo shua, da guys dat goin sit down at God table wen he come king, dey goin stay good inside!”
Jesus tell, “You wen hear da big luau story? He tell plenny peopo fo come.
Bumbye he sen his worka guy fo tell da peopo, ‘Go come! Eryting stay ready!’
But dey all start fo make up story. Da firs guy tell da worka guy, ‘I jus wen buy one field, an I gotta go see how stay. Sorry, aah?’
Anodda guy tell, ‘I jus wen buy ten cows fo plow, an I gotta see if dey strong enuff fo work. Sorry, aah?’
Anodda guy tell, ‘I jus wen get married, az why I no can go wit you.’

Da worka guy tell his boss. Da luna in charge wen come huhu, an tell da worka guy, ‘Hurry up! Go out by da big an small roads inside town, an bring back da guys dat no mo notting, da guys dat no can move, da guys dat no can see, an da guys dat no can walk.’
Bumbye da worka guy come back an tell, ‘We wen do wat you wen tell us fo do, an still yet get room fo mo peopo come.’
Da boss tell da worka guy, ‘Go out by da big an small roads in da country side an make da peopo come my house, fo my house come full.
I tell you now, da peopo I wen tell firs, not even one a dem goin taste my luau food.’ ”
Plenny peopo go wit Jesus. He turn aroun to dem, an tell,
“Whoeva come by me, an get mo love an aloha fo dea faddah an muddah, dea wife an kids, dea braddahs an sistahs—an even fo ony dem, if az mo den dey get love an aloha fo me, dey no can be my guy.
Whoeva no like suffa fo me, o even mahke on top one cross, dey no can be my guy too.
“If one a you guys figga you can make one towa, you betta sit down firs an figga out how much goin cost fo know if you get enuff money fo pau build da towa, aah?
If you no do dat, you goin make da foundation, an den you no can make da res. Den erybody goin bus laugh at you.
Dey goin tell, ‘Dis guy wen start fo build litto bit, but he no can pau da job.’

“If one king go out wit ten tousan army guys fo fight anodda king, an da odda king come agains um wit twenny tousan army guys, da guy wit ony ten tousan guys goin sit down firs an figga if him an his guys strong enuff fo fight da odda king an his guys, aah?
If he not strong enuff, he goin sen talka guys fo meet da odda king wen he still stay far away, an dey goin make one deal so dey no fight.”
Jesus tell, “Same ting. You guys no can be my guys if you no give up eryting you get.”
“Salt stay good. But if da salt no do wat suppose to do, no way you can make salt do wat suppose to do no moa.
Dat kine salt no good fo even da dirt o da manua pile. Ony ting can do, throw um away. If you guys hear dis, den lissen up real good!”
LUK.15.HPB: One time all da guys dat colleck tax money fo da govmen an da odda guys dat get one bad rep wen come togedda by Jesus fo lissen him.
But da Pharisee guys an da teachas dat teach da Rules From God wen squawk. Dey tell, “Dis guy get peopo wit one bad rep fo his frenz, an he even eat wit dem.”
So Jesus tell um dis fo teach um:
He tell, “Wat you figga? If one a you guys get hundred sheep, but one sheep stay lost, you goin leave da ninety nine sheep inside da boonies, an go look fo da one sheep dat stay lost, aah?
Wen you find um, you feel real good inside, an you put um on top yoa shouldas,
an go home. Den you tell all yoa frenz an da peopo nex door, ‘Go come, we go throw party! Cuz I wen find my lost sheep.’

I tell you, same ting, God an da angel guys inside da sky feel real good inside cuz one bad guy come sorry fo all da bad kine stuff he wen do, an no do um no moa. Cuz fo God, mo betta dat guy come sorry, den all da odda guys dat tink dey no need come sorry.”
“O, wat you tink? If one wahine get ten silva coin, an she lose one, wat she goin do? She goin open one lamp, den she sweep da whole house, an look real good till she find um.
An wen she find um, she goin tell all her frenz an da peopo nex door, ‘Go come, we go throw party! Cuz I wen find my lost coin!’
I tell you, same ting, da angel guys dat stay wit God feel plenny good inside, erytime one bad guy come sorry fo all da bad kine stuff he wen do, an no do um no moa.”
Jesus tell, “Had one guy dat get two boys.
Da younga boy tell his faddah, ‘Eh Daddy! Give me my share from all you get.’ Den da faddah split all he get an give da boys dea share.
“Afta dat, da younga boy get all his stuffs, sell his share an take da money, an go one far place. An ova dea he spen um all, cuz he buckaloose.
He no mo notting. An dat time no mo food in all dat country. So he get real hard time.
He go by one guy from dat country an get job, an da guy sen him out to his fields fo feed da pigs.
Da boy real hungry! He like eat da tree beans da pigs stay eat. But nobody give him notting!
“Den he wise up an figga, ‘Eh, how come?! All da guys dat work fo my faddah fo pay, dey get mo plenny food den dey can eat. Me, I real hungry ova hea, an litto mo mahke!
Mo betta I go back by my faddah. Den I can tell um, “Eh Daddy! I wen do one real bad ting agains God in da sky an agains you.
I not good enuff fo be yoa boy. Let me work fo you fo pay, an den bumbye I pay you back.” ’
Den he hele from dat place an go back by his faddah.
“He still far from da house wen his faddah spock him. His faddah heart stay fill wit pity an he run to his boy. He hug his boy an kiss him.
Da boy tell, ‘Eh Daddy! I wen do someting real bad agains God in da sky, an agains you. I not good enuff fo be yoa boy.’
“But da faddah tell his worka guys, ‘Come quick ova hea! Hurry up! Go get one robe, da bestes one, an put um on him. Put one ring on top his finga an shoes on top his feets.
Go get da bestes young cow an kill um. We goin throw one party, an make kanikapila, we go party!
Cuz dis my boy! Jalike he wen mahke, but now he come back alive! Cuz he was lost, but now we find um!’ So dey wen party.
“Da older boy, he stay work inside da fields. Den he come nea da house, an he hear da music an da dance.
So he tell one kid, ‘Eh, wassup?’
“Da kid tell, ‘Yoa braddah wen come back home, an yoa faddah tell da worka guys fo kill da bestes young cow, cuz yoa faddah wen take him in, an eryting pono now!’
“Da older braddah, he come real huhu. He no like go inside da house. So da faddah go outside an beg him fo come inside.

He tell his faddah, ‘Eh, wat you stay do! I wen work fo you jalike one slave, plenny years! I neva go agains you wen you tell me fo do someting! You neva give me notting! You neva even give me one bebe goat fo make party wit my frenz!
But dis guy, yoa boy, he wase awready all da money from yoa land fo pay da hoaz. An wen he come home, right den an dea you kill da bestes young cow fo him. An den!’
“But da faddah tell, ‘Eh boy, you erytime stay hea wit me, an eryting I get, yoas too.
But eh! good we throw party, make kanikapila, an sing an feel good inside! Cuz dis guy, yoa braddah, jalike wen mahke, but now he come back alive! Cuz he was lost, but now we find um!’ ”
LUK.16.HPB: Jesus wen teach his guys dis too: “You wen hear da luna story, bout da rich guy dat get one luna, an da luna wen spen da rich guy money on all kine stuffs?
So da rich guy tell da luna fo come by him, an he tell, ‘Eh, wat dis I hear bout you? You betta show proof how you wen spen my money, cuz you no goin be in charge no moa.’
“Da luna figga, ‘Wat I goin do now? My boss goin fire me, an I not strong enuff fo dig ditch, an I shame fo beg.
I know wat I goin do. Wen I no mo job ova hea, da peopo goin tell me come dea house.’
“Den da luna tell all da guys dat owe da rich guy money fo come by him. He tell da firs guy, ‘How much you owe my boss?’
Da guy tell, ‘One hundred barrel olive oil.’ Da luna tell, ‘Dis yoa bill. Hurry up! Sit down an write fifty barrel.’
Da luna tell anodda guy, ‘How much you owe?’ He tell, ‘One tousan basket wheat.’ Da luna tell, ‘Dis yoa bill. Write eight hundred basket.’

No matta da luna no do wass right befo time, da boss talk good to him now bout dis smart ting he wen do. You know, da peopo dat stick wit dis world mo smart wit money kine stuff den da peopo dat stick wit da light.
“I tell you, you guys go use yoa dirty money fo make frenz. Den bumbye, wen da time come dat eryting come hamajang, God goin tell you guys ‘E komo mai, come inside!’ inside his place dat stay foeva.

Whoeva do da small kine stuff he suppose to do, you can trus him fo do da big kine stuff he suppose to do too. Whoeva no do da right ting fo da small kine stuff, you no can trus him fo do da right ting fo da big kine stuff.
Az why, no matta peopo can get money fo do stuff dass not right, if you not da kine guy peopo can trus wit even dirty money, no way God goin trus you fo take kea all his rich kine stuffs.
An if nobody can trus you fo take kea odda peopo stuffs, no way God goin give you stuffs fo ony you.

“One worka guy no can do notting, if two boss guys own him same time. Bumbye he goin hate one boss an love da odda boss. He goin do good kine stuff fo one boss an tink bad bout da odda boss. You no can work fo da God dass fo real an da money god.”
But da Pharisee guys, dey love money. Wen dey hear all da stuff Jesus wen tell, dey make fun a him.
Jesus tell um, “You da guys dat tell da peopo you do da right kine stuff, but God know how you guys stay inside. Da stuff da peopo tink stay real good, dass da stuff God figga no good.”

“Had da Rules Moses wen write down, an da stuff da guys dat talk fo God wen write down, till John Da Baptiza come. Afta dat us guys tell da Good Stuff bout how peopo can get God fo dea king, an erybody push each odda fo come close, cuz dey like get God fo be dea king.
Goin be mo easy fo da sky an da earth disappea, den fo even one small word from da Rules From God fo disappea.

“Whoeva dump his wife an marry anodda wahine, dass jalike he stay fool aroun somebody dass not his wife. An da guy dat marry one wahine afta her husban wen dump her, dass jalike he stay fool aroun wit anodda guy wife.”
Jesus tell, “One time had one rich guy dat wear da rich kine clotheses an he live jalike one king.
Had one begga guy Lazarus dat get sores all ova him. Ery day his frenz put him down by da rich guy gate.
He like eat da stuff dat fall down from da rich guy table. An da dogs even come lick his sores.
“Bumbye da begga guy mahke an da angel guys carry him to da mos importan place nex to Abraham. An da rich guy mahke too, an dey bury him.
Inside Hell da rich guy suffa plenny, an he look up. He spock Abraham far away wit God, wit Lazarus by his side.
“So he yell, ‘Eh Abraham, my ancesta guy! Pity me an sen Lazarus fo dip da tip a his finga in watta fo cool my tongue, cuz I stay suffa plenny inside dis fire!’
“But Abraham tell, ‘My boy, no foget wen you was alive, you get all da good kine stuff, an Lazarus suffa all da bad kine stuff. Now he stay good ova hea wit God, an you stay suffa inside da fire.

You know, in da middo get one real big ditch. You stay on one side, an us guys stay on da odda side. Da peopo dat like go from ova hea to you no can, an da peopo dat like go from ova dea to ova hea no can too.’
“Da rich guy tell, ‘Den I beg you, cuz you my ancesta guy, sen Lazarus to my faddah house.
Cuz I get five braddahs. He gotta tell dem bout dis place, fo dem no come hea an suffa.’
“Abraham tell, ‘Yoa braddahs get da Rules From Moses, an da tings da odda guys dat talk fo God write down inside da Bible befo time. Yoa braddahs can hear wat dey tell.’
“But da rich guy tell, ‘No ways, Abraham, my ancesta guy! But if one guy come back to dem from mahke, dey goin come sorry fo da bad kine stuff dey wen do, an no do um no moa.’
“But Abraham tell, ‘If dey no lissen da Rules From Moses, an to da guys dat talk fo God, dey no goin lissen an trus God, even if one guy come back alive from mahke.’ ”
LUK.17.HPB: Jesus tell da guys he stay teach, “Tings dat make peopo do bad kine stuff goin happen, but bummahs fo da guy dat make anodda guy do bad kine stuff!
Mo betta take one big stone, tie um aroun da guy neck, an throw him inside da deep ocean fo drown, fo him no make even one a my small kids hea do bad kine stuff.
So watch out wat you do!
“If yoa braddah do bad kine stuff, scold um. If he come fo real kine sorry cuz a dat an no do um no moa, den no stay huhu wit him, but let him go.
If he do one bad ting fo hurt you seven time in one day, an he come back by you seven time, an tell, ‘I fo real kine sorry, an I no goin do dat no moa,’ den no stay huhu wit him. Let um go.”
Da guys dat Jesus, Da One In Charge, like sen all ova tell him, “Help us guys trus God moa.”
Da One In Charge tell, “If you trus God litto bit jalike one small mustard seed, you can tell dis mulberry tree, ‘Pull yoa roots up an go plant um in da ocean,’ an da tree goin do um.”
“Wat you tink? If get one worka guy dat plow da dirt fo his boss, o take kea his sheeps, wen da guy come inside from da field, you tink da boss goin tell um, ‘Come on! Eat’? No way!
Da boss goin tell, ‘Make my suppa, go get ready, an bring um all fo me fo me eat an drink. Afta dat, you goin eat an drink.’ Dass wat he goin tell um fo do.
You tink he goin tell da worka guy ‘Mahalo!’ cuz he wen do wat da boss tell um fo do? No way!
Same ting. Wen you guys go do eryting you suppose to, den you goin tell, ‘Us jus worka guys. We ony wen do wat we suppose to do.’ ”
Jesus wen go Jerusalem, an he pass by wea Samaria an Galilee come togedda.
He go inside one small town, an ten lepa guys come by him. Dey stan far away
an yell, “Jesus, Boss, pity us!”
Jesus see um an tell um, “Go tell da pries guys check you guys out.” An wen dey stay go, dey come clean from dea sick.
One a da guys see dat he wen come good. He come back, an tell good stuff bout God wit one loud voice.
He go down by Jesus feets, an tell him “Mahalo plenny!” He one guy from Samaria.
Jesus tell, “Get ten guys dat come clean from dea sick, aah? Wea da odda nine?
How come da odda guys no come back an tell how awesome God stay, ony dis one guy dat not one Jew?”
Den Jesus tell da guy, “Stan up! Go! You wen trus me, dass how you wen get outa trouble.”
One time, da Pharisee guys go aks Jesus wen God da King goin come an take ova. Jesus tell, “Wen God da King take ova, no goin get sign notting fo tell peopo wass goin happen.
An da peopo no goin tell, ‘Eh! He stay ova hea!’ o ‘Eh! He stay ova dea!’ Cuz God awready stay in charge a da peopo.”
Den he tell da guys he teaching, “Eh, you know, I Jesus, da Fo Real Kine Guy. Goin get one time, wen you guys goin figga, ‘Eh! Fo real kine, I like see Jesus come back now!’ But you no goin see me.
Da peopo goin tell you, ‘Eh! He stay ova hea!’ o ‘Eh! He stay ova dea!’ But no lissen, no go wit dem.
Cuz I da Fo Real Kine Guy, an wen I come back, goin be real fas, jalike wen da lightning flash an make da sky come light from one side to da odda side.
But firs I gotta suffa plenny, an da peopo dat stay nowdays no goin take me in.
“I da Fo Real Kine Guy, an wen I come back, goin be jalike befo time wen Noah stay.
Dat time da peopo wen eat an drink, dey marry an give dea girls fo marry, till da day Noah go inside da big boat. Den da big watta come an kill all da odda peopo.
Goin be jalike wen Lot wen stay. Erybody stay eat an drink, buying stuff an selling um, planting seed, an building house.
But da day Lot wen go way from Sodom, fire an sulfur come down from da sky on top dem an kill um all.
Dass how goin be wen I show up, me, da Fo Real Kine Guy.
“Dat time if one guy stay res on top his flat roof house, he betta not go inside fo get his stuffs. Same ting, da guy inside da field betta not go back fo get someting.
Tink bout Lot wife!
Whoeva try hang on to his life goin lose um. An whoeva give up his life goin hang on to um.
I stay tell you guys, dat nite wen I come, two peopo goin stay in one bed. God goin take one, an leave da odda.
Two wahines goin stay grind fo make da wheat flour togedda. God goin take one, an leave da odda.
[Two guys goin stay inside one field. God goin take one, an leave da odda.]”
Den da guys Jesus stay teach tell, “Wea, Boss?”
Jesus tell, “Wen dat happen, you guys goin know wea I stay. Jalike erybody know wea get someting mahke, cuz dass wea da scavenja birds come togedda.”
LUK.18.HPB: Jesus tell his guys one story fo show dem dat dey gotta pray erytime an no give up.
He tell, “Inside one town, had one judge dat no sked God an no mo respeck fo da peopo.
Had one widow ova dea inside dat town dat stay come by da judge fo beg him, ‘Try make tings right fo me! Cuz get one guy dat stay rip me off.’
Long time da judge neva like do notting. Den in da end he figga, ‘No matta I no sked God an I no mo respeck fo da peopo,
dis widow stay bodda me, az why I goin make tings right fo her, so she no come no mo an wear me out!’ ”
Den Jesus, Da One In Charge, tell his guys, “Tink bout wat da judge tell, dat neva like do da right ting.
You guys tink God no goin make tings right fo da ones he wen pick, wen dey stay beg him day time an nite time? You tink he goin take long time fo help dem?
I stay telling you, he goin make tings right fo dem real fas. But I da Fo Real Kine Guy, an wen I come back, you tink I goin find peopo dat trus God hea on top da earth, o wat?”
Jesus tell one story to da guys dat stay shua dey da good guys but all da odda guys, dey da bad guys.
He tell, “Two guys wen go da Temple Fo God fo pray, one Pharisee guy, an one guy dat colleck tax money fo da govmen.

Da Pharisee guy stan up an pray ony fo him lidis, ‘God, mahalo plenny dat I no stay jalike da odda guys, da guys dat steal, no do da right ting, fool aroun da odda guy wife, an even jalike dis guy hea dat colleck tax money.
Two time ery week, I no eat so I can pray, an I give da Temple ten percent from all da money I get.’
But da guy dat colleck tax money wen stan up far away. He no even like look up to da sky, but he beat on his ches an tell, ‘God, I one guy dat wen do bad kine stuff. Give me chance!’ ”

Jesus tell, “I tell you, wen dis tax guy go home, he get um right wit God awready. But not da Pharisee guy. Cuz whoeva make jalike he importan goin come not importan, an whoeva make jalike he not importan goin come importan.”
Da peopo bring dea small kids by Jesus, cuz dey like fo him put his hands on top dea heads an pray fo dem. Wen Jesus guys see dat, dey scold da peopo cuz dey do dat.
But Jesus tell da kids fo come, an he tell, “Let da small kids come by me, an no tell um no can, cuz da peopo dat get God fo dea king, inside dey jalike dese kids.
Dass right! An I like tell you guys dis too: Whoeva no make God come his king jalike one small kid make um, God no goin come his king.”
One leada guy wen tell him, “Teacha, you good. Wat I gotta do fo get da real kine life dat goin stay to da max foeva?”
Jesus tell um, “How come you tell me good? Ony get One dat stay good, dass God.
You know da Rules From God: ‘No go fool aroun da odda guy wife, no go kill nobody, no rip off nobody, no bulai any kine bout nobody, show respeck fo yoa faddah an muddah.’ ”
Da guy tell, “Ho, Teacha! From small kid time I stay do all dat stuff.”

Wen Jesus hear dat, he tell him, “Ony one mo ting you neva do dat you gotta do. Go sell all da stuffs you get, an give da money to da peopo dat no mo notting. Den garans you goin get plenny good kine stuffs inside da sky. Den come wit me fo be my guy.”
Da guy hear dat, an he come real sad, cuz he get plenny rich stuffs.
Jesus look at him an tell, “Az why hard fo one rich guy fo get God fo his king!
Az mo easy fo one camel go thru da puka in one needle, den fo one rich guy fo get God fo his king.”
Da peopo dat wen hear him, dey tell, “If dass how gotta be, den who can get outa da bad kine stuff dey stay in?”
Jesus tell, “No mo nobody dat can do dat, but ony God, he da One dat can do um all.”
Den Peter tell, “Eh Boss, look! Us guys wen leave eryting we get fo go wit you.”
Jesus tell, “Az right! An I tell you, erybody dat leave his home o wife o braddahs o faddah an muddah o kids fo God da King,
he goin get plenny mo now in dis time, an bumbye he goin get da real kine life dat goin stay to da max foeva!”
Jesus take his twelve guys by da side a da road, an tell um, “Eh, lissen, us goin go Jerusalem. I da Fo Real Kine Guy, an eryting da guys dat wen talk fo God befo time wen tell bout me, goin happen.
Dey goin turn me ova to da guys dass not Jew guys. Dey goin make fun a me, an talk any kine to me, an spit on me, an whip me hard, an kill me.
But day numba three, I goin come back alive.”
Jesus guys, dey neva know wat he mean. Jalike someting stay hide from dem.
Jesus come Jericho town, an one blind guy stay sit an beg by da side a da road.
Da blind guy hear all da peopo pass, an he tell um, “Wass happening?”
Dey tell him, “Jesus from Nazaret stay pass.”
Den he yell, “Jesus! You King David boy! Pity me an give me chance!”
Da peopo in front scold him an tell him fo shut up. But he yell mo loud, “David boy! Pity me an give me chance!”
So Jesus stop an tell da peopo fo bring da blind guy by him. Wen he come nea, Jesus tell him,
“Wat you like me do fo you?”
He tell, “Boss, I like see.”
Den Jesus tell him, “See den! You wen trus me. Az why now you see.”
Right den an dea da guy see, an he go wit Jesus, talking bout how awesome God. Wen all da peopo see dat, dey tell God “Mahalo plenny!” an talk good bout him.
LUK.19.HPB: Jesus go inside Jericho an go pass right thru da town an neva stop.
Ova dea get one boss Zakkeus fo da guys dat colleck tax money fo da govmen. He one rich guy.
Zakkeus like see wat Jesus look jalike, but he no can see um, cuz he short, an get plenny odda peopo dat like see Jesus too.
So he run in front, climb one fig tree fo see um, cuz Jesus goin go by dat place.
Wen Jesus go by dea, he look up an tell Zakkeus, “Go come down, Zakkeus. I gotta stay yoa house today.”
So Zakkeus come down real fas, an take Jesus inside his house. Zakkeus feel real good inside bout dat.
All da peopo see wat happen, an start fo squawk. Dey tell, “Jesus wen go inside da house a dat guy dat get one bad rep!”

Zakkeus stan up an tell da Boss Jesus, “Look, you Da One In Charge! I goin give half a my stuffs to da peopo dat no mo notting, an whoeva I wen rip off, I goin pay um back four times mo den wat I wen get.”
Jesus tell um, “Da guy dat own dis house, he from Abraham ohana. Today God take him outa all da bad kine stuff he stay do.
Cuz me, da Fo Real Kine Guy, I wen come hea fo look fo da guys dat stay cut off from God, fo take um outa da bad kine stuff dey stay do.”
Da peopo hear wat Jesus tell. Den Jesus tell um anodda story, cuz he stay nea Jerusalem, an da peopo figga dat God goin come king real fas ova dea.
Jesus tell, “Had one alii dat wen go one far place fo come king an den come back.
Befo he go, he call ten worka guys fo come. He give all dem one gold coin. He tell, ‘Go use dis coin fo make money till I come back.’
But da peopo hate da alii guy, an dey sen guys to da odda place fo tell, ‘We no like dis guy fo come oua king.’
“But da alii guy come king. Den he come back. He tell his worka guys fo come by him, da guys he wen give da money to. He like find out how much money dey wen make.
Da firs guy come an he tell, ‘I wen get ten mo gold coins from da one you wen give me.’
Da king tell him, ‘Dass good! You one good worka. Cuz you wen show I can trus you wit da small kine stuff, you goin take charge a ten towns.’
Da nex guy come an he tell, ‘Boss, I wen get five mo gold coins from da one you wen give me.’
Da king tell him, ‘You goin take charge a five towns.’
Den anodda worka guy come an he tell, ‘Boss, hea yoa gold coin. I wen go hide um inside one cloth.
I sked you, cuz you one hard guy. You take wat not yoas, an you harves da crop dat you neva plant.’
Da boss tell, ‘Bummahs! I goin make jalike one judge. Wat you tell show you one bad worka! You know I one hard guy. I take wat not mines, an I harves da crop dat I neva plant.
How come you neva put my money inside da bank, fo wen I come back I get my money an mo too?’
Den he tell da guys dat stay stan dea, ‘Eh, take away da gold coin from dis guy an give um to da guy dat get ten coin.’
Dey tell, ‘Az not fair, Boss! Dat guy get ten coin awready!’
Da king tell, ‘I tell you, whoeva get stuff, dey goin get mo plenny, but whoeva no mo notting, dey goin lose even da litto bit dey get.
Da guys dat stay agains me an no like me fo come dea king—bring um ova hea, an kill um in front me.’ ”
Jesus tell dat, an den he go Jerusalem in front da peopo.
Wen he come nea Betpage an Betany, by da Olive Ridge, he sen two a his guys in front, an tell um,
“Go by da small town ova dea, an wen you go inside um, you goin find one young donkey stay tie to da fence, dat nobody wen ride um yet. Hemo da rope from da fence an bring um ova hea.
If somebody tell you guys, ‘Eh, how come you hemo um from da fence?’ tell him, ‘Da Boss need um.’ ”
Da guys go, an find um jalike he tell.
Wen dey hemo da rope from da fence fo da young donkey, da ownas tell, “How come you hemo um from da fence?”
Dey tell, “Da Boss Jesus need um.”
Dey bring da young donkey by Jesus, an put dea coats on top da donkey, an put Jesus on top.
Jesus ride down da road. Da peopo put down dea coats on top da road jalike fo one king.
Wen he come nea da place wea da road come down from da Olive Ridge, all da peopo start fo feel good inside an yell good stuff bout God, cuz a all da awesome stuff dey wen see dat show Jesus powa.
Dey tell,
“God goin do plenny good kine stuff fo dis guy!
He da King dat come fo Da One In Charge!
Eryting stay good wit God an da peopo.
God in da sky, he awesome!”
Den some Pharisee guys from da peopo tell Jesus, “Teacha, scold yoa guys! Not good, how dey talk!”
Jesus tell, “I tell you, if dey shut up, even da stones goin yell same ting.”
Jesus come nea Jerusalem an look da town, an he cry.
He tell, “You guys inside Jerusalem, if ony you guys wen know today wat can make you guys so notting bodda you—but now you guys no undastan.
Da time goin come wen da guys dat stay agains you guys goin pile up dirt all aroun yoa town wall fo attack you guys.
Dey goin wipe out you guys, you an yoa kids inside dea. Dey not goin let one stone stay on top da odda. Cuz you guys neva like know wen God goin show up.”
Den Jesus reach Jerusalem. He go inside da open lanai fo da Temple, an start fo throw out da guys dat stay sell stuff inside dea.
He tell, “Da Bible tell, ‘My Temple goin be one house fo pray inside.’ But you guys stay make um jalike one hangout fo crooks!”
From den, ery day Jesus teach inside da open lanai fo da Temple. Da Main Pries guys, da teachas dat teach da Rules From God, an da leadas fo da peopo like kill um,
but dey neva find out how fo do um, cuz all da peopo like hear eryting he tell.
LUK.20.HPB: One time Jesus go inside da open lanai fo da Temple, an teach da peopo da Good Stuff From God. Da Main Pries guys, da teachas dat teach da Rules From God, an da older leadas fo da peopo go by him.
Dey tell um, “Wat right you get fo do dis kine stuff? Who tell you can do um?”
Jesus tell um, “I like aks you guys one question too.
John Da Baptiza, wen he wen baptize da peopo, wea he get da right fo do dat? God in da sky, he give um da right? O da peopo, dey give um da right?”

Da Main Pries dem start fo squawk wit each odda bout dat, an tell, “If we tell, ‘Was God in da sky wen give John da right,’ den Jesus goin tell, ‘How come you guys neva stay shua az fo real kine wat John tell, den?’
But if us tell, ‘Da peopo give um da right,’ den all da peopo goin throw stones fo kill us, cuz dey figga fo shua dat John wen talk fo God.”
So da Main Pries dem tell, “We donno wea John wen get da right fo baptize.”
Jesus tell um, “Kay den, I no goin tell you guys from wea I get da right fo do dis kine stuff.”
Jesus tell da peopo anodda story fo teach um. He tell, “One guy wen plant grapes inside one grape farm, an he rent um to some farma guys. Den he go way long time.
Wen da time come fo harves da grapes, he sen one worka guy by da guys dat rent his farm, fo dem give him some grapes. But da guys dat rent da farm bus up da worka guy an sen um away wit notting.
He sen anodda worka guy, an dey bus him up too, an dey no shame fo make any kine to him, an sen um away wit notting.
Den he sen anodda guy. Dey bus him up an make um bleed, an throw um outside.
Den da boss fo da grape farm tell, ‘Wat I goin do? Eh, I know wat! I goin sen my ony boy, da one I love. Fo shua, dey goin show respeck fo him!’
But wen da guys dat rent da farm spock him, dey tell each odda, ‘Eh, dis da owna boy. He da guy goin own da farm bumbye. Go come, we go kill him. Den eryting he get goin come ouas!’
So dey throw him outside da grape farm an kill um.”
Den Jesus tell, “Wat you guys figga da guy dat own da grape farm goin do to da guys dat rent da farm?
Fo shua he goin come wipe um out, an rent da grape farm to odda guys.”
Wen da peopo hear dat, dey tell, “Nah! Fo shua no goin happen lidat!”
Jesus look dem in da eye an tell, “Den wat dis mean inside da Bible dat tell,
“ ‘Had one big stone,
Da builda guys neva like use um,
An dey tell dis rock, no good!
But dat stone,
Dass da corna block
Dat make da building strong.’
“Anybody dat trip an fall down on top dat stone, da stone goin broke dem. If dat stone fall down on top somebody, dat stone goin make um jalike dus. An dat stone, dass me!”
Da teachas dat teach da Rules From God an da Main Pries guys like sen da police guys fo bus Jesus right den an dea, cuz dey know dat he tell dat story fo teach bout dem. But dey sked da peopo.

So dey look fo da right time fo do um. Dey sen some secret guys fo watch him. Dem guys wen ack jalike dey good guys. Dey like trick Jesus wit wat he tell, fo dem bus him an turn him ova to da leada guys an to da govna, da one dat get da powa.
Az why da guys dat stay watch him tell him, “Eh, Teacha, we know dat you talk fo real kine an wat you tell an teach stay true. You do da same to erybody, an you teach God way fo real kine.
So, wat? We still gotta pay tax to Cesar, da king fo da Rome peopo, o wat?”
Jesus know dey smart an trying fo trick him, so he tell um,
“Show me one coin. Who dis guy on top da coin? An wass his name?”
Dey tell, “Dass King Cesar.”
Jesus tell, “Kay den, give um to Cesar wat his, an give to God wat his!”
Dey no can trick him wit wat he tell in front da peopo. Wat he tell blow dea mind, an dey no can say notting.
Get Sadducee guys dat tell nobody can come back alive afta dey mahke. Some a dem Sadducee guys wen come by Jesus an go aks him,
“Eh, Teacha, Moses wen write fo us inside da Bible, dat if one guy braddah mahke an his widow stay, but no mo kids, da mahke guy braddah gotta marry da widow fo get kids fo his braddah.
Kay den, had seven braddahs. Da firs braddah wen marry one wahine an den mahke, an no mo kids.
Da numba two braddah marry da firs braddah widow, den he mahke, an no mo kids.
An da numba three braddah same ting, an da oddas too, an no mo kids.
Den afta dat, da wahine mahke too.
So, dey all wen marry her. Bumbye, wen da time come wen all da peopo dat wen mahke goin come back alive, dat time, who goin be her husban?”
Jesus tell um, “Da peopo in dis time marry an give dea girls fo marry.

But God tell some peopo get um right wit him. Dey da ones, he goin make um come back alive inside da nex world, an give um da kine life dat goin stay to da max foeva! Dat time dem guys no goin marry o give dea girls fo marry.
Dat time dey no can mahke, but dey goin stay jalike da angel guys. Cuz dey God kids, an dey goin come back alive.

Now, long time befo time, wen Moses wen spock one bush dat stay burn, he wen talk to God ova dea. Moses wen use dis name fo Da One In Charge Up Dea Inside Da Sky—he call um ‘Da God fo Abraham, Isaac, an Jacob.’ Dass how Moses wen show proof dat da mahke peopo goin come back alive.
Cuz God not da God fo da mahke peopo, but fo da peopo dat stay alive. Cuz erybody dat stay tight wit God, dey alive!”
Some teachas dat teach da Rules From God tell, “Dass good wat you tell, Teacha!”
An nobody aks him fo mo stuff no moa.
Jesus tell da teachas dat teach da Rules From God, “How come dey tell dat da Spesho Guy God Sen, he David boy?
Cuz David, he tell dis inside da Songs Fo God Book:
“ ‘Da One In Charge Up Dea Inside Da Sky,
He tell Da One In Charge a me,
“Go come ova hea, sit down!
Dis da importan place by my right side.
Bumbye I goin make da peopo dat go agains you
Go down in front you,
Fo show dat you da winna ova dem.” ’
“Kay den, David call him ‘Da One In Charge a me,’ aah? Den how come dat guy can be David boy, same time?”
Da peopo stay lissen Jesus, an he tell his guys,

“Watch out fo da teacha guys dat teach da Rules From God. Dey like go aroun an wear fancy kine religious kine clotheses. Dey like da peopo fo talk to dem wit respeck inside da open market. Dey like sit in da main place inside da Jew churches, an da main place at da luaus.

But dey no shame fo rip off da widows an take away dea house. Same time dey make one big show an pray long time, ony fo make peopo tink dey do good kine stuff fo dem. Dese kine peopo, dey goin get it mo worse from God da Judge wen da time come!”
LUK.21.HPB: Jesus look up an spock da rich guys putting dea money inside da money box inside da Temple.
Den he spock one widow dat no mo notting. She put two small coppa coins inside dea.
He tell, “I tell you guys da trut: Dis widow dat no mo notting, she wen put in mo plenny money den all da odda peopo.
All da odda peopo wen give dea money from plenny money dey get. But her no mo notting, yet she wen give God da ony money she get fo stay alive.”
Some a his guys talk story bout da Temple, how da Temple get da awesome stones an da odda tings da peopo wen give fo God. Jesus tell,
“You guys see all dis stuff? Bumbye no goin get one stone on top anodda. Eryting goin fall down.”
Jesus guys tell him, “Teacha, wen all dat kine stuff goin happen? An wat kine ting goin happen fo show us wen da time come fo dat?”
Jesus tell um, “Watch out! No let nobody bulai you guys! Plenny guys goin show up an use my name. Dey goin tell, ‘Eh me, I dat Spesho Christ Guy from God! Da time stay now!’ But no go wit dem.
You guys goin hear, ‘Dey fighting an get war all ova da place.’ No come bum out. All dat kine stuff gotta happen, but dat no mean eryting goin come pau yet.”
He tell, “Countries goin fight each odda. Kings goin fight each odda.

Da groun goin shake. No goin get food, an all ova da place da peopo no goin get notting fo eat. Plenny peopo goin get real sick an mahke. Real bad an awesome stuff goin come dat goin make plenny peopo come real sked. Unreal stuff from da sky goin come.

“Befo all dat stuff happen, peopo goin grab you guys an make you suffa. Dey goin turn you guys ova to da Jew churches an throw you guys inside jail. Dey goin bring you guys in front kings an govnas. Dey goin do all dat cuz you my guys.
Den you guys goin get chance fo tell dem da Good Stuff From God.
“But befo dat happen, go figga lidis: You guys no need worry wat you goin tell.
Cuz I goin give you guys wat fo tell, an I goin make you guys know wat fo do erytime, so da guys dat stan up agains you no goin know wat fo tell, an dey no goin show proof dat you guys wen do wrong.
“Even yoa faddah an muddah goin set you guys up. Yoa braddahs, yoa ohana, an yoa frenz goin set you guys up too, an dey even goin kill some a you guys.
Erybody goin hate you guys cuz dey know you my guys.
But dey no goin hurt you guys. You guys no goin lose even one hair from yoa head!
If you guys hang in dea to da end, you guys goin get da kine life dass fo real!
“Wen you guys see Jerusalem town wit da army guys all aroun dea, you goin know dat da time stay nea wen dey goin bus up Jerusalem.
Den da peopo dat stay Judea side gotta run to da mountains. Da guys inside Jerusalem town gotta get out, an da guys inside da boonies betta not go back town.
Cuz da time stay dat dey gotta suffa plenny, jalike da Bible tell.
Goin be hard time fo da hapai wahines an da muddahs dat stay breas feed dea bebes! Erybody in da land goin suffa plenny, cuz God had it wit da bad kine stuff da peopo wen do.
Peopo goin kill some wit swords, an take oddas away. Peopo all ova da world goin make um prisonas. Da peopos dass not Jew guys goin bus up Jerusalem an walk all ova um, till dea time pau.

“Goin get awesome stuff fo see up inside da sky, wit da sun, da moon, an da stars. All ova da world, da peopos from inside da diffren countries goin suffa plenny. Dey goin come all bum out, jalike peopo feel wen da ocean poun loud an da waves come real high.
Da peopo goin pass out cuz dey so sked. Dey sked cuz dey donno wat goin happen inside da world. Da big powas inside da sky jalike da stars goin get shake up.
Dat time dey goin spock me, da Fo Real Kine Guy, stay coming inside one cloud wit plenny powa, an I goin be real awesome.
Wen all dat stuff start fo happen, stan up tall an look up. Cuz da time stay nea fo God cut you guys loose from da powa da bad kine stuff get ova you.”
Jesus tell um anodda story fo teach um. He tell, “Look da fig tree an ery kine tree.
Wen get new leaf, you can see um, an you know da summa time almos come.
Same ting, wen you guys see all dis stuff happen, den you goin know dat God stay da King hea now.
“Dass right! An I tell you guys dis too: All dat stuff goin happen befo all da guys dat stay alive now goin mahke.
Da sky an da earth goin go way, but wat I tell no goin go way, eva.
“Watch out! No good you guys come all jam up wit too much partying, getting piloot, an worrying bout all kine stuff. No good Da One In Charge come back, an you guys not ready.
Fas like one trap dat day goin come fo all da peopo dat stay inside da whole world.
Watch out all da time, an stay ready. Tell God fo let you get outa all da stuff dat goin happen, an fo let you stan in front me, da Fo Real Kine Guy.”
Ery day Jesus teach inside da open lanai fo da Temple. Wen da sun go down, he go outside da town fo stay on top da Olive Ridge.
An real early in da morning da peopo come fo hear him teach inside da open lanai fo da Temple.
LUK.22.HPB: Da time come fo da Passova, an da spesho religious kine ceremony dey call Da Bread Dat No Mo Yeast time.
Da Main Pries guys an da teachas dat teach da Rules From God wen tink plenny how dey can kill Jesus. But dey sked da peopo.
Den Satan take ova Judas Iscariot, one a Jesus twelve guys.
So Judas go talk to da Main Pries guys, an da officers fo da Temple, fo see how he goin set Jesus up.
Da Main Pries dem wen feel real good inside, an dey tell dey goin give Judas money fo do um.
Judas, he like da deal. Az why he look fo one chance fo set Jesus up fo dem so nobody know.
Da day fo da Bread Dat No Mo Yeast come, wen dey kill da bebe sheep fo da Passova sacrifice.
Jesus sen Peter an John. He tell, “Go make ready da Passova food fo us eat.”
Dey tell, “Wea you like us make um ready?”
Jesus tell, “Wen you guys go inside town, one guy goin come dat carry one watta jug. Go wit him inside one house,
an tell da guy dat own da house, ‘Da Teacha tell, “Wea da room me an my guys goin eat da Passova food?” ’
He goin show you guys one big room upstairs, dat get eryting. Make da food ready dea.”
Da guys go an dey find eryting jalike Jesus wen tell. An dey make da Passova food.
Wen da time come, Jesus sit down at da table wit da guys he goin sen all ova bumbye.
He tell um, “I stay tink plenny bout dis. I fo real like eat dis Passova food wit you guys befo I suffa.
Fo shua, afta dat, I no goin eat um one mo time till God da King come an take ova.”
Den Jesus take da cup, an tell God “Mahalo” an tell da guys, “Take dis an pass um down to da oddas.
Fo shua, I no goin drink notting from da grape plant from now till da day God da King come an take ova.”
Den he take da bread, an tell God “Mahalo,” an broke um up, an give um to dem. He tell, “Dis hea, my body dat I give up fo you guys. From now, tink bout me erytime you eat dis.”
Same ting, afta dey pau eat, he pick up da spesho cup an tell, “Dis cup, da New Deal I goin make wit my blood dat I goin bleed out fo you guys wen I mahke.
But you know, da guy dat goin set me up stay hea wit me at da table.
I da Fo Real Kine Guy, an I goin mahke jalike God tell, but bummahs da guy dat goin set me up!”
An da guys go aks each odda, “Who da guy goin do dat?”
Da guys stay talk wit each odda. Dey tell, “Wat one a us guys you figga goin be da main guy?”
Jesus tell, “Da kings fo da diffren peopos, dey boss aroun dea peopo. Dey da guys dat run da peopo, an erybody tell da kings dey good guys cuz dey stay help dea peopo.
But you guys, no be lidat. Wit you guys, da main guy gotta be jalike one small kid, an da one in charge gotta be da one dat work fo all da oddas.

Who you guys figga da main guy? Da guy dat stay sit by da table o da guy dat bring him da food? You figga da guy dat sit by da table? But me, I not lidat. You know, I stay wit you guys, but I work fo you guys.
“You da guys dat wen stay tight wit me wen I suffa plenny.
I goin make you guys come kings jalike my Faddah wen make me one king.
You guys goin eat an drink by my table wen I come da King, an you guys goin sit down on top thrones, an come judges fo da twelve Israel ohanas.”

Den Jesus tell Peter, “Eh, Peter, lissen up! Satan wen tell God fo give all you guys one big tes. Jalike one farma guy take da junk outa da wheat, Satan like find out who trus me fo real kine an who not.
But I wen tell God fo help you, Peter, so you trus God an no give up. Afta you come sorry an come back by me, kokua yoa braddahs.”
But Peter tell, “Eh, you Da One In Charge, an I stay ready fo go prison an mahke wit you.”
Jesus tell, “I tell you, Peter, befo da roosta crow early today, three time you goin tell dat you donno who me.”
Den Jesus tell dem, “Wen I wen sen you guys out befo time, an you no mo money bag, o bag fo yoa clotheses, o slippas, you neva need notting moa, aah?”
Dey tell, “No.”
Jesus tell, “But now, whoeva get one money bag o one bag fo clotheses, take um. An da guy dat no mo sword, good he sell his coat fo buy one sword.
Cuz I stay tell you, da place inside da Bible dat tell, ‘Dey wen put him wit da crooks,’ dass da way gotta happen to me. Wat da Bible wen tell bout me befo time, eryting stay happen jus lidat.”
Dey tell, “Eh Boss, get two swords ova hea awready.” He tell um, “Dass enuff.”
Jesus go da Olive Ridge, jalike he erytime go. His guys go too.
Wen dey come dea, he tell um, “Go aks God fo help you guys fo no do bad kine stuff wen get chance.”
Den he go litto bit mo down ony him. He go down on his knees, an tell God fo help him
like dis: “Faddah, if you like, no let me suffa lidis. But gotta be da way you like, not da way I like.”
[One angel guy from Da One In Charge Up Dea Inside Da Sky show up by Jesus an kokua him.]
Jesus suffa plenny, an pray mo hard. He sweat jalike blood drip down on top da groun.
Wen Jesus pau pray, he stan up an go back by his guys, an find dem all sleeping. Dey wore out, cuz dey sad.
He tell dem, “How come you guys stay sleeping? Get up an tell God fo help you guys no do bad kine stuff wen get chance.”
Wen Jesus still stay talking, plenny peopo come ova dea. Judas, one a Jesus twelve guys, he bring dem. He come by Jesus fo kiss him.
But Jesus tell him, “Judas, I da Fo Real Kine Guy. Wot! You goin set me up wit one kiss?!”
Wen Jesus guys figga wat goin happen, dey tell, “Boss, you like us wack dem wit oua swords?”
Den one a dem go afta one guy dat work fo da Main Pries Guy, an cut his right ear off.
But Jesus tell, “No do dat no moa!” An he touch da guy ear an make him come good.

Den Jesus tell da Main Pries guys, da captains fo da Temple guards, an da older leadas dat come ova dea fo take him, “You guys tink I one crook o wat? How come you guys tink you gotta come ova hea wit swords an clubs fo bus me up?
Ery day I wen stay inside da open lanai fo da Temple wit you guys, an you guys neva bus me. But dis yoa time. Dis da dark time, wen da Bad Guy Satan get powa fo do his stuff.”
Afta dey bus Jesus, dey take him away inside da Main Pries Guy house. Peter go too, but he stay far.
Dey make one fire inside da open lanai, an sit down by um togedda. Peter sit down wit um.
One worka girl spock Peter sitting dea by da fire. She look strait at Peter, an tell da odda guys, “Dis guy was wit Jesus!”
But Peter tell, “No way, girl! I donno da guy!”
Bumbye one guy spock Peter an he tell, “You one a dem too!”
Peter tell, “No way, brah!”
Bout one hour layta anodda guy tell, “Fo shua dis guy stay wit Jesus, cuz he come from Galilee.”
But Peter tell, “Eh, brah, I donno wat you talking bout!” Peter still talking, an da roosta crow.
Jesus, Da One In Charge, wen turn an look at Peter. Den Peter no foget wat Da One In Charge wen tell him, “Befo da roosta crow tonite, you goin tell three time you donno me.”
Den Peter go outside an cry real hard.
Da guards make fun a Jesus an bus um up.
Dey cova his eyes wit one rag, an give um plenny false crack, an tell him, “Eh, you one guy dat talk fo God, aah? So, tell us who wen hit you!”
An dey talk any kine to him.
Wen da sun come up, da older leadas fo da peopo, da Main Pries guys, an da teachas dat teach da Rules From God come togedda, an bring Jesus in front dem.
Dey tell, “If you da Spesho Guy God Wen Sen fo real kine, go tell us.”
Jesus tell dem, “If I go tell you guys, you no goin tink wat I go tell az fo real kine.
An if I go aks you guys one question, you no goin tell me notting.
I da Fo Real Kine Guy. Afta dis I goin sit down da importan place by God right side. He da One dat get all da powa.”
Dey all tell, “So you God Boy, o wat?”
He tell dem, “Dass right, wat you guys tell.”
Den dey tell, “No need mo guys fo talk bad bout him! We jus wen hear wat he tell!”
LUK.23.HPB: Den all da peopo dat wen come togedda take Jesus away fo go in front Pilate, da govna.

Dey poin finga Jesus an tell, “Dis guy stay bulai oua peopo! He stay teach dem bad kine stuff. He tell dem no pay tax to King Cesar! He tell dat he da Christ Guy, da Spesho Guy God Wen Sen, an dat he one king.”
Pilate tell Jesus, “Eh, you da king fo da Jews, o wat?”
Jesus tell, “Dass right, wat you tell.”
Den Pilate tell da Main Pries guys an all da peopo, “I no find notting bad dat dis guy wen do.”
But dey tell mo strong, “All ova Judea da peopo like beef cuz a da stuff he stay teach. He wen start Galilee side. Now, he stay come all da way ova hea.”
Pilate hear dat, an he go aks Jesus, “You come from Galilee, o wat?”
Wen Pilate find out dat Jesus come from Galilee, he tell his guys fo take Jesus by Herod. Cuz Herod da one dat stay in charge inside Galilee, an he stay Jerusalem town dat time.
Herod, he feel good inside wen he spock Jesus, cuz Herod wen hear bout him an like see him from long time. Herod tink maybe Jesus goin do someting awesome fo him see um.
Herod go aks Jesus plenny stuff, but Jesus neva say notting.
Da Main Pries guys an da teachas dat teach da Rules From God stay dea. Dey poin finga Jesus real hard.
Den Herod an his army guys ack jalike Jesus no good, an make fun a him. Dey put one fancy robe on top him, an sen him back to Pilate.
Dass how Herod an Pilate wen come frenz. Befo dat time dey stay agains each odda.
Den Pilate tell da Main Pries guys, da leada guys, an da peopo fo come.

He tell um, “You guys wen bring dis guy by me, an you tell he stay try fo make da peopo beef us Rome guys. I wen aks him plenny stuff in front you, an I no find notting wrong da way you guys stay tell, fo poin finga him.
An Herod, he no find notting fo poin finga him too. He sen him back. You guys know he neva do notting dat tell he gotta mahke.
Az why I goin tell my army guys fo whip um an let um go.”
[Now, ery year, da Passova spesho religious kine ceremony, Pilate gotta let one prisona guy go fo da peopo.]
All da peopo was yelling, “Kill Jesus! Let Barabbas go fo us!”
You know, da Rome army guys wen throw Barabbas in jail befo time, cuz he lead some a da peopo an dey try fo ovathrow da leada guys inside Jerusalem. Barabbas even wen kill one guy.
Pilate like let Jesus go, so he go aks da peopo one mo time.
But dey stay yelling, “Kill da buggah on top one cross! Kill da buggah on top one cross!”
One mo time he tell dem, “How come? Wat kine crime dis guy wen do? I no find notting dat tell he gotta mahke. Az why I goin tell my army guys fo whip him an let um go.”
But dey stay yell da top a dea lungs, fo presha Pilate an make um kill Jesus on top one cross, an dey win.
So Pilate tell dat Jesus gotta mahke, jalike da peopo tell um fo do.
He let Barabbas go, da guy dey pick, dat wen make da peopo beef da govmen an kill one guy. An he give Jesus to dem fo dem do wat dey like do to him.
Den dey take Jesus away. One guy name Simon from Cyrene stay come from da countryside. Da army guys grab him, put da cross on top him, an make him carry um behind Jesus.
Plenny peopo stay walking behind Jesus, an some wahines stay crying. Dey real sad inside cuz a wat stay happen.
Jesus turn an tell um, “Sistahs from Jerusalem, no cry fo me. Cry fo you an fo yoa kids.
Cuz da time goin come wen you goin tell, ‘Lucky now, da wahines dat no mo kids, da wahines dat neva born kids, an da wahines dat neva breas feed kids!’
Dat time da peopo goin tell da mountains, ‘Fall down on top us!’ An dey goin tell da hills, ‘Hide us!’
Cuz if dey stay do dis kine stuff to one good guy like me, wat goin happen to da peopo dat not good?”
Dey take two crooks wit him. Dey goin kill dem wit Jesus.
Dey come da place “Da Skull.” Dey hang Jesus on top one cross fo kill um dea. Dey hang da two crooks on top da odda two crosses, one on da right side an da odda on da lef side.
Jesus tell, “Faddah, let dem go fo dis bad ting dey stay doing. Dey donno wat dey stay doing!”
Da army guys throw dice fo take Jesus clotheses.

Da peopo stan dea an watch um. Da leada guys fo da Jews make fun a him. Dey tell, “Eh, he wen take da odda guys outa da bad kine stuff dey stay in. If he da Spesho Guy God Wen Sen fo real kine, how come he no can get outa dis now?!”
Da army guys make fun a him too. Dey come by him an like give him some a dea cheap kine wine fo drink.
Dey tell, “Eh, if you da king fo da Jews, get outa dis, den!”
Den dey write,
dis da king fo da jews
an put um on top da cross.
One crook dat stay hanging dea talk any kine to him. He tell, “Eh, you da Spesho Guy God Wen Sen, o wat? Den get outa dis, an get us guys out too!”
But da odda crook scold him, an tell, “Eh, you no sked God, o wat? Dey wen tell you gotta mahke, too, jalike him.
Us guys get da pay fo wat we wen do, but dis guy, he neva do notting wrong!”
An da guy tell Jesus, “Jesus, no foget me wen you come da King!”
Jesus tell him, “Eh, you get um! An I tell you dis: Today you goin be wit me inside God Beautiful Place.”
Was bout noon time, an come real dark all ova da place, till three clock,
cuz da sun pau shine. Da big curtain inside da Temple broke in half.
Jesus yell real loud. He tell, “Faddah! I give you my spirit!” Wen he tell dat, he mahke.
Da captain fo da army guys see wat happen, an he tell good stuff bout God. He tell, “Fo shua, dis guy neva do notting wrong!”
Da peopo dat wen come dea fo see wat goin happen see dat, an dey poun dea ches, fo show dat dey know someting real bad wen happen. Den dey go home.
All da guys dat wen know Jesus, an da wahines dat wen come dea wit him all da way from Galilee side, dey stay stand far away fo watch all da stuff dat stay happen.
Had one guy name Joseph. He one a da National Council guys. He good an erytime do da right ting.
He come from Arimatea, Judea side. Wen da odda guys wen like kill Jesus, Joseph neva vote wit dem. He trus God, an stay wait fo God fo come da king.
He go in front Pilate, an go aks him fo Jesus body.

Joseph an his guys take Jesus body down from da cross, wrap him up inside one linen cloth, an put him inside one tomb peopo wen cut inside da rock fo bury somebody, but neva get one mahke guy inside yet.
Dat day was da Day Fo Make Ready Fo Da Passova, an da Res Day almos come.
Da wahines dat stay tight wit Jesus from Galilee side, dey go wit Joseph, an see da tomb, an how dey put Jesus mahke body inside.
Den dey go home fo make da spices an da perfume ready fo his body.
On da Res Day dey res, jalike da Bible tell fo do.
LUK.24.HPB: Sunday, da firs day in da week, befo da sun come up, da wahines bring da spices dey wen make ready, an go by da tomb.
Dey see da big stone Jesus frenz wen use fo close da tomb. But da stone stay on da side now.
Dey go inside da tomb, but Da One In Charge, Jesus, his body no moa!
Dey no can figga dat. Right den an dea two guys stan dea by dem. Da guys clotheses stay shine.
Da wahines stay real sked. Dey go down on dea knees, an ony look da groun. Da two guys tell um, “How come you wahines stay look fo da guy dat stay alive, ova hea aroun da mahke guys?
Jesus not hea; he wen come back alive! No foget, he wen tell you guys dis wen he still stay wit you guys Galilee side.
He tell, ‘I Da Fo Real Kine Guy. Dey gotta turn me ova to da bad guys. An dey goin kill me on top one cross. But day numba three, I goin come back alive!’ ”
Den da wahines rememba wat Jesus wen tell.
So dey come back from da tomb, an dey tell all dat stuff to Jesus eleven guys an to da odda peopo.
Mary da Magdala wahine, Joanna, James muddah Mary, an da odda wahines dat wen go wit dem, dey tell all dis stuff to da guys dat Jesus was goin sen all ova da place.
But dem guys, dey neva tink az fo real kine wat da wahines tell, cuz soun jalike dey wen make um up.
But Peter stan up an run to da tomb. He bend down, an see ony da grave cloths dea. Den he go way, an he no can figga bout wat wen happen.
Dat same day had two a Jesus guys wen go one small town Emmaus, bout seven mile from Jerusalem.
Dey stay talk bout all da stuff dat wen happen.
So dey talking lidat, an you know wat? Jesus come, an walk wit dem.
But he neva let um know who him.
He go aks um, “Wat you guys stay talk bout now wen you walking?”
Dey stan dea, an dey hang dea face.
One a dem, name Cleopas, tell him, “You mus be da ony guy inside Jerusalem dat donno all da stuff dat jus wen happen ova dea.”
He tell, “Wat stuff?”
Dey tell, “Da stuff dat dey wen do to Jesus, da guy from Nazaret. He one guy dat talk fo God. Wat he wen tell an do in front God an all da peopo wen show he get powa.
Da Main Pries guys an oua leada guys wen turn him in fo mahke. Den dey wen kill him on top one cross.
We wen figga he da guy dat goin cut loose da Israel peopo from da powa da bad kine stuff get ova dem. Dis wen happen day befo yestaday.
Some wahines dat stay wit us wen blow oua mind, cuz dey wen go by da tomb dis morning, befo da sun come up.
But dey neva find his body inside dea! Dey wen tell us dat dey wen see someting from God—had angel guys dea, dat tell Jesus come back alive!
Some a oua guys wen go to da tomb. Eryting stay jalike da wahines tell. But dey neva see Jesus body.”
Den Jesus tell da two guys, “You guys no tink! You hard head, cuz you guys no trus all da stuff da guys dat wen talk fo God tell!
Dey tell dat da Spesho Guy God Goin Sen gotta suffa all dis kine stuff, an afta, he goin come real awesome, aah?”
An den Jesus teach dem eryting da Bible tell bout him from befo time. He start wit da stuff Moses wen write down inside da Rules, an den all da odda guys dat wen talk fo God, wat dey wen write down.
Den da two guys come nea Emmaus, da small town, an Jesus ack jalike he goin go litto bit mo far.
But dey tell him, “Stay hea wit us, cuz pau hana, an dark awready.” So he go inside da house, fo stay wit dem.
He sit down by da table fo eat wit dem. He pick up da bread, an tell God “Mahalo plenny!” an broke um up fo give um to dem.
Den dey see fo real kine, an know az him. But right den an dea he disappea.
Den dey tell each odda, “Ho! Oua heart was pounding, all da time he stay talk wit us on top da road, an wen he show us da stuff from da Bible from befo time, aah?”
Right den an dea dey stan up an go back Jerusalem. Dey find Jesus eleven guys an da odda guys all togedda.
Da eleven guys tell, “Jesus, Da One In Charge, wen come back alive, fo shua! Simon wen see him!”
Den da two guys tell um wat wen happen by da road, an dat dey wen know him wen he broke up da bread.
Wen dey tell Jesus guys dis, ho! Jesus stan dea wit dem! He tell, “No sked. I like you guys stay good inside.”
But dey sked fo real kine! Dey tink dey seeing one ghost!
He tell um, “How come you guys all sked? How come you no trus me?
Look my hands an my feet. Try touch me, an see dat dis me, fo shua! One ghost no mo bones an skin, like you guys see I get.”
He show dem his hands an feets.
Dey still no stay shua az fo real kine, cuz dey all hamajang inside. Dey feel real good inside, but same time, dey stay all max out. He tell um, “You guys get someting fo eat?”
Dey give him one cook fish.
He take um an eat um in front dem.

He tell um, “All dis happen jalike I wen tell you guys wen I stay wit you. Eryting Moses wen write inside da Rules, an eryting da odda guys dat wen talk fo God wen write down, an eryting dat get inside da Songs Fo God—all da stuff dat stay from befo time inside da Bible, all dat, talk bout me! An eryting dey wen write, goin happen!”
Den he help dem undastan da Bible.
He tell um, “Dis wat dey wen write, ‘Da Christ Guy, da Spesho Guy God Goin Sen, he goin suffa an mahke, an den come back alive on day numba three afta he mahke.

Afta dat, his guys goin teach all da diffren peopos inside da whole world bout da Christ Guy, da Spesho Guy God Wen Sen. Dey goin tell da peopos dey gotta come sorry fo all da bad kine stuff dey stay do, an no do um no moa. So den, God goin let go da peopos an hemo dea shame fo all da bad kine stuff dey wen do. His guys goin go teach lidat cuz dey his guys an dey get his powa, an dey goin start Jerusalem side.’
You guys wen see all dis stuff dat wen happen, an you goin tell da peopo bout um.
I goin sen you guys wat my Faddah wen promise you. So stay hea inside Jerusalem till you guys get da powa dat come from God in da sky.”
Den Jesus take his guys outside Jerusalem, Betany side. He hold up his hands an tell God fo do good tings fo dem.
Same time wen Jesus stay tell God fo do good tings fo dem, he start fo go up inside da sky.
Dey all go down on dea knees fo show Jesus love an respeck. Den dey go back Jerusalem. An dey stay real good inside.
Dey stay inside da open lanai fo da Temple, praying an telling God how good he stay.
JHN.1.HPB: Da time eryting wen start, had one Guy. “God, He Talk,” dass who him. God an dat Guy, dey stick togedda, an da Guy stay God fo real kine.
Dass da Guy, da time eryting start, him an God stay tight wit each odda.
God wen make eryting, but da way he do um, he tell dis Guy fo do um. No mo notting dis Guy neva make.

He da Guy, if you like come alive fo real kine, you gotta come by him. Dass da kine life come from him. Wen peopo come alive lidat, jalike dey stay inside one place dat get plenny light. Den dey can see an undastan stuff.
No matta stay dark, da dark no can pio da light. Erytime get light.
Had one guy John dat God sen.
God sen um fo tell all da peopo wat he know bout da light from God, fo dem trus God cuz a him. Dass his kuleana.
John, he not da light. He ony come fo tell da peopo dat da light stay fo real.
Dat time wen John stay teach, jalike da light dass fo real stay come inside da world. Dass da light dat show erybody wass true.
Dat time, da light dass fo real stay inside da world. Wen God make da world, he da Guy dat do um. But da peopo inside da world, dey neva know who him.
He come his country, but even his peopo neva come tight wit him.
But erybody dat come tight wit him an trus him, God give dem da right fo come his kids cuz dey know who him.
Da way dey born, az not jalike how one faddah like get kids. Dey come God kids cuz God give um his life inside.

Dat “God, He Talk” Guy, he come one guy dat get one body jalike us guys get. He stay wit us short time, an us see how awesome he stay. He awesome, cuz he da One an ony Boy dat come from da Faddah. He like do plenny good stuff fo us cuz dass how he stay. Eryting he tell bout God stay fo real.

John, he tell peopo wat he know bout dat Guy. He talk real strong fo all da peopo hear. He tell, “Dis da Guy I wen talk bout wen I tell, ‘Bumbye one Guy goin show up, an dat Guy mo importan den me, cuz he stay awready from befo I born.’ ”
John talk lidat cuz dat Guy like do real plenny good kine stuff, an he do um fo all us guys erytime.
Moses wen give oua ancesta guys da Rules From God. Den Jesus Christ, God Spesho Guy, he do plenny good stuff fo us, an eryting he tell us bout God, stay fo real.
No mo nobody wen see God fo real kine. But ony dat Guy wen see um. No mo anodda guy jalike him cuz he God too. No mo nobody stay mo tight wit his Faddah den him. He da One dat wen show how God stay.
One time, da Jew leada guys sen pries guys an odda guys from da Levi ohana dat help da pries guys. Dey sen um by John fo tell, “Eh, who you?” Dis wat he tell um:
He neva bulai. He tell um fo real kine, “Lissen! I not da Christ Guy, da Spesho Guy God Goin Sen.”
Dey tell John, “Den who you? You Elijah?” He tell, “No, I not.”
Dey tell, “Den you da Spesho Guy dat goin come an talk fo God?” He tell, “No, I not.”
Dey tell him, “Kay den. Tell us who you. Wat you tell bout you? We gotta tell someting to da guys dat sen us, you know!”
John tell da same ting jalike Isaiah tell, da guy dat talk fo God long time befo time,
“I da guy dat talk real strong inside da boonies,
‘Eh, make da road ready fo Da One In Charge.
Make um strait fo him!’ ”
Some a da guys da Jew leadas wen sen by John, dey Pharisees.
Dem guys tell him, “Kay den. If you not da Spesho Christ Guy Dat God Goin Sen, an you not Elijah, an you not da Spesho Guy dat goin come an talk fo God, den how come you stay baptize da peopo?”
John tell um, “I stay baptize da peopo wit watta. Anodda guy stay hea wit you guys, but you guys donno who him.
I wen start fo teach firs befo him, but I not spesho enuff even fo help him hemo his slippas.”
All dis happen inside Betany town, da one dat stay da odda side a da Jordan Riva. Dass wea John stay baptize da peopo.

Da nex day John spock Jesus stay coming by him, an he tell, “Eh, you guys, try look da guy ova dea! You know wat? He jalike God bebe sheep fo da sacrifice. He hemo da shame fo da bad kine stuff dat erybody inside da whole world stay do!
Dis da guy I stay talk bout wen I tell, ‘Bumbye one guy goin show up afta me, but he mo importan den me, cuz he stay befo I born.’
I neva know who him befo time. But I stay hea fo da Israel peopo know who him. Dass why I stay baptize peopo wit watta.”

John tell mo plenny bout wat he know. He tell dis: “God wen sen me fo baptize peopo wit watta. He tell me, ‘You goin see my Spesho Spirit come down an stay wit one guy. He da guy goin let my Good An Spesho Spirit take ova my peopo.’ Dat time I wen see one guy, an I neva know who him befo time. But den I see da Good An Spesho Spirit come down from da sky jalike one dove, an stay wit da guy.
“I wen see dat, an I tell you guys, dat guy, he God Boy!”
Da nex day John stay stan dea one mo time wit two guys he stay teach.
Wen John spock Jesus stay walk by him, he tell, “Look! Dis guy jalike God bebe sheep fo da sacrifice.”
Da two guys hear him tell dat, an dey go wit Jesus.
Jesus turn aroun an see dem stay going wit him. He tell, “Eh, wat you guys looking fo?”
Dey tell, “Rabbi, wea you stay staying at now?” (“Rabbi,” dat mean “Teacha” dea language.)
Jesus tell, “Go come look.” So dey go wit him an see wea he stay, an dey stay dea wit him dat day. Was bout four clock in da aftanoon.
Andrew, Simon Peter braddah, he one a da two guys dat hear John Da Baptiza guy, an go wit Jesus.
