Da firs ting Andrew do, he find his braddah Simon an tell him, “Us wen find da Messiah.” (“Messiah,” dat mean “da Christ Guy, da Spesho Guy God Wen Sen,” dea language.)
Den he bring Simon to Jesus.
Jesus look at um an tell, “You Simon, an yoa faddah John, aah? but not da Baptiza guy. From now peopo goin call you ‘Cefas.’ ” (Dat mean “Peter,” o “Da Rock,” in dea language.)
Da nex day Jesus like go Galilee side. He find Philip an tell him, “Eh, come wit me, an be my guy.”
Philip, he from Betsaida town, da same place Andrew an Peter live.

Philip find Natanael an tell um, “We wen find da Guy dat Moses write bout in da book wit da Rules From God inside. An da guys dat talk fo God long time befo time, dey write bout him too. He Jesus from Nazaret town, Joseph boy.”
Natanael tell, “Nah! No mo notting good come from Nazaret!”
Philip tell, “Go come check um out!”
Jesus spock Natanael stay come by him, an he tell, “Dis guy one fo real kine Israel guy. No mo notting fake inside him! He erytime tell da trut.”
Natanael tell, “How come you know who me?”
Jesus tell, “I wen see you da time you was undaneat da fig tree, befo Philip tell you fo come.”
Den Natanael tell him, “Teacha, you God Boy fo real kine! You da King fo da Israel peopo!”
Jesus tell him, “You wen trus me jus cuz I tell you dat I wen see you undaneat da fig tree, aah?! Fo shua, you goin see mo betta stuff den dat!”
Den he tell um, “Dass right! An I like tell all you guys dis: You guys goin see da sky open up, an angel messenja guys from God go up an go down by me, da Fo Real Kine Guy.”
JHN.2.HPB: Afta two days, get one wedding inside Cana town, Galilee side. Jesus muddah was dea.
Da ohana tell Jesus an his guys fo come too, so dey go.
Bumbye no mo wine. Den Jesus muddah tell him, “Dey no mo wine, you know.”
Jesus tell, “Eh, Ma! Dass not my job, you know. Not time yet fo me fo show da awesome stuff.”
Den his muddah tell da worka guys, “Wateva my boy tell you guys fo do, go do um!”
Da Jew guys get Rules fo wash dea hands befo dey eat. Az why dey get six mangus stone watta jugs ova dea by da wall. Ery jug can hold twenny o thirty gallon watta.
Jesus tell da worka guys, “Fill up da jugs wit watta.” So dey fill um up to da top.
Den he tell um, “Now, go take some out, an take um to da guy in charge a da luau.” So dey take um to da guy.
Da guy taste da watta an tell, “Eh, da watta wen come wine!” But he neva know wea da wine come from. Ony da worka guys dat go get da watta, dey know. Den da guy tell da groom fo come.
Da guy tell da groom, “Erybody bring out da real good wine firs. Den, afta dea frenz drink plenny, dey bring out da cheap wine. But you, you bring out da bestes kine wine now!”
Dis ting inside Cana town, Galilee side, dis da firs time Jesus do someting awesome. He show how awesome he stay, an da guys he stay teach trus him.
Afta dat, Jesus, his muddah, his braddahs, an da guys he stay teach, dey go down Capernaum town. But dey ony stay dea short time.
Dat time, almos time fo da Jew Passova. So Jesus go Jerusalem.
Inside da open lanai fo da Temple, Jesus see guys stay sell cows, sheeps, an doves fo make sacrifice. Had guys dat sit dea fo sell da spesho kine temple money dat da peopo give God fo da Temple.
Jesus make one whip from small kine ropes, an he chase um all outside da open lanai fo da Temple, even da cows an sheeps. He huli da money guys tables an dump dea coins all ova da place.
An he tell da guys dat stay sell da doves, “Get um outa hea! No make my Faddah house jalike one open market!”
Den his guys rememba wat da Bible tell, “I get plenny love an aloha fo yoa house, an dat stay burn inside me jalike one fire.”
Den da Jew leada guys tell him, “Wat awesome ting you goin do fo show us dat you get da right fo do all dis kine stuff?”
Jesus tell, “Bus up dis Temple, an in three day I goin make one new Temple.”
Da Jew guys tell him, “Ho! Had guys dat work fo forty six year fo make dis Temple! How you figga you goin make one new temple in three day?”
But Jesus stay talk bout his body, cuz his body jalike one temple.
So den bumbye, wen Jesus mahke an come back alive, his guys no foget dat he wen tell um dat, an dey trus wat da Bible tell from befo time, an wat Jesus tell.
Wen Jesus stay inside Jerusalem fo da Passova religious kine ceremony, plenny peopo trus him, cuz dey see all da awesome stuff he do fo show who him.
But Jesus neva trus da peopo, cuz he know all dem.
He neva need nobody fo tell um how da peopo stay, cuz he know how dey stay inside.
JHN.3.HPB: Had one Pharisee guy Nicodemus, an he one leada fo da Jew guys.
One nite he go by Jesus an tell um, “Teacha, us guys know dat you one teacha dat come from God, cuz nobody can show us da kine awesome stuff you stay do, if God no stay wit him.”
Jesus tell him, “Dass right! An I tell you dis too: Whoeva not born one mo time God new way, dey no goin get God fo dea king.”
Nicodemus tell him, “How one ol guy can get born one mo time? No way he can go inside his muddah one mo time an get born!”
Jesus tell him, “Dass right! An I tell you dis too: Whoeva not born one mo time from watta an from God Spirit, dey no can get God fo dea king.
Peopo born from peopo, an peopo spirit born one mo time from God Spirit.
Eh, no come shock jus cuz I tell you, ‘You guys gotta born one mo time God new way.’
Da wind blow hea an dea. You can hear um, but you donno wea da wind come from o wea stay go. Dass jalike erybody dat born one mo time from God Spirit.”
Nicodemus tell um, “How can be?”
Jesus tell him, “You da main teacha fo da Israel peopo, an you no undastan dis stuff?
Fo shua, I tell you dis too: I know wat I stay talking bout. I wen see da stuff I stay tell. But you guys, you still no like trus wat I tell you.

Wen I tell you guys bout stuff down hea inside dis world, you guys no stay shua wat I tell you az fo real kine. Den how you guys goin stay shua if I tell you guys bout da stuff up dea wea God stay inside da sky?
Nobody eva wen go up inside da sky. Ony me, da Fo Real Kine Guy, I wen come down from da sky.

“You know, long time befo time inside da boonies, Moses put one snake on top one pos fo erybody look um an come good. Da same ting gotta happen to me, da Fo Real Kine Guy. Dey goin put me on top one cross,
fo erybody dat stay trus me get da real kine life dat goin stay to da max foeva!

“God get plenny love an aloha fo da peopo inside da world. Dass why he sen me, his one an ony Boy. Cuz a dat, erybody dat trus me no goin get cut off from God foeva! Dey goin get da real kine life dat goin stay to da max foeva!
You know, wen God sen me, his Boy, inside da world, he neva do dat fo punish da peopo. He sen me fo get da peopo outa da bad kine stuff dey stay do.
Whoeva stay trus me, God no goin punish dem. But whoeva no trus me, garans God goin punish dem, cuz dey neva trus me, God ony Boy.

“God wen sen da light inside da world. Da light show erybody how dey stay inside. But da peopo like stick wit da dark an dey hate da light, cuz dey stay do bad kine stuff. Dass why God goin punish da peopo.
Erybody dat stay do bad kine stuff hate da light, an no like let da light shine on top dem. Cuz dey no like nobody know bout da bad kine stuff dey stay do.
But whoeva stay do wat da true stuff tell fo do, dass jalike dey like fo da light shine on top dem, fo show erybody dat eryting dey do, dass wat God tell um fo do.”
Afta dat, Jesus an da guys he teach go Judea side. He stay wit dem ova dea an baptize peopo.
Da same time John stay baptize da peopo Enon side, nea Salim, cuz get plenny watta ova dea. Da peopo stay come by John an he stay baptize dem.
All dis happen befo dey throw John in prison.
Had one Jew guy make argue wit da guys John stay teach. Dey make argue bout how dey gotta wash befo dey can pray.
So dey go by John an tell um, “Teacha, you know da guy dat wen stay by you ova dea, da odda side a da Jordan Riva, an you tell us bout him? Look! Erybody stay go ova dea, an he stay baptize um.”
John tell um, “No can get notting, ony wat God in da sky give.
You guys, you hear me tell, ‘I not da Christ, da Spesho Guy God Goin Sen, but God wen sen me firs, befo him.’

“Da groom, he da guy dat get da bride. Da bes man, he stay standing dea, an he stay real good inside wen he hear da groom stay talking. I jalike da bes man, an Jesus, jalike da groom. Dass why I stay real good inside.
He gotta come mo importan den me, cuz I not dat importan.”

Da One dat come from up dea wea God stay inside da sky, he mo importan den anybody. Da guy dat come from down hea on top da earth, he jalike all da odda peopo hea on top da earth, an he talk bout da kine stuff from down hea. Da guy from up dea wea God stay inside da sky, fo shua he mo importan den all da odda peopo.
He tell wat he wen see an hear, but nobody trus wat he tell.
But whoeva take wat da One from up dea tell, dat guy show dat God tell da trut.
Da Guy God Wen Sen tell wat God tell, cuz God no hold back wen God give him his Spirit.
Da Faddah get plenny love an aloha fo his Boy. He give him da powa ova eryting.

Whoeva trus God Boy, dey get da real kine life dat goin stay to da max foeva! But whoeva no trus God Boy, an no do wat he tell um fo do, dey no goin get dat kine life, cuz God tell “Laytas” to wat dey do.
JHN.4.HPB: Da Pharisee guys hear dat Jesus stay baptize mo peopo den John, an dat all da peopo go wit Jesus.
(But you know, Jesus no baptize um, his guys do um.)
Wen Jesus know dat da Pharisee guys hear dat, he go way from Judea, an go Galilee side.
But fo go Galilee, he figga mo betta go thru Samaria.
He go inside one town Sykar Samaria side nea da land Jacob wen give his boy Joseph long time befo time.
Was bout lunch time. Had one puka fo da watta dea, dey call um Jacob Puka. Jesus stay tired cuz he walk long time. His guys go inside town fo buy lunch, an he sit down by da puka.
Den one wahine from dat place come fo get watta. Jesus tell her, “You can give me some watta fo drink?”
Da wahine from Samaria tell um, “How come you aks me fo one drink watta?! You one Jew an I one wahine from Samaria. You know, da Jew guys no like get notting fo do wit da Samaria peopo.”

Jesus tell, “You donno wat God like give erybody, an you donno who me dat stay aks you fo da watta. Cuz if you know dat, den fo shua you goin aks me fo watta. An one mo ting, I can give you da kine watta dat make peopo live fo real kine foeva!”
She tell, “Mista, you no mo notting fo pull up da watta, an da puka stay deep. So, wea you goin get da kine watta dat make peopo live fo real kine foeva?
You mo betta den oua ancesta guy Jacob, o wat? He da one wen give us dis puka. Him, his kids, an his cows even drink watta from dis puka.”
Jesus tell, “Whoeva drink dis watta, bumbye dey goin come thirsty one mo time.

But whoeva drink da kine watta I goin give, dey no goin come thirsty no moa. Cuz da kine watta I goin give dem goin come jalike watta dat stay come out all da time. An dat watta goin make dem live to da max foeva!”
Da wahine tell, “Mista, give me dat kine watta! Den I no goin come thirsty no moa, an I no need come hea fo get watta!”
Jesus tell, “Go, tell yoa husban fo come, an bring um ova hea.”
She tell, “I no mo husban.”
Jesus tell, “Az right, you no mo husban.
Cuz you wen get five husbans. An da guy you get now, he not yoa husban. Az true wat you tell!”
Da wahine tell, “Mista, now I know fo shua you one guy dat talk fo God.
Us Samaria peopo, oua ancesta guys go down an pray to God on top dis mountain ova hea. But you Jew guys, you guys tell dat erybody gotta go Jerusalem fo go down an pray to God.”
He tell, “Sistah, trus me, I stay tell da trut. Da time goin come wen you guys goin go down an pray to God oua Faddah, but no goin be hea on top dis mountain o inside Jerusalem.

You guys from Samaria go down in front somebody an pray, but you guys donno who him. Us Jew guys, we go down in front God an pray, an we know wat kine God him. Cuz God show us Jew guys da ony way fo get outa da bad kine stuff we stay do.

Garans da time goin come, an awready stay come now, wen da peopo go down an pray to da Faddah fo real kine. Dey goin show him plenny love an respeck cuz dey stay tight wit God Spirit, an dey goin know fo shua who God. Dass da kine peopo da Faddah like, da ones dat show him plenny love an respeck.
God, he one spirit. So den, da peopo dat show him plenny love an respeck gotta do dat wit da powa dey get from God Spirit, an cuz dey know how God stay fo real kine.”
Da wahine tell, “I know fo real da Messiah goin come, da Christ Guy, da Spesho Guy God Goin Sen. Wen he come, he goin tell us eryting.”
Jesus tell, “Dass me, da One dat stay talk to you right now.”
Right den an dea Jesus guys come back. Blow dea minds dat he stay talk to da wahine. But nobody tell, “Wat you like from her?” o “How come you talk to her?”
Den da wahine leave her watta jar, an go back inside town. She tell da peopo ova dea,
“Try come! Check out dis guy! He tell me eryting I wen do. Try check out if dis da Christ Guy, da Spesho Guy God Goin Sen!”
So da peopo go outa da town an go wea Jesus stay.
Same time Jesus guys stay beg him, “Teacha, come eat!”
But he tell um, “I awready get food, but you guys donno wat kine.”
So his guys tell each odda, “Wat you tink? Somebody bring him food, o wat?”
Jesus tell, “I do wat God like, an I do all his work. Dass jalike food fo me.
You guys tell, ‘Get four mo month, den da crop stay ready fo harves.’ Lissen up! I tell you: Look da fields, cuz dey stay ready fo harves awready.

Da guy dat harves da crop an bring um inside da store house get pay fo dat. He jalike da guy dat help da peopo fo trus God. Den da guy dat tell um da Good Kine Stuff From God firs, an da guy dat help da peopo trus God, two a dem stay good inside togedda. Cuz da peopo dat trus God cuz a dem, get da real kine life dat goin stay to da max foeva!
Az true wat da peopo tell, ‘One guy plant da seed an anodda guy harves da crop an bring um inside da store house.’
I sen you guys fo bring in da crop dat you neva work fo. Odda guys wen bus ass, an den you guys get da good kine stuff dey work fo.”
Plenny Samaria peopo from dat town trus Jesus cuz a wat da wahine tell um. She tell, “He tell me eryting I wen do.”
So wen da Samaria peopo come by Jesus, dey beg him, “Try come stay wit us!” So he stay dea two day.
Den plenny odda peopo trus him, cuz dey hear wat he tell.

Den dey tell da wahine, “Befo time, we ony hear wat you tell us. But now we trus him cuz we hear him too, an we know fo shua dat dis da Guy dat can take da whole world outa da bad kine stuff us stay in.”
Afta Jesus stay dea two days, he go Galilee side.
You know, Jesus tell befo time, “One guy dat talk fo God no mo respeck inside his home town.”

But befo, Passova time, da peopo from Galilee wen go Jerusalem fo da spesho religious kine ceremony. An dey wen see eryting dat Jesus do ova dea. So wen he come Galilee, da peopo from dea give him all dea aloha.
Den Jesus go Cana town Galilee side one mo time. Dass wea he take da watta an make um come wine befo time. Now, had one leada guy Capernaum town dat work fo da King. His boy stay sick.
Da guy hear dat Jesus come from Judea to Galilee side. So he go Cana town by Jesus, an beg him fo make his boy come good, cuz da boy litto mo mahke.
Jesus tell him, “If you guys no see me show you all kine awesome stuff, you guys no like trus me.”
Da leada guy tell, “Boss, try come, o my kid goin mahke.”
Jesus tell him, “Go home. Yoa boy stay live.”
An da guy trus wat Jesus tell um, an he go home.
Wen he reach dea his worka guys come an tell him, “Yoa boy, he stay live!”
He tell dem, “Wat time my boy come mo betta?”
Dey tell, “Da feva pau one clock yestaday.”
Da faddah know dass da same time wen Jesus tell him, “No worry. Yoa boy stay live.” Den him an all his ohana trus Jesus.
Dis da numba two awesome ting Jesus do afta he leave Judea side an go Galilee side.
JHN.5.HPB: Laytas Jesus go Jerusalem, cuz da Jew guys get one spesho religious kine ceremony ova dea.
Inside Jerusalem get one big watta place nea da Gate Fo Da Sheeps. Get five lanai dea. Da peopo call um “Betzata” in da local language.
Inside da lanai plenny sick peopo stay lay down: blind peopo, peopo dat no can walk, an peopo dat no can move. [Dey stay wait fo weneva da watta move.
Cuz you know, sometimes one angel guy from Da One In Charge go down inside da watta an make um move. Afta dat, da firs guy dat go inside da watta, he come good from wateva kine sick he get.]
Had one guy dea dat was sick thirty-eight year.
Jesus see him stay lay dea. He know dat da guy stay sick long time awready. So he tell him, “You like come good?”
Da sick guy tell um, “Mista, I no mo nobody fo put me inside wen da watta start fo move. Cuz wen I try fo go inside, some odda guy go inside firs.”
Jesus tell him, “Stan up! Take yoa mat an walk!”
Right den an dea da guy come good. He take his mat an walk.
Was da Res Day wen dat happen.
So da Jew leada guys tell da guy dat come good, “Eh, dis da Res Day! Dass agains da Rules fo you fo carry yoa mat!”
He tell, “Da guy dat make me come good, he tell me, ‘Take yoa mat an walk.’ ”
Dey tell him, “Who da guy dat tell you fo take yoa mat an walk?”
But da guy dat come good neva know who Jesus, cuz had plenny peopo dea, an Jesus gone awready.
Bumbye Jesus find da guy inside da open lanai fo da Temple. He tell, “Eh, you stay good now. No go do da bad kine stuff no moa, o mo worse ting goin happen to you.”
Den da guy go way an tell da Jew leada guys dat was Jesus wen make him come good.
Dass why dem guys start fo make Jesus suffa, cuz he make da guy come good on da Res Day.
So Jesus tell dem, “My Faddah still yet stay do da kine good tings, an I do da same ting too.”
Dass why da Jew leada guys try mo hard fo find Jesus an kill um, cuz he broke da Rules bout da Res Day. An even mo worse, he tell dat God his Faddah. Dat mean he make jalike he God.

Az why Jesus tell dem, “You guys get um fo shua! An I tell you guys dis: Wen I do someting, dass not me, cuz I no can do notting. I God Boy, an I ony do da stuff I see my Faddah stay do. Wateva my Faddah do, I do da same ting.
My Faddah get love an aloha fo me, his Boy. An he show me eryting dat he stay do. He goin show me even mo betta tings den dis, an dat goin blow yoa mind!
My Faddah bring back da mahke guys an make um live. Same ting, me, cuz I his Boy, I can make anybody I like come back fo live one mo time.
My Faddah not da judge fo nobody, but he make me da judge fo erybody, cuz I his Boy. I da one dat suppose to tell if dey do good tings o bad tings.
My Faddah like erybody get respeck fo me, cuz I his Boy, jalike dey get respeck fo him. Whoeva no mo respeck fo me, cuz I his Boy, dey no mo respeck fo my Faddah dat wen sen me hea.

“Dass right! An I tell you guys dis: Whoeva hear wat I tell, an trus God dat wen sen me, dey get da real kine life dat goin stay to da max foeva! God no goin punish dem. Dey no stay mahke inside no moa. Dey stay alive now fo real kine.

An if you guys undastan dat, I like tell you guys dis too: I God Boy. Da time goin come, an awready stay hea now, wen da mahke guys goin hear wat I tell. An da peopo dat hear me, an lissen wat I tell, dey goin live fo real kine.
Jalike my Faddah, he can make da peopo come alive fo real kine, same ting, cuz I his Boy he give me da powa fo make um come alive too.
My Faddah give me da right fo be da judge fo erybody, cuz I his Boy, da Fo Real Kine Guy.
No let dis blow yoa mind, cuz da time goin come wen all da mahke guys goin hear my voice.
An dey goin come outa dea graves. Da peopo dat wen do da good kine stuff goin come back fo live one mo time fo real kine, an da peopo dat wen do da bad kine stuff goin come back fo get punish.

“Wen I do someting, dass not me, cuz I no can do notting. I da judge, but wen I tell who do good o bad, dat come from wat my Faddah tell me. Dass how come I can judge um right, cuz I no try fo do wat I like do, but ony wat my Faddah like fo me do. He da One dat wen sen me.
“If I da ony guy stay tell bout me, dat no show proof dat wat I tell stay true.
Get anodda One dat tell wat he know bout me. An fo shua eryting he tell bout me stay true.
You guys wen sen messenja guys to John, an he tell eryting he know bout da trut bout me.
I no need peopo fo tell wat dey know bout me. But I stay tell dis stuff fo you guys get outa da bad kine stuff you stay do.
Wat John tell stay jalike one lamp dat stay shine bright. Fo short time you guys wen like wat John tell, cuz make you guys stay good inside.
“But I get odda stuff dat tell bout me, an dass mo betta den wat John tell. Da Faddah give me stuff fo do, an I do um. Da tings I do show who me, an show proof dat da Faddah wen sen me.
An da Faddah, dat wen sen me, he anodda One dat tell wat he know bout me. But you guys neva hear him o see him.
You guys no tink az true wat God tell, cuz you guys no trus me, an I da guy he wen sen.

You guys go check out da Bible erytime, cuz you guys figga you goin find da real kine life dat goin stay to da max foeva, inside da Bible from befo time. But wen da Bible talk bout how fo get da real kine life, dass me he stay talk bout.
An you guys, you no like come by me an be my guys fo you guys get da real kine life dat goin stay to da max foeva!
“I no need peopo fo tell me I awesome.
But I know you guys fo real kine. I know fo shua you guys no mo love an aloha fo God inside you.
I wen come dis world cuz my Faddah give me da right fo come fo him. But you guys neva like trus me o lissen me. If some odda guy come, jus him, jus cuz he like, you guys goin trus dat guy.
You guys like talk good bout each odda, but you guys no do notting fo make da ony God dass fo real talk good bout you guys. Den how you guys goin trus wat I tell? No ways!
“No figga I goin poin finga you guys fo tell da Faddah how you stay. But get one guy dat stay poin finga you guys. Dass Moses, da guy you trus, cuz he wen give you guys da Rules From God.
But if you guys wen trus Moses fo real kine, den you guys fo shua trus me too, cuz he write bout me.
But you guys neva trus wat Moses wen write, so how you guys goin trus wat I tell? No ways!”
JHN.6.HPB: Afta dat Jesus dem go da odda side Galilee Lake. (Da peopo call um Tiberias Lake too.)
Plenny peopo go wit him, cuz dey wen see all da awesome stuff he do fo show who him, wen he make plenny sick peopo come good.
Dat time, almos time fo da Jew Passova ceremony. Jesus go sit down on top one hill wit da guys he stay teach.
Jesus look up an see plenny peopo stay come by him. He tell Philip, “Eh, wea we goin buy food fo feed all dese peopo?”
You know, Jesus tell dat jus fo check out Philip, cuz Jesus awready know wat he goin do.
Philip tell um, “Gotta work mo den two hundred days fo get enuff money fo buy bread fo give all dese peopo even litto bit.”
Andrew, he Simon Peter braddah. Andrew he one a da guys Jesus stay teach. He tell Jesus,
“You know, get one boy hea dat get five small barley kine bread an two small fish. But how dat can feed plenny peopo? No can!”
Had plenny grass dea. Jesus tell his guys, “Make da peopo sit down.” So dey sit um down. Had bout five tousan guys dea.
Den Jesus take da breads, an tell God, “Mahalo plenny.” He give um to his guys, an dey give um to da peopo dat stay sit dea. Same ting wit da fish. An erybody eat plenny how dey like.
Wen erybody get enuff fo eat, Jesus tell his guys, “Go get all da lefovas. No good wase um.”
So dey go get da lefovas, an fill twelve big baskets wit da bread da peopo neva eat.
Afta da peopo see dis awesome ting Jesus do fo show who him, dey tell, “Fo shua dis da Guy goin come inside da world fo talk fo God.”
Jesus know dat da peopo goin come fo grab him fo make him come king. So he go way, an go up on top one hill wea nobody stay.
Befo dark time come, Jesus guys go down to da lake.
Dey go inside one boat, an start fo go da odda side a da lake, Capernaum side. Was dark awready, but still yet Jesus neva come by dem.
Den one strong wind start fo blow, an da waves stay come mo big.
Jesus guys row da boat three o four mile, an den dey spock Jesus stay walk on top da watta. He stay come nea da boat. An dey real sked.
But Jesus tell um, “Dis me! No sked!”
Den dey let him come inside da boat. Right den an dea dey come da place wea dey plan fo go.
Da nex day, da peopo dat stay back dea, da odda side a da lake, dey know dat get ony one boat dea befoa. An dey know Jesus guys go way inside dat boat, but Jesus no go wit dem.
Dey know too dat odda boats from Tiberias side come land dat side, nea da place wea Jesus Da One In Charge tell God “Mahalo plenny” an dey eat da bread.
So, wen da peopo see dat Jesus an his guys no stay dea, dey ride da odda boats fo go Capernaum fo look fo him ova dea.
Dey find Jesus da odda side a da lake, an dey tell, “Eh, Teacha! Wen you wen come ova hea?”

Jesus tell, “Dass good you guys stay look fo me. But I like tell you guys dis: You guys do um cuz I wen give you guys bread fo eat, an you guys come full. You guys no look fo me cuz I wen do awesome stuff fo show who me.

No go work ony fo da kine food dat bumbye come no good. Work fo da kine food dat las long time an make you guys live to da max foeva! I da Fo Real Kine Guy, an I give you guys dat kine life, cuz God da Faddah give me da right fo do dat.”
Dey tell him, “Kay den! Wat us guys gotta do, fo do da kine stuff dat God like?”
Jesus tell, “Dis wat God like you guys fo do: Trus me, cuz I Da Guy God Wen Sen.”
Dey tell, “Wat kine awesome ting you goin do fo show us who you, fo us guys trus you? Wat you goin do?
Oua ancesta guys wen eat da spesho manna kine bread inside da boonies, jalike da Bible tell, ‘He give um bread from da sky fo eat.’ ”

Jesus tell dem, “Dass right! An I tell you guys dis too: No was Moses dat give yoa ancesta guys da bread from da sky. Was my Faddah, an he da One dat give you guys da real kine bread from da sky still yet.
Cuz da bread from God, dass me, da Guy dat come down from da sky. I make da peopo inside da world come alive fo real kine.”
Dey tell him, “Mista, give us dis kine bread, an no stop eva!”
Jesus tell, “Me, jalike da bread. I da One make da peopo come alive fo real kine. Anybody come by me fo be my guy, dey no goin come hungry eva! Anybody trus me, dey no goin come thirsty eva!
“Jalike I tell you guys awready, you guys see me, but you guys still yet no trus me.
Erybody da Faddah pick fo be my guys, dey goin come by me. No way I eva goin throw out da peopo dat come by me!
I come down from da sky. I neva come fo do any kine how I like, but fo do wat my Faddah like. He da One dat sen me.
Dis wat da Faddah like me fo do: Erybody he pick fo be my guys, he like me fo bring dem all, an no leave out nobody. An den, I goin make dem come back alive wen da world goin come pau.

Jalike I wen tell: dis wat my Faddah like, da One dat sen me: Erybody dat see me his Boy, an trus me, dey goin get da real kine life dat goin stay to da max foeva! An I goin make dem come back alive wen da world goin come pau.”
Dass why da Jew guys start fo grumble bout him, cuz he tell, “I jalike da bread fo make da peopo live. I wen come down from da sky.”
Dey tell each odda, “Eh, dis guy, he Jesus, aah? He Joseph boy! We know his faddah an muddah, aah? So, how come he tell now, ‘I come down from da sky.’?”
Jesus tell um, “Eh! No grumble!
My Faddah wen sen me hea. No mo nobody can come by me, if my Faddah no bring um. An I goin make dem guys come back alive from mahke wen da world goin come pau.
Da guys dat wen talk fo God long time befo time, dey write, ‘God goin teach all da peopo.’ Erybody dat lissen da Faddah, an learn da good kine stuff from him, dey goin come by me an be my guys.
I Da guy dat come from God, an I da ony guy dat eva see da Faddah. No mo anodda guy dat see him eva.
“Dass right! An I like tell you guys dis too: Whoeva trus me, dey goin live to da max foeva.
I jalike da bread, an I make peopo live to da max foeva.
Yoa ancesta guys wen eat da manna kine bread in da boonies, but no matta, layta dey mahke.
But dis kine bread from me, dat come down from da sky, anybody can eat dis bread. Dat mean dey can trus me, an den, dey no goin stay cut off from God.

I da real bread. I da one fo make peopo come alive fo real kine. I wen come down from da sky. Anybody take dis bread, dey goin live to da max foeva. Dis da bread I goin give wen I mahke, az my body. An dis goin make you guys live to da max foeva.”
Den da Jew guys start fo argue mo hard wit each odda. Dey tell, “Eh, wat dis guy stay talk bout? How he can give us his body fo eat?”

Jesus tell um, “Eh, you guys get um! An I like tell you guys dis too: I da Fo Real Kine Guy. If you guys no lissen wat I tell you guys bout why I goin mahke, no way you guys goin come alive fo real kine. If you guys lissen, dass jalike you guys eat my body an drink my blood.
Jalike I tell: Whoeva eat my body an drink my blood, dey goin live to da max foeva, an I goin bring um back alive wen da world goin come pau!
Cuz my body, dass food fo real kine. An my blood, dass drink fo real kine.
Whoeva eat my body an drink my blood lidat, dey stay tight wit me, an I stay tight wit dem.
Da Faddah stay live fo real kine, an he wen sen me hea. I stay live too, cuz he make me live fo real kine. Whoeva take me, same ting, dey goin live, cuz I goin make dem live fo real kine.
Dis not jalike da manna kine bread dat yoa ancesta guys wen eat, an bumbye dey mahke. Dis da kine bread dat come from God in da sky. Whoeva eat dis kine bread goin live fo real kine.”
Jesus tell all dat wen he stay teach inside da Jew church, Capernaum side.
Den plenny guys dat go wit Jesus, wen dey hear all dat stuff, dey tell, “Wow! Dis stuff too hard fo tink az fo real kine!”
But Jesus know dat his guys stay squawk lidat. So he tell um, “Wot! Dis bodda you guys?
Eh, wat if bumbye you guys see me, da Fo Real Kine Guy, wen I go back up dea to da place wea I wen stay befo time? Den wat?
“God Spirit, dass who make da peopo live fo real kine. Da body no can. Wat I stay tell you guys, dass from God Spirit, an dass wat make peopo live fo real kine.
But get some a you guys dat no trus me.” Jesus tell dat cuz he know from da start who no trus him, an who goin set up him.
An he tell, “Dass why I wen tell you guys, no mo nobody can come by me an be my guy. Ony if da Faddah like help um, den dey can come by me.”
From dat time had plenny guys dat he teach befo time, but some a dem go back, an neva like go wit him no moa.
So Jesus tell his twelve guys, “Eh, you guys goin go way too, o wat?”
Den Simon Peter tell um, “Eh! You Da One In Charge! Wea we goin go? No mo nobody can tell us how fo live to da max foeva. You da ony one.
An us guys trus you, cuz we know dat you da Good An Spesho One from God.”
Jesus tell um, “I wen pick all twelve a you guys, aah? But still yet, one a you guys, he jalike one devil!”
He mean Judas, Simon Iscariot boy. He one a da twelve guys, but laytas Judas goin set up Jesus.
JHN.7.HPB: Afta dat, Jesus go aroun inside Galilee. Dat time he no like go aroun inside Judea, cuz da Jew leada guys ova dea stay look fo him fo kill um.
Almos time fo da spesho religious kine ceremony wen da Jew guys rememba da time dea ancesta guys wen walk all ova da boonies an live inside shacks, long time befo time.
Den Jesus braddahs tell him, “Go way from hea, an go Judea side, fo da peopo you teach see da kine stuff you stay do.
If one guy like erybody know bout him, he no goin do stuff wea nobody can see him, aah? You stay do all dis kine stuff, az why good you let erybody all ova da place see you do um!”
You know, even Jesus own braddahs neva trus him.
Jesus tell um, “Not da time fo me go yet. You guys can go any time.
Da peopo inside da world, dey no goin hate you guys. But dey hate me, cuz I tell um dat da kine stuff dey stay do, az real bad kine stuff!
You guys go Jerusalem fo da spesho religious kine ceremony. I no goin go yet, cuz not time fo me go.”
Afta he tell dat, den he stay Galilee side.
But afta Jesus braddahs go da spesho religious kine ceremony, den he go too. But nobody know he stay go.
Den da Jew leada guys, dey look fo him at da spesho religious kine ceremony. Dey tell da peopo, “Wea dat buggah stay?”
All da peopo stay talk bout him to each odda. Some peopo tell, “He one good guy, you know.” Odda peopo tell, “Nah! He bulai da peopo.”
But nobody talk loud bout him, cuz dey sked a da Jew leada guys.
In da middo a da spesho religious kine ceremony awready Jesus go inside da open lanai fo da Temple an start fo teach.
An da Jew leada guys, blow dea mind. Dey tell, “How come dis buggah know all dis stuff? He neva study wit da odda teachas, you know.”
Jesus tell dem, “Da stuff I teach, no come from me. Come from da One wen sen me.
If anybody like do wat God like um fo do, dey goin know if da stuff I stay teach come from God, o if ony come from my head.
Da guy dat tell stuff dat come from his head, he ony like make peopo tink he awesome. But if one guy like peopo fo figga dat da one dat sen him stay awesome, dat guy stay tell da trut. He no bulai.
Moses wen give you guys da Rules From God, but no mo nobody from you guys do wat da Rules From God tell um fo do. So, how come you guys try fo kill me?”
All da peopo tell, “Wassamatta you? You get one bad kine spirit in charge a you, o wat? Wat you mean, somebody try fo kill you?”
Jesus tell dem, “I wen do one awesome ting, an dat blow all you guys mind.

Moses wen give you guys da Rule fo cut skin on day numba eight afta one bebe boy born, an you guys do um fo one bebe boy, no matta on da Res Day. You know, oua ancesta guys do dat long time befo Moses. No was Moses dat give um da Rule firs time.
If you guys can cut skin on one guy on da Res Day fo no broke Moses Rules, how come you guys come huhu wit me cuz I make one sick guy come good on da Res Day?
No ack jalike one judge wen you guys can see ony da outside stuff. If you guys goin ack jalike one judge, gotta judge da right way.”
Den some peopo from Jerusalem tell, “Eh! Dis da guy dey stay look fo, cuz dey like kill um, aah?

But, wow! He stay talk hea in front erybody, an nobody tell him fo shut his mout. Wat you guys figga? You tink maybe da leada guys wen figga dat dis guy, he da Spesho Guy God Goin Sen, fo real kine, o wat?!
But us guys, we know wea dis guy come from. Wen God sen his Spesho Guy Christ, nobody goin know wea he come from.”

Jesus stay teach inside da open lanai fo da Temple. Wen he hear dem guys tell dat, he talk real loud an tell, “You guys tink you know me, an wea I wen come from? I neva come hea jus fo do wat I like do. Da One dat wen sen me, he God fo real kine! You guys donno him.
But I know him, cuz I come from him, an he wen sen me hea.”
Den dey try fo take him, but nobody grab him, cuz not time yet.
But plenny peopo dat stay dea trus him. Dey tell, “Wen Christ, God Spesho Guy, come, you figga he goin do mo awesome stuff fo show who him den dis guy? Nah!”
Da Pharisee guys hear all da peopo stay tell dat kine stuff bout Jesus. So dem guys an da Main Pries guys sen da Temple Police guys fo bus him.
Den Jesus tell, “I ony goin stay wit you guys litto bit mo time, an den I goin go back by da One dat sen me hea.
You guys goin look fo me, but you no goin find me, cuz wea I goin go, you guys no can go.”

Den da Jew leada guys tell each odda, “Wea dis buggah goin go, an we no can find him? You tink he goin go by da Jew guys inside da Greek towns far away, fo teach da peopo dat talk da Greek language, o wat?
Wat he mean wen he tell, ‘You guys goin look fo me, but you no goin find me,’ an ‘Da place I goin stay, you guys no can go dea’?”
On da las day a da spesho religious kine ceremony, dass da main day, Jesus stan up, an talk real loud. He tell, “Whoeva stay thirsty, let um come by me fo drink.
Whoeva trus me, da Bible tell az jalike ‘rivas goin come outa dem dat get plenny watta fo make peopo live fo real kine.’ ”
Jesus tell dat bout God Spirit, cuz bumbye da peopo dat trus Jesus goin get God Spirit. Da time Jesus tell dat, dey neva get da Spirit yet, cuz God neva make Jesus come awesome to da max yet.
Plenny peopo wen hear wat Jesus tell. An dey tell, “Fo shua, dis da Spesho Guy dat goin come fo talk fo God!”
Get odda guys dat tell, “Dis da Christ Guy, da Spesho Guy God Wen Sen!”
But da odda guys tell, “You tink God Spesho Guy goin come from Galilee? No way!
Da Bible tell dat da Christ Guy goin come from King David ancesta guys, an goin come from Betlehem, wea King David wen live, aah?”
So da peopo split in half cuz a Jesus.
Some guys like grab him an bus him, but nobody touch him.
Da police guys go back by da Main Pries guys an da Pharisee guys. An da pries guys tell da police guys, “Eh! How come you guys neva bring him hea?”
Dey tell, “Wow! Nobody eva talk da way dat guy Jesus talk!”
Da Pharisee guys tell, “Wot! He wen bulai you guys too, o wat?!
You know, no mo leada guys o Pharisee guys dat trus him.
But dis peopo, dey donno da Rules From God, an God goin punish dem!”
Nicodemus, he one a da Pharisee guys. He da guy wen come fo talk to Jesus one nite befo time. He tell,
“Oua Rules tell, we gotta lissen da guy firs, an find out wat he wen do. Den we can figga if he wen do good o bad.”
Dey tell him, “Wot! Fo shua you no come from Galilee jalike him! Go check out da Bible from befo time. You goin find out dat nobody dat eva talk fo God come from Galilee!”
Den erybody go home dea place.
JHN.8.HPB: But Jesus go da Olive Ridge.
Nex day he go inside da open lanai fo da Temple early. Erybody come wea he stay. Den he sit down dea fo teach dem.
Da guys dat teach da Rules From God an da Pharisee guys wen find one wahine fooling aroun wit one guy behind her husban back. So dey bring her in front Jesus an all da peopo.
Dey tell him, “Teacha, we wen find dis wahine fooling aroun wit anodda guy dat not her husban!
Moses wen tell us in da Rules, ‘Whoeva fool aroun behind da odda back, gotta throw big kine stones at um fo kill um.’ But you, Jesus, wat you tell?”
Dey tell dat fo see wat Jesus goin tell, cuz dey like catch um fo bus um.
But Jesus bend ova an write someting wit his finga on top da dirt.
Az why wen dey stay tell him ova an ova fo tell dem, he stan up strait an tell um, “If get one a you guys dat neva do bad kine stuff, he can throw da firs stone at her.”
Den he bend ova one mo time, an write some mo on top da dirt.

Wen dey hear dat, dey come shame cuz dey know dey do bad kine stuff too. So dey all go way, one afta da odda, da older guys firs, an den da younga guys. Den get ony Jesus an da wahine stay standing dea.
Jesus stan up one mo time an tell, “Sistah, wea erybody stay? No mo nobody hea fo tell you gotta mahke?”
She tell, “No mo nobody, Mista.”
Jesus tell, “You can go now, cuz I no tell you gotta mahke. But no go do bad kine stuff no moa.”

Jesus talk to da peopo one mo time. He tell, “I jalike da light fo da peopo inside da world. Whoeva come by me an be my guy, dey no goin go aroun inside da dark. Dey goin get da light dat make dem live fo real kine.”
Da Pharisee guys tell him, “Eh! You da ony one stay tell dis. No mo anodda guy tell um fo you. So dass not enuff fo show proof dat wat you tell stay true.”
Jesus tell dem, “No matta I talk fo me, wat I tell stay true. I know wea I stay come from, an wea I stay go. But you guys, you donno wea I stay come from, o wea I goin go.
You guys tink you know how one guy stay by how he stay look on da outside. I no figga lidat.
No matta if I tell one guy good o bad, I tell da trut, cuz me not da ony one fo do um. I get my Faddah fo help me, cuz he da One wen sen me hea.
You guys Rules tell dat wen two peopo tell da same ting, den wat dey tell stay true.
Kay den. I tell bout me, an my Faddah dat sen me hea, he tell da same ting bout me.”
Dey tell, “Yeah? Yoa faddah, wea he stay?”
Jesus tell, “You guys donno me o my Faddah. If you guys wen know me, den you guys wen know my Faddah too. But you donno me o him.”
Jesus tell all dat wen he teach inside da Temple, nea da place wea dey bring da money. An nobody bus him, cuz not time yet fo dat.

Jesus tell da Pharisee guys one mo time, “I goin go away, an you guys goin look fo me. Da place I goin go, you guys no can go dea. But you guys goin get cut off from God foeva cuz a all da bad kine stuff you guys stay do.”
Az why da Jew leada guys tell, “Wat he stay talking bout? He goin kill himself, o wat? Cuz he tell, ‘Da place I goin go, you guys no can go dea.’ ”
Jesus tell dem, “You guys come from down hea, I come from up dea. You guys come from dis world, I no come from dis world.

Dass why I tell dat you guys goin get cut off from God foeva cuz a all da bad kine stuff you guys stay do. Cuz if you guys no stay shua dat I da Spesho Guy, den you guys goin mahke from all da bad kine stuff you stay do.”
So dey tell um, “Eh, who you?”
Jesus tell, “I da same guy, jalike I stay tell you guys from da start.
Get plenny bad kine stuff I can tell bout you guys, fo judge you. But I not goin do dat. Da One dat sen me hea, he erytime tell da trut. I tell da peopo inside da world ony da tings I hear from him.”
(He mean his Faddah. But dem guys, dey no undastan.)

Jesus tell, “Bumbye you guys goin put me, da Fo Real Kine Guy, high on top one cross. Den you guys goin know dat I da Spesho Guy, an wateva I do, az not jus me dat do um. I ony teach da stuff my Faddah teach me.
Da One dat sen me hea, he stay wit me. He no leave me. I erytime do da kine stuff dat he like.”
Wen he tell all dat, plenny peopo trus him.
Den Jesus tell da Jew guys dat trus him, “If you guys stay tight wit me an da stuff I stay teach you, den you goin be my guys fo real kine, an you guys goin learn mo plenny stuff from me.
You guys goin know da true stuff, an den you guys no need be slave guys no moa.”
Dey tell him, “Ho! Us guys come from Abraham! We no was slave guys eva! Wat you mean, ‘No need be slave guys no moa’?”
Jesus tell dem, “Dass right, wat I stay tell you! An I tell you guys dis too: Whoeva stay do bad kine stuff, dey jalike one slave, cuz dey gotta do da bad kine stuff.
You know, one slave guy no stay wit da boss foeva. Ony da boss boy, he stay wit him foeva.
I God Boy, az why if I hemo da shame fo da bad kine stuff you guys do, an let you guys go, den you guys no need be slave guys foeva. Fo shua you guys free up!
“I know fo shua you guys come from Abraham. But still yet, you guys stay trying fo kill me, cuz you guys no like take da stuff I stay teach.
I tell bout da stuff I wen see, dat my Faddah show me, an you guys do da stuff you wen hear bout from you guys faddah.”
Dey tell him, “Abraham, he da faddah fo us guys!”
Jesus tell dem, “If you guys was Abraham kids, den you guys suppose to do da kine stuff Abraham wen do.
But now you guys stay try fo kill me, no matta I erytime tell you guys da trut, jalike I wen hear um from my Faddah. Abraham, he neva make jalike you guys!
You guys do da kine stuff dat come from yoa faddah!”
Dey tell him, “Eh, us guys ony get one faddah, an he God! No mo anodda guy oua faddah!”
Jesus tell dem, “If God was you guys faddah, den you guys wen get love an aloha fo me, cuz I come from God, an now I stay hea. I no come hea jus fo me. I wen come hea cuz God wen sen me hea.
How come you guys no can undastan da stuff I stay tell you? Cuz you guys no like lissen, dass why!

“You guys come from yoa faddah, da Devil! You guys like do da kine stuff he like do. From da start, he like kill peopo. He no like da trut, cuz no mo notting true inside him. He erytime bulai, cuz dass wat he like do. He da firs guy eva wen bulai, cuz dass how he stay.
I stay tell you guys da trut, but you guys no trus me.
You guys no can show proof dat I wen do bad kine stuff, aah? Az why, if I stay tell da trut, how come you guys no trus me?
“Whoeva come from God, dey lissen wat God tell. Dass why you guys no like lissen me, cuz you guys no come from God.”
Da Jew leada guys tell him, “Az right wat we tell! You one Samaria guy, not one real Jew, an you get one bad kine spirit in charge a you!”
Jesus tell um, “I no mo one bad kine spirit in charge a me. I show respeck fo my Faddah. But you guys no mo respeck fo me.
I no try fo make peopo tink I awesome. Get anodda One dat show peopo how awesome I stay, an he da judge.
“If you guys undastan dat, den I like tell you guys dis too: Whoeva lissen wat I tell, dat guy no goin mahke inside, eva!”

Den da Jew leada guys tell, “Ho! Fo shua you get one bad kine spirit in charge a you! Abraham mahke, an da guys dat talk fo God long time befo time, dey mahke too. But you still tell, ‘Whoeva lissen wat I tell, dey no goin mahke, eva.’
You tink you mo importan den oua faddah Abraham? He mahke awready. An da guys dat talk fo God, dey wen mahke too. Who you tink you, hah?”
Jesus tell, “If I try make da peopo tink I awesome, dat no good. My Faddah, he da One dat show dem how awesome I stay. An you guys tell dat he yoa God.
But you guys donno him. I know him. If I tell dat I donno him, den I bulai, jalike you guys. But I know him, an I do wat he tell me fo do.
Abraham, dass you guys faddah. He wen stay real good inside wen he find out dat I goin come hea. He wen see dat, an he feel good inside.”
Da Jew leada guys tell him, “Eh! you no make fifty yet! Wat you mean, you wen see Abraham?”
Jesus tell dem, “Dass right! An I tell you guys dis too: Befo Abraham born, I stay awready.”
Den dem guys go get rocks fo stone Jesus fo kill um. But he hide an go outside from da open lanai fo da Temple.
JHN.9.HPB: Afta dat Jesus walk aroun, an he spock one guy dat wen born blind.
Da guys Jesus stay teach aks him, “Eh, Teacha! Who wen do bad kine stuff, dis guy o his muddah an faddah? Az why he born lidat, aah?”
Jesus tell dem, “Not him o his faddah o his muddah do someting bad. Not cuz a dat he born blind. He wen born lidat fo erybody see da awesome stuff God do fo da guy.
God sen me hea cuz us guys gotta do da kine work he tell us fo do now wen still get da light. Bumbye nite time come, an den nobody can work.
I stay inside da world now, an I jalike da light fo da peopo all ova da world.”
Afta Jesus tell dat, he spit on top da dirt, an make some mud. Den he take some a dat an put um on top da guy eyes.
Den Jesus tell um, “Go, wash yoa face inside da Siloam watta place.” (Siloam mean, “Dey Sen Watta Dea.”) Az why da guy go ova dea an wash his face, an wen he go home, he can see!
So da peopo dat live nea da guy, an da oddas dat see him beg befo time, dey tell, “Eh, dis da guy dat stay sit an beg befo time, aah?”
Some peopo tell, “Yeah, he da guy!” Odda peopo tell, “Nah! He ony look jalike him.”
But da guy tell, “Yeah! I da guy!”
Az why dey tell him, “How come you can see now?”
He tell um, “Da guy Jesus wen make mud, an put um on top my eyes, an tell me, ‘Go wash yoa face da Siloam watta place.’ Az why I go an wash my face, an den I can see!”
Dey tell him, “Wea he stay?”
He tell, “I donno.”
Den dey take da guy dat no stay blind no mo to da Pharisee guys.
Was da Res Day wen Jesus make da mud an make da guy see.
Az why da Pharisee guys tell him, “Eh, how come you can see?”
Da guy tell dem, “He put mud on top my eyes, an I wash um out, an den I can see!”

Den some a da Pharisee guys tell, “Dis guy no can come from God, cuz he do stuff he not suppose to do on da Res Day.” But odda Pharisee guys tell, “Nah! How can one bad kine guy do da kine awesome stuff dat show who him?” An dey make argue wit each odda.
So one mo time dey tell da guy dat no stay blind no moa, “Eh, wat you figga bout da guy dat make you see?”
Da guy tell, “He one guy dat talk fo God.”
Da Jew leada guys no tink az fo real kine, dat da guy stay blind befo time. So dey sen guys fo bring his muddah an faddah.
Dey tell da muddah an faddah, “Dis yoa boy? You tell he born blind? How come he can see now?”
Da muddah an faddah tell, “Yeah, dis oua boy. An he wen born blind.
But we donno how come he can see now, o who da guy wen make him see. Try aks him. He ol enuff. No need somebody dat can talk fo him.”

His muddah an faddah guys talk lidat, cuz dey sked da Jew leada guys. Cuz dem guys awready talk togedda, an tell, “If anybody tell dat Jesus da Christ, da Spesho Guy God Wen Pick, we goin throw him outa da Jew church.”
Dass why his muddah an faddah guys tell, “He ol enuff. Try aks him.”
So dey tell da guy dat no stay blind no mo fo come back one mo time. Dey tell, “Eh! Tell da trut in front God! Us guys know fo shua dat dis buggah Jesus, he one bad guy.”
Da guy tell dem, “I donno if he one bad guy o wat. But I know dis: befo time I no can see—now I can see!”
Dey aks him, “Wat he do to you? How he open yoa eyes?”
He tell dem, “I wen tell you guys awready, but you guys neva lissen. How come you guys like hear um one mo time? You guys like come his guys fo him teach you guys too?”
Den dey talk mean to him, an tell, “You his guy, an you lissen him. Us guys, we Moses guys, an we ony lissen Moses.
We know dat God wen talk to Moses. But dis buggah, we donno wea he come from.”
Da guy tell um, “Aah! Dis blow my mind! You guys donno wea he come from, but still yet he make me see.”
An da guy tell dis too, “Eh! we know dat God no lissen da bad kine guys. But he lissen da guys dat get respeck fo him an do wat he like.”
An da guy tell, “Lissen up! From da time God make da world till now, nobody eva hear dat somebody make one guy see dat wen born blind.”
An da guy tell, “If dis guy neva come from God, den he no can do notting.”
Dey tell him, “Eh, you ony do bad kine stuff from da time you born! How come you tink you can teach us guys someting?” Den dey throw um outa da Jew church.
Jesus hear dat dey throw da guy outa da Jew church, so he go find da guy, an tell him, “You trus da Fo Real Kine Guy?”
Da guy tell, “Who da guy, Mista? Tell me, fo me trus him.”
Jesus tell him, “You wen see him awready. Dass me, da guy stay talking to you.”
Da guy tell, “You Da One In Charge! I trus you!” An he go down on his knees in front Jesus.
Jesus tell um, “I wen come inside dis world fo show who do da bad kine stuff. Bumbye da guys dat no can see, goin see, an da guys dat see goin come blind.”
Had some Pharisee guys dea dat hear dat. Dey tell Jesus, “Eh! You figga us guys no can see too?”
Jesus tell um, “If you guys no can see, den nobody can poin finga you guys. But you guys tell dat you guys can see, but you no can see fo real kine. Dass why God poin finga you guys.”
JHN.10.HPB: Jesus tell, “Dis fo shua wat I tell you guys: If get one place fo da sheeps, an somebody no go inside dea by da gate, but he go climb ova da wall anodda place, dat guy ony like steal da sheeps.
But da guy dat go inside by da gate, dass da guy dat take kea da sheeps.
Da guy dat watch da gate, he open um fo da sheep guy. Da sheeps hear da sheep guy voice wen he call dem by dea name, an den he bring dem outside.
Afta he bring um outside, he go in front dem, an da sheeps go wit him, cuz dey know his voice.
Dey no goin go wit one guy dat dey donno. Dey goin run away from dat guy, cuz dey donno dat guy voice.”
Jesus tell dem dis story fo teach um, but dey neva undastan wat he stay teaching dem.
Den Jesus tell um one mo time, “You guys undastan dat? Kay den, I like tell you guys dis too: I jalike da gate fo da sheeps.
All da odda guys dat come befo me, dey jalike steala guys. But da sheeps no lissen dem guys.

I jalike da gate. If anybody trus me, God goin take um outa da bad kine stuff dey stay in, an let um go. Dass jalike dey goin go inside God place thru da gate, az me. An dey goin go wea eva dey like go an find food fo eat.
Da steala guy, he ony come fo steal, kill, an bus up da place. But I wen come fo da peopo come alive inside, an fo dem live to da max.
“Me, jalike one good sheep guy, cuz da good kine sheep guy ready fo mahke fo his sheeps.

“But if get one worka guy dey pay, den he not da sheep farma guy. He no own da sheeps. So wen he spock one wild wolf coming, he run away from da sheeps. Den da wolf grab da sheeps, an all da odda sheeps run all ova da place.
Da worka guy run away, cuz he ony stay working fo da money, an he no kea fo da sheeps.
“I jalike one good sheep guy. I know my sheeps, an dey know me,
jalike my Faddah know me, an I know my Faddah. I mahke fo my sheeps.
I get odda sheeps too, dat no come from dis place. I gotta go get dem too. Dey goin lissen my voice, an dey goin come togedda, an be jalike one ohana wit one sheep guy.
“Dis how my Faddah show love an aloha fo me: cuz I goin mahke fo come back alive one mo time.
No mo nobody can make me go mahke. Ony me can tell I gotta mahke, an come back alive. Dass wat my Faddah wen tell me fo do.”
One mo time da Jew guys make argue wit each odda cuz a wat Jesus tell.
Plenny a dem guys tell, “Eh! Da buggah get one real bad kine spirit in charge a him, an he pupule! How come you guys stay lissen him?”
But odda guys tell, “Nah! One guy wit one bad kine spirit in charge a him no talk lidis! You tink one bad kine spirit can make one blind guy see? No way!”
Get one spesho religious kine ceremony. Dass wen da Jew guys rememba da time wen dea ancestas make da Temple inside Jerusalem spesho fo God one mo time. Da ceremony was winta time.
Jesus walk aroun inside da open lanai fo da Temple wea da place dey call da “Solomon Lanai” stay.
Da Jew leada guys come aroun him an tell him, “Eh, how long you goin make us guys wait? Tell us fo real kine if you da Christ Guy, da Spesho Guy From God!”
Jesus tell, “I tell you guys awready, but you guys no trus me. Da tings I stay do cuz my Faddah give me da right fo do um, dat show who me.
But you guys no trus me, cuz you guys not my sheeps.
My sheeps, dey hear my voice. I know dem. An dey stay tight wit me.
I goin make dem alive to da max foeva, an no come cut off from God. An nobody can grab dem away from me.
My Faddah wen give dem to me. He get mo powa den anybody. Dass why nobody can grab dem away from my Faddah.
Me an my Faddah, we stay one.”
One mo time da Jew leada guys pick up stones fo throw um at Jesus fo kill um.
Jesus tell dem, “I wen show you guys plenny good tings dat I wen do fo my Faddah. Now, wat one a dose good tings you guys throw stone at me fo?”
Da Jew leada guys tell him, “We goin throw stone at you fo kill you, cuz you stay talk bad bout God, not cuz you do good kine stuff. No matta you ony one guy jalike us, you stay make jalike you God!”
Jesus tell dem, “Eh, God wen tell dis in yoa Rules, ‘I tell you guys, da ones in charge, you guys gods.’
Kay den. We know dat eryting da Bible tell from befo time, stay true. So, if God call dem guys he talking to ‘gods,’
how come you guys tell dat I talk bad bout God, cuz I tell dat I God Boy? Da Faddah tell I spesho fo him, an he sen me hea inside da world.
If I no stay do wat my Faddah like fo me do, den you guys no need trus me.

But I stay do wat my Faddah like me fo do. So, no matta you guys no trus me, trus ony da stuff I do. Den you guys goin know an undastan dat my Faddah stay tight wit me, an I stay tight wit my Faddah.”
So one mo time dem guys try fo grab him, but he dig out.
Jesus go da odda side a da Jordan Riva, wea John wen baptize firs time. He stay ova dea.
Plenny peopo go by Jesus. Dey tell, “John neva do awesome stuff fo show who him, but eryting he tell bout dis guy Jesus stay true!”
An plenny peopo go trus him ova dea.
JHN.11.HPB: Had one guy Lazarus. He get two sistahs, Mary an Marta, an dey all come from Betany town. Mary, she da wahine dat layta put perfume on top Jesus, Da One In Charge. She put um on top his feet an wipe um wit her hair. Den Lazarus come sick.
So Lazarus sistahs sen guys fo tell Jesus, “You Da One In Charge, yoa good fren Lazarus, he stay sick.”
Wen Jesus hear dat, he tell, “Lazarus no goin mahke from dis sick. Dis happen so erybody goin know how awesome God stay. I God Boy, an erybody goin find out from dis how awesome I stay too.”
Jesus get love an aloha fo da sistahs, Marta an Mary, an fo Lazarus too.
Afta Jesus hear dat Lazarus stay sick, he still yet stay ova dea da odda side a da Jordan Riva two mo days.
Den he tell his guys, “Come on. We go back Judea side, wea Lazarus stay.”
Da guys Jesus stay teach tell him, “Eh, Teacha, ony short time befo dis da Jew guys like throw stone at you fo kill you. An you still like go back ova dea one mo time?”

Jesus tell dem, “No sked! God goin take kea us guys, cuz he jalike da light. Day time get twelve hour, aah? If you walk aroun day time, you no goin trip an fall down, cuz da light dat shine inside dis world let you see.
But if you walk aroun nite time, you goin trip an fall down, cuz you no mo light.”
Afta Jesus tell dat, he tell, “Oua fren Lazarus wen go sleep, but I goin go ova dea fo wake him up.”
Jesus guys tell, “Eh Boss, if he sleep, he goin come good.”
Jesus mean he mahke die dead, but his guys tink he stay talk bout res an sleep.
Den Jesus tell um fo real kine, “Lazarus mahke awready.
I feel good inside fo you guys, cuz I neva stay ova dea wen he mahke. You guys goin trus me cuz a wat goin happen. An now, we go ova dea by him.”
Den Thomas da Twin tell Jesus odda guys, “Eh, mo betta we go wit Jesus too, fo us mahke wit him.”
Wen Jesus go Betany, he find out dat Lazarus stay inside da grave four days awready.
Betany stay not far from Jerusalem, not even two mile.
Plenny Jew guys come fo kokua Marta an Mary, cuz dea braddah mahke.
Den Marta find out dat Jesus stay come. She go outside da town fo meet him. But Mary stay inside da house.
Marta tell Jesus, “You Da One In Charge! If you was hea, fo shua my braddah no wen mahke!
But I know fo shua even now, God goin do wateva you go aks him fo do.”
Jesus tell her, “Yoa braddah goin come back alive one mo time.”
Marta tell him, “I know fo shua he goin come back alive, bumbye wen all da mahke guys goin come back alive, an dis world goin come pau.”
Jesus tell her, “I da Guy dat make peopo come back alive an stay live fo real kine. Whoeva trus me goin come alive, no matta dey mahke.
Whoeva stay live fo real kine an trus me, dey no goin mahke inside, eva! You know fo shua az real, Marta, o wat?”
She tell him, “Yeah, you Da One In Charge! I trus you, dat you da Christ, da Spesho Guy God Wen Sen. You God Boy, da Guy dey wen tell us goin come inside dis world.”
Afta Marta tell dat, she go back by her sistah Mary. Dey talk wea nobody can hear wat dey tell. She tell, “Da Teacha come, an he like see you.”
Mary hear dat. She get up quick an go outside wea Jesus stay.
Jesus neva come inside da town yet, but he stay da place wea Marta meet him.
Da Jew guys dat stay inside da house wit Mary, fo kokua her, dey see her get up quick an go outside. So dey go too. Dey figga she goin go da grave fo cry ova dea.
Den Mary come wea Jesus stay, an see him. She go down in front his feets an tell, “Boss, if you was hea, my braddah neva mahke.”
Wen Jesus see her crying, an da Jew guys dat come wit her crying too, dat bodda him plenny an he come all shook up inside.
He tell, “Wea you guys bury him?”
Dey tell, “Boss, come see.”
Jesus cry.
Den da Jew guys tell, “Look, how plenny love an aloha he get fo Lazarus!”
But some a dem tell, “Eh! Dis guy wen make da blind guys see. How come he no can make Lazarus come good fo him no mahke, aah?”
One mo time Jesus come all bodda inside. He go da cave wea dey wen bury Lazarus. Get one big stone dea dat cova da cave fo nobody go inside.
Jesus tell, “Take away da big stone.”
Marta, da mahke guy sistah, she tell, “Haah, Boss? He mahke four days awready! Haunas goin be!”
Jesus tell her, “I tell you awready dat if you trus God, you goin find out how awesome he stay, aah?”
Den some guys push da stone away from da puka. Jesus look up to da sky an tell, “Faddah, mahalo plenny dat you lissen me.
I know fo shua you erytime lissen me. But I tell dat so dese guys goin trus me, dat you wen sen me hea.”
Afta he tell dat, he talk real loud, “Lazarus, come outa dea!”
Da mahke guy come outside. He get one bandage fo mahke guys aroun his hands an feet, an anodda bandage aroun his face. Jesus tell, “Hemo da bandage from his face, an let him go.”
Den plenny Jew guys dat come fo kokua Mary, an see all da awesome stuff Jesus wen do, dey trus him.
But odda guys go by da Pharisee guys, an tell dem all da stuff Jesus wen do.
Den da Main Pries guys an da Pharisee guys tell all da Jew leadas fo come togedda. Dey tell, “Dis guy Jesus stay do all kine awesome stuff dat show who him! Wat we goin do?
If we let him stay do dis kine stuff, erybody goin go trus him jalike he dea king! An cuz a dat, da Rome army guys goin come an wipe out oua Temple an oua peopo.”
One a dem, Kaiafas, da Main Pries Guy dat year. He tell dem, “You guys donno notting!
Mo betta fo you guys if one guy mahke fo all da peopo. If not, da Rome guys goin wipe out all us Jew guys!”
Kaiafas neva figga fo tell dat, but he da Main Pries Guy dat year, dass why he can talk lidat. He talk fo God wen he tell dat Jesus goin mahke fo all da Jew guys.
An he no goin mahke ony fo da Jew guys, but fo all God kids dat stay all ova da world, fo bring dem all togedda fo come one peopo.
Dass why, from dat time, da Jew leada guys stay talk togedda how dey goin kill Jesus.
Az why Jesus no go aroun no mo wea da Jew leada guys can see him. He go one place nea da boonies, Efraim town. He stay ova dea wit da guys he stay teach.

Now, almos time fo da Jew Passova religious kine ceremony. Plenny peopo from da boonies go Jerusalem befo da Passova, fo dem do all da stuff da Rules From God tell fo do fo make um fo dem come clean inside fo pray Passova time.
Da peopo stay look fo Jesus. Wen dey stan inside da open lanai fo da Temple, dey aks each odda, “Wat you guys tink? You tink Jesus goin come da spesho religious kine ceremony, o wat?”
But da Main Pries guys an da Pharisee guys tell dat if whoevas know wea Jesus stay, dey gotta tell dem, fo dem sen da police guys fo bus Jesus.
JHN.12.HPB: Den six days befo da Passova religious kine ceremony, Jesus go Betany town. Dass wea Lazarus stay, da guy Jesus wen make come back alive from mahke.
So dey make one dinna fo Jesus. Marta bring da food to da peopo, an Lazarus stay sit by Jesus at da table.
Den Mary take one pint da kine perfume dey make from da nard plant dat cost plenny, pour um on top Jesus feets, an den wipe um wit her hair. Cuz a dat, smell real good all ova inside da house.
But Judas Iscariot, one a Jesus guys, da guy dat layta goin set him up fo mahke, he tell,
“Eh, how come dey neva sell dis perfume fo three hundred silva coin, an give da money to da peopo dat no mo notting?”
Da guy, he no mo aloha fo da peopo dat no mo notting, he ony talk lidat cuz he one steala guy. He stay in charge a da money bag fo Jesus dem, an he cockaroach um.
But Jesus tell, “Eh, no bodda her! She wen stash dis perfume fo use um wen dey make me ready fo bury.”
Da peopo dat no mo notting, dey goin be wit you guys erytime. But me, I no goin be wit you guys erytime.

Dat time plenny Jew guys find out dat Jesus stay ova dea inside Betany town, an dey come fo see him. An not ony him, but Lazarus too. Cuz dey wen hear dat Jesus wen make Lazarus come back alive from mahke.
So da Main Pries guys talk togedda how dey goin kill Lazarus too.
Cuz plenny Jew guys hear bout Lazarus, an dey see him. Az why dey bag from dea leadas, an trus Jesus.
Da nex day, plenny peopo dat wen come Jerusalem fo da Passova ceremony hear dat Jesus stay come dea.
Dey cut branches from da palm trees fo wave cuz dey like cheer Jesus, an dey go fo meet him. Dey yell,
“Hui! God goin take us
Outa da bad kine stuff we stay in!
Dis da King fo da Israel peopo!
God goin do plenny good kine stuff
Fo him.
He da guy dat come wit powa
From Da One In Charge!”
Jesus get one young donkey an sit down on top um, jalike da Bible tell,
“No sked, you peopo from Jerusalem town!
Look! Yoa King stay come!
He stay sit on top one young donkey.”

Dat time, Jesus guys no undastan all da stuff dat stay happen. But laytas, Jesus come back alive from mahke an God make um come awesome to da max. Den, his guys rememba dat da Bible tell from befo time all dis tings bout him. An dey rememba dat da Bible tell from befo time how da peopo make to him.
All da peopo dat wen stay wit Jesus, da time he make Lazarus come back alive from mahke, dey tell wat dey wen see.
Dass why plenny peopo go outside Jerusalem fo meet Jesus, cuz dey hear bout da awesome ting he wen do dat show who him.
Den da Pharisee guys tell each odda, “Look! Erybody in da whole world stay go wit Jesus! An us guys no can do notting fo stop um!”
Had some Greek guys dat go Jerusalem wit da odda peopo fo da Passova religious kine ceremony, fo go down an show God love an respeck dea.
Dey come by Philip, da guy dat come from Betsaida town Galilee side, an dey tell him, “Eh Mista, us guys, we like meet Jesus.”
Philip, he go tell Andrew. Den Andrew an Philip, dey go togedda an tell Jesus.
Jesus tell um, “Time awready fo me, da Fo Real Kine Guy. Now God goin make me come awesome fo real kine! But befo I come awesome to da max, I gotta mahke.
An I like tell you guys dis too: I jalike da wheat seed dat gotta fall down inside da groun an mahke, an den can grow, fo make plenny mo seeds. If da seed no mahke, stay ony one seed.
Whoeva like hang on to dea life, dey goin lose um. But whoeva give up dea life in dis world, goin hang on to um, an stay live to da max foeva.
Whoeva like be my helpa gotta go wit me an be my guy. Wea I stay, my helpa guy goin stay dea too. An my Faddah goin show respeck to dat helpa guy.”
Den Jesus tell, “Right now I feel all funny kine inside. Wat I goin tell? ‘Faddah, no let me mahke!’? No way I goin tell dat! Dass why I wen come hea, fo me mahke.
I tell dis: ‘Faddah, let um happen, so erybody goin know how awesome you stay.’ ”
Den one voice from da sky tell, “I wen show dem I stay awesome awready, an I goin show um one mo time.”
Da peopo dat stan dea an hear um tell, “Eh! Get thunda!”
Da odda peopo tell, “Nah, az was one angel messenja guy from Da One In Charge dat talk to him.”
Jesus tell dem, “Dis voice not fo me, but fo you guys.
Now da peopo inside dis world goin stan in front God da Judge, an God goin throw out da Bad Guy dat stay in charge a da peopo all ova da world.
Wen dey lif me up from da groun fo kill me, den I goin bring erybody by me.”
He tell dat fo show dem how he goin mahke.

Da peopo tell him, “We wen hear from da Rules From God dat da Christ Guy goin live foeva. Den how come you tell, ‘Dey goin take me, da Fo Real Kine Guy, an lif me up from da groun fo kill me’? Who dis Fo Real Kine Guy dat you stay talk bout?”

Jesus tell dem, “Me, I jalike da light fo you guys. Ony short time mo da light goin stay hea wit you guys. Live da right way now wen get light still yet, cuz no good da dark pio da light you get inside you. Whoeva walk aroun inside da dark, dey donno wea dey going.
Right now, I stay hea wit you guys. I jalike da light fo you guys, fo you trus me. Den you guys can come da kine peopo dat know wea dey going cuz dey get da light inside.”
Jesus tell dat. Den he go way from da peopo fo nobody stay by him.
No matta Jesus wen do plenny awesome stuff in front da peopo fo show who him, dey still yet no trus him.
Jalike da guy Isaiah wen tell, dat talk fo God long time befo time,
“Eh Boss! No mo nobody trus wat us guys tell!
Wen you show yoa powa, nobody see notting!”
Az why da Jew guys no can trus God nowdays, jalike Isaiah tell anodda time,
“God make um fo dem no see,
An make um hard head,
Az why dey no like see wit dea eyes,
No like undastan wit dea head,
No like change an come by me.
Az cuz dey no like fo me
Make um come good.”
Isaiah wen tell dat cuz he wen see how awesome Jesus stay, an he wen tell wat goin happen wit Jesus.
Plenny Jew main leada guys trus Jesus, but dey no like tell erybody, cuz dey sked da Pharisee guys goin throw um outa da Jew church.
Cuz da leada guys, dey like da peopo talk good bout dem, mo den dey like God talk good bout um.
Jesus talk loud an tell, “Whoeva trus me, he no trus ony me, he trus da One dat wen sen me hea too.
Whoeva see me, he see da One dat sen me hea too.
I wen come inside da world fo da peopo know da trut, jalike me da light fo dem. An whoeva trus me, dey goin know da trut. Dey no goin stay jalike dey dark inside an donno notting.
Whoeva hear wat I tell an no do um, I no goin punish dem. I neva come fo punish da peopo inside da world. Me, I wen come fo take um outa da bad kine stuff dey stay do.
Whoeva tell, ‘Laytas wit you!’ an no lissen wat I tell, God goin judge dem. In da end time wen da world goin come pau, if dey no lissen da true stuff I tell, da judge goin punish dem.
Az cuz I neva tell stuff jus cuz I like, but my Faddah dat wen sen me tell me eryting he like me fo tell.
I know fo shua dat wat da Faddah tell us fo do show erybody how dey can come alive foeva fo real kine. Az why eryting I tell, dass jalike wat my Faddah wen tell me fo tell.”
JHN.13.HPB: Was jus befo da Passova time. Jesus know dat was time fo him fo go outa dis world, an go by his Faddah. He erytime get love an aloha fo his peopo dat stay inside da world, an he get love an aloha fo dem to da max.
Jesus dem stay eat da Passova dinna. An da Devil awready make Judas, Simon Iscariot boy, figga dat he like set up Jesus.
Jesus know dat his Faddah wen give him all da powa ova eryting. He know he come from God an now he goin go back by God.
So Jesus stan up from da table, take off his robe, an put one towel aroun his wais.
Den he pour watta inside one small wash tub, an start fo wash his guys feets, firs one guy, den da odda. An den he dry um wit da towel he get aroun his wais.
He go by Simon Peter. An Peter tell um, “Eh, Boss! Wat you stay do? You goin wash my feets, o wat?!”
Jesus tell him, “You no undastan how come I stay do dis now, but bumbye you goin undastan um.”
Peter tell him, “No way you eva goin wash my feets!”
Jesus tell him, “If I no wash you, den you no can be my guy.”
Simon Peter tell him, “Kay den, you Da One In Charge! No wash ony my feets. Wash my hands an my head too!”
Jesus tell him, “Whoeva wen bafe, dey ony need wash dea feets. Dea body stay clean awready. You guys stay clean inside, but not all you guys.”
(Cuz Jesus know awready who goin set him up. Dass why he tell, “All you guys not clean.”)
Afta Jesus wash dea feets, he put on his robe an go back by da table. Den he aks um, “Eh, you guys undastan how come I wash you guys feets?
You guys call me ‘Teacha’ an ‘Da One In Charge.’ Dass good, cuz dass who me.
I Da One In Charge a you guys, an I yoa Teacha, aah? An I wen wash you guys feets. Kay den. You guys suppose to wash each odda feets too.
I wen show you guys wat fo do, cuz jalike I wen do fo you guys, you guys suppose to do too.
Dass right! An I tell you guys dis too: Da slave guy not mo importan den his boss. An da messenja guy not mo importan den da guy dat sen him.
You guys know all dis stuffs. So, if you guys do um, you guys goin stay good inside.
“I no talk bout all you guys. I know da guys I wen pick. But gotta happen jalike da Bible tell from befo time, ‘One guy dat eat wit me go agains me.’
I stay tell you guys dis now, befo he do um, so wen he do um, you guys goin know fo shua dat I God Spesho Guy.
Dass right! An I like tell you guys dis too: Whoeva stay tight wit any guy I sen all ova da place, dey stay tight wit me too. An whoeva stay tight wit me, dey stay tight wit da One wen sen me too.”
Afta Jesus tell dat, he come all funny kine inside. He tell da guys he teaching, “Dis fo shua wat I tell you guys: One a you guys goin set me up fo mahke.”
His guys look at each odda, an dey no can figga who da guy he talking bout.
One a Jesus guys stay sit by him at da table. Jesus get plenny love an aloha fo dat guy.
So Simon Peter nod da head at da guy an tell, “Eh! Try find out who he talking bout.”
So da guy move mo close an aks Jesus, “Eh, Boss! Who da guy?”
Jesus tell, “I goin take one piece bread, dip um inside da sauce, an give um to da guy.” So he take da bread, dip um inside, an give um to Judas, Simon Iscariot boy.
Judas take da bread, an right den an dea, Satan take ova him. Den Jesus tell, “Hurry up an go do wat you goin do!”
But da odda guys sitting dea neva undastan how come Jesus tell him dat.
Some a Jesus guys tink dat Jesus tell Judas, “Go get wat we need fo da Passova,” o “Go give someting to da peopo dat no mo notting.” Dey tink lidat cuz Judas stay in charge a da money fo all da guys.
So afta Judas take da bread, he go outside real fas. Was nite time.
Afta Judas go way, Jesus tell, “I da Fo Real Kine Guy. Now erybody goin see how awesome I stay. An from dat, dey goin find out how awesome God stay.
I goin show how awesome God stay, an he goin make me awesome too, cuz I stay tight wit him. An he goin do um right now.

Eh guys! I get plenny love an aloha fo you guys! But I goin stay wit you guys ony short time moa. Den you guys goin look fo me, but jalike I wen tell da Jew leada guys, I tell you guys now, ‘Da place wea I goin go, you guys no can go dea.’
“I give you guys one new ting you gotta do: Show love an aloha fo each odda! Jus like I show love an aloha fo you guys, dass how you guys gotta show love an aloha fo each odda.
If all you guys show love an aloha fo each odda, den erybody goin know you my guys.”
Simon Peter go aks him, “Eh, Boss, wea you goin go?”
Jesus tell him, “Da place I goin go, you no can go dea now, but bumbye you goin go dea.”
Peter tell um, “Eh, Boss, how come I no can go wit you now? I stay ready fo mahke fo you!”
Jesus tell him, “Fo real? You tink you stay ready fo mahke fo me? Dass right! But I tell you dis too: Befo da roosta crow early today, you goin tell three time dat you donno who me!”
JHN.14.HPB: “No need you guys come all bodda inside. Trus God, an trus me too.
Inside my Faddah house, get plenny place fo stay. If neva have, I wen tell you guys awready. I goin go ova dea fo make you guys place ready.
Afta I go an make da place ready, I goin come back, an bring you guys ova dea wit me. Dass how da place I stay, you guys goin stay dea too.
Da place I goin go, you guys know how fo go ova dea.”
Thomas tell um, “Eh Boss! Us guys, we donno wea you goin go. How we goin know how fo go ova dea?”
Jesus tell um, “No mo anodda guy can bring peopo to da Faddah, ony me. I bring peopo to um, jalike I da road. I da guy dat get da trut. I da guy dat make da peopo come alive fo real kine.
You guys know me, so dass mean you guys goin know my Faddah. An from now, you guys know him, an see him.”
Philip tell um, “Eh Boss, show us yoa Faddah, an dass enuff fo us guys.”
Jesus tell him, “I stay wit you guys long time, an you still yet donno who me, Philip? Whoeva see me, dey see my Faddah. So how come you tell, ‘Show us yoa Faddah’?

You no trus me, o wat, wen I tell dat I stay tight wit my Faddah, an he stay tight wit me? Da stuff I stay tell you guys, all dat no come from me, come from my Faddah. He stay tight wit me, an he da One dat stay do all dis kine stuff.
Trus me wen I tell dat I stay tight wit my Faddah an he stay tight wit me. If you guys no can stay shua bout dat, den trus me cuz a da stuff I stay do.
“Dass right! An I tell you guys dis too: Whoeva trus me, dey goin do da same kine stuff I do. An dey goin do even mo betta stuff, cuz I goin go by my Faddah.
Wateva you guys go aks me fo do cuz you my guys, I goin do um. Den erybody can know how awesome my Faddah stay, cuz I his Boy, an I show dem how awesome he stay.
Wateva you guys go aks me fo do cuz you my guys, I goin do um fo you.
“If you guys get love an aloha fo me, you goin do wat I tell you guys fo do.
I goin aks my Faddah, an he goin give you guys anodda One fo kokua you guys. An dat One goin stay wit you guys foeva.

Dass God Spirit dat teach you guys da trut. But da peopo inside da world no like take him, cuz dey no see him, an dey donno him. You guys know him, cuz he stay by you guys, an he goin stay tight wit you guys.
“I no goin leave you guys all alone. I goin come back by you guys.
Litto wile moa, da peopo inside da world no goin see me. But you guys goin see me. Cuz I goin come back alive, dass why you guys goin come alive fo real kine.
Wen I come back alive, you guys goin know fo shua dat I stay tight wit my Faddah, an you guys stay tight wit me, an I stay tight wit you guys.

“Whoeva take wat I tell um fo do, an do um, dass da ones dat get love an aloha fo me. My Faddah goin get love an aloha fo dem, an I goin get love an aloha fo um, an I goin show um who me fo real kine.”
Get anodda guy Judas, not da Iscariot guy. He go aks Jesus, “Boss, how come you goin show us guys who you fo real kine, an not show da odda peopo inside da world?”

Jesus tell um, “Whoeva get love an aloha fo me, dey goin do wat I tell um fo do. My Faddah goin get love an aloha fo dem too. Den me an my Faddah goin go by dem, an jalike we goin make house wit dem togedda.
Whoeva no mo love an aloha fo me, dey no goin do wat I tell um fo do. All da stuff you wen hear me tell, dat no come from me, come from my Faddah dat wen sen me.
“I stay wit you guys still yet, az why I stay tell you guys all dis stuff now.
My Faddah, bumbye he goin sen you guys his Good An Spesho Spirit fo kokua you guys fo me. He goin teach you guys eryting, an help you guys no foget all da stuff I wen tell you guys awready.

“Wen I go way, I goin make you guys so notting bodda you inside. Ony me can give you dat. All da stuff in da world no can make um so notting bodda you. Ony me can make um so notting bodda you! No come all bus up inside! An no come sked!

You guys wen hear me tell, ‘I goin go way from you guys, an I goin come back by you guys.’ So, no feel bad. If you guys get love an aloha fo me, den fo shua you guys goin stay good inside, cuz I goin go by my Faddah. Cuz my Faddah, he mo importan den me.
I tell you guys all dis stuff befo da ting happen. So wen da ting happen, you guys goin trus me.
I ony goin talk to you guys short time moa, cuz Satan stay come. Fo now, he in charge a da peopo inside dis world, but he no mo powa ova me.
But no matta he stay come, cuz I goin do wat my Faddah tell me fo do. Dat goin show da peopo inside da world dat I get love an aloha fo my Faddah.
“Come on! We goin go!”
JHN.15.HPB: “Lissen up. I da guy dat you guys stay tight wit. I jalike da grape vine, but me, I fo real kine. My Faddah, he jalike da farma guy dat take kea da grape vine.

All da peopo dat tell dey stay tight wit me, but dey no do notting, my Faddah take um off, jalike da grape farma guy take off all da branches dat no mo fruit. An all da peopo dat stay tight wit me, he take away da junk kine stuff from inside dem, jalike wen da grape farma guy trim da branches fo dem get plenny fruit.
“From da stuff I stay tell you, you guys stay clean inside awready, jalike da branches da grape farma guy trim.
Go stay tight wit me, jalike I stay tight wit you guys. Da branch no can make fruit if no stay tight wit da vine. Same ting, you guys no can do notting if you guys no stay tight wit me.

“Me, I jalike da grape vine, an you guys jalike da branches. Whoeva come tight wit me awready, an I stay tight wit dem, dey goin be jalike one branch dat get plenny fruit. Cuz you guys no can do notting if you no stay tight wit me.

Whoeva no stay tight wit me, dey jalike one branch dat no stay good. Dass da kine branch peopo throw out, an da branch dry up. Den dey go get all da odda dry branches, an throw um inside da fire fo burn.
If you guys stay tight wit me, an stick wit da tings I stay tell you guys, den you guys can aks God fo wateva you guys like, an he goin do um fo you guys.
“Dis how erybody goin know how awesome my Faddah stay, if you guys stay do plenny good kine stuff, jalike da grape branches dat give plenny fruit. Dass how you guys goin show dat you my guys.
“Jalike da Faddah get love an aloha fo me, dass how I get love an aloha fo you guys. Hang in dea an stay tight wit me, fo me give you guys my love an aloha.

If you guys stay do wat I tell you guys fo do, den you guys goin hang in dea an stay tight wit me fo shua, an I goin give you guys my love an aloha. Jalike I do wat my Faddah tell me fo do, an he stay give me plenny love an aloha.
